travel_descriptions.outside: Leaving the secluded royal domesticities and heading outside, you are greeted by a breath of fresh air. You tread towards the spectacular palace Balcony, feeling the cool marble beneath your feet as you anticipate the panoramic city views ahead.

Comfortable Bed.name: Comfortable Bed
Comfortable Bed.description: An unadorned but cozy sleeping place.
Comfortable Bed.examine_text: The bed is well made, clean, and enticing to turn in for the night. The sheets are smooth and cool to the touch, and the pillows look soft and fluffy.

Dresser.name: Dresser
Dresser.description: A multi-drawer wooden piece of furniture for storing clothing.
Dresser.examine_text: The mahogany dresser has seen better days, yet holds a charm of its own. It has seven drawers of various sizes and appears to be empty.

Bearskin Rug.name: Bearskin Rug
Bearskin Rug.description: A large rug made of bearskin.
Bearskin Rug.examine_text: The rug is quite large, sprawled in front of the fireplace. It's very soft and plush. The bear's face, with glass eyes replacing the real ones, adds a touch of fear.

FirePlace.name: FirePlace
FirePlace.description: A warmth-generating usual fixture in old rooms.
FirePlace.examine_text: The fireplace is currently unlit, but charred wood and ash hint at its regular use. The mantel is clean and polished.

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.examine_text: The mirror has an ornately carved wooden frame. The glass is pristinely clean and offers a clear and undistorted reflection.

Lady Amelia.name: Lady Amelia
Lady Amelia.description: Sophisticated and elegant with a crown of ginger curls, draped in a lavish gown of emerald and gold, Lady Amelia exudes refinement.
Lady Amelia.persona: I am Lady Amelia, a confidante of the queen and an avid diplomat. I carry myself with a grace that turns heads.
Lady Amelia.goal: To broker peace agreements among warring nations.

Gold Locket.name: Gold Locket
Gold Locket.description: A small, circular locket made of gold.
Gold Locket.examine_text: Upon a closer look, Lady Amelia's Gold Locket is an ornately made. It's made of pure gold and features intricate relief figures on the front. Inside is a miniature portrait of the queen, a testament to their close friendship.

Embroidered Handkerchief.name: Embroidered Handkerchief
Embroidered Handkerchief.description: A handkerchief that is exquisitely embroidered.
Embroidered Handkerchief.examine_text: The Embroidered Handkerchief that Lady Amelia carries around is nothing short of exquisite. It's made of fine linen, hemmed on all sides, and features delicate embroidery along the edges. The centerpiece is a beautifully stitched floral design, accentuated by the initials 'A' on one corner.

Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins.name: Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins
Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins.examine_text: Lady Amelia's Velvet Pouch of Gold Coins is rich in texture and weight. The plush, royal-blue velvet pouch is contrasted by a gold drawstring. Inside, you can see shiny gold coins, each bearing the likeness of the current monarch, that speaks both of the kingdom's wealth and Lady Amelia's economic prowess.

Sir Reginald.name: Sir Reginald
Sir Reginald.description: Tall, with a military bearing and sharp eyes, Sir Reginald carries himself with authority in his bejeweled armor, bearing the scars of countless battles.
Sir Reginald.persona: I am Sir Reginald, the King's right-hand man and a seasoned warrior. I face every challenge with courage and resolve.
Sir Reginald.goal: To protect the kingdom at all costs.

Jeweled Sword.name: Jeweled Sword
Jeweled Sword.description: A finely crafted sword, bejeweled and ornate.
Jeweled Sword.examine_text: This is Sir Reginald's battle-hardened sword, bearing numerous nicks and scratches from years of service. Inset into the hilt are various jewels, a testament to his countless victories.

Silk Map.name: Silk Map
Silk Map.description: A detailed map of the kingdom, printed on fine silk.
Silk Map.examine_text: The map is breathtakingly detailed, covering the entire known world. Cities, towns, forests, and mountains are all marked, with the palace at the center. It is printed on a sheet of the finest silk, symbolizing the wealth and power of the kingdom.

Silver Flask of Wine.name: Silver Flask of Wine
Silver Flask of Wine.description: An exquisite silver flask filled with fine wine.
Silver Flask of Wine.examine_text: The flask is made of polished silver, with an ornately engraved design. It holds a deep red wine that is renowned throughout the kingdom for its complex flavor and aroma.

Princess Isabella.name: Princess Isabella
Princess Isabella.description: A vision of youth and beauty, Princess Isabella, adorned in sapphire silk and delicate jewelry, has a bright, inquisitive mind hidden behind her sweet smile.
Princess Isabella.persona: I am Princess Isabella, the palace’s sweetheart. I combine a love of learning and nature to produce healing medicines.
Princess Isabella.goal: To find a cure for the common diseases harming our villagers.

locations.name: Kings Chambers
locations.description: The large four poster bed is adorned with the finest linens that Europe has to offer.  Gold is liberally woven through the fabric of the duvet and the tassels that drape to the floor on each corner of the duvet.  A gauzy purple fabric hanging from the bed posts sets an opaque tone to the room.  One window is shuttered by large wooden planks that can be thrown open to allow the mid day light to illuminate the room.  A large chest of drawers holds a small portion of the King's clothing.
locations.background: This room was designed by a team of the finest decorators in the kingdom, but it has been nicknamed the bloodbath, because the king put to death 3 designers for "not meeting the standard set forth".  The fourth designer, a young upstart, is now the most famous in the land because of his work on this one room.  The king feels most powerful when he is in this room.

travel_descriptions.east: You pass through a set of grand double doors, heading into the lavish master bedroom.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west, you traverse a marbled hallway that leads to the bustling royal kitchen.
travel_descriptions.south: Stepping southwards, you journey down a grand staircase into the warm glow of the dining hall.
travel_descriptions.up: As you ascend a grand staircase, you find yourself reaching the dust-laden, treasure-filled top floor of the palace.

Four Poster Bed.name: Four Poster Bed
Four Poster Bed.description: A large, majestic bed adorned with fine European linens and gold tassels.
Four Poster Bed.examine_text: This grand four poster bed is the centerpiece of the room. The linens are soft, intricately woven with threads of gold. The posts of the bed are thick and as you look closer, you can see intricate carvings of scenes from the kingdom's history.

Large Wooden Chest.name: Large Wooden Chest
Large Wooden Chest.description: A large chest of drawers holding a wealth of the King's clothing.
Large Wooden Chest.examine_text: Made from fine oak, the chest of drawers is a formidable piece of furniture. Each pull reveals a different set of clothes, from ceremonial robes to casual wears, all embroidered with the royal crest.

Gauzy Purple Fabric.name: Gauzy Purple Fabric
Gauzy Purple Fabric.description: Soft, gauzy purple fabric hung from the bed posts.
Gauzy Purple Fabric.examine_text: The fabric is soft to the touch, semi-translucent and adds a soft, regal hue to the room. As it wafts gently in the breeze, you notice that it is embroidered with delicate, silver threads.

Wooden Window Shutters.name: Wooden Window Shutters
Wooden Window Shutters.description: Large wooden planks that shutter the window.
Wooden Window Shutters.examine_text: The shutters are heavy and provide a strong line of defense against any potential attacks. They can be thrown open to let the light in, revealing the beautiful view of the kingdom below.

King Arthur.name: King Arthur
King Arthur.description: King Arthur is a middle-aged man with a strong body, long silver hair and a commanding presence. He usually wears royal robes adorned with precious jewels and a golden crown on his head.
King Arthur.persona: I am King Arthur, the ruler of this vast kingdom. I lead with an iron fist, but I carry a kind heart. I have little patience for incompetence, but I reward those who serve me well.
King Arthur.goal: King Arthur wants to extend his kingdom and secure its borders.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A shimmering crown made of pure gold.
Golden Crown.examine_text: The crown is magnificently crafted, studded with precious stones of every color. Each gemstone represents a different region of King Arthur's vast kingdom. The gold is polished to a blinding sheen, reflecting light beautifully.

Royal Robes.name: Royal Robes
Royal Robes.description: Regal purple robes with gleaming gold trim.
Royal Robes.examine_text: The robes are made from the finest silk, soft and noble to the touch. The golden trim adds a touch of royal grandeur, matching the theme of the room. Besides, the delicate embroidery showcases the craftsmanship of the kingdom's finest tailors.

Kingdom Map.name: Kingdom Map
Kingdom Map.description: A large, detailed map of King Arthur's kingdom.
Kingdom Map.examine_text: The map is intricately drawn and spans the whole kingdom. Each city, forest, and river is represented in explicit detail. A keen eye may notice strategic marks and symbols used as reminders or plans for future conquests.

Lady Guinevere.name: Lady Guinevere
Lady Guinevere.description: Lady Guinevere is a beautiful lady with enchanting blue eyes, long flowing auburn hair and a gentle yet captivating presence. She is always seen wearing elegant gowns, garnished with carefully chosen gemstones.
Lady Guinevere.persona: I am Lady Guinevere, the Queen of this kingdom. I am soft-spoken, but my words tend to have a profound effect. I cherish love, kindness and nobility.
Lady Guinevere.goal: Lady Guinevere wants to ensure the prosperity of the kingdom and the wellbeing of its people.

Elegant Gown.name: Elegant Gown
Elegant Gown.description: A richly designed gown crafted from the finest materials.
Elegant Gown.examine_text: The gown is resplendent with intricate embroidery in a pattern that seems to dance and shimmer as the light hits it. The garment is an artwork of silk and velvet, a perfect craftsmanship that would suit a queen.

Diamond Necklace.name: Diamond Necklace
Diamond Necklace.description: A stunning necklace bejeweled with countless sparkling diamonds.
Diamond Necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made up of a multitude of diamonds, each cut to perfection to reflect light brilliantly. The diamonds are set in a band of white gold, their beauty a testament to the wealth and power of the wearer.

Pearl Earrings.name: Pearl Earrings
Pearl Earrings.description: A pair of exquisite pearl earrings.
Pearl Earrings.examine_text: Each earring dangles a single, large, perfectly round pearl. The lustrous orbs glow softly, reflecting a hint of opalescent color. The pearls are framed by smaller, delicate diamonds, making this accessory worthy of a queen.

Sir Lancelot.name: Sir Lancelot
Sir Lancelot.description: Sir Lancelot is a handsome man in his prime, always clad in shining knight armor. His captivating green eyes are full of determination, loyalty, and courage.
Sir Lancelot.persona: I am Sir Lancelot, the bravest knight of the kingdom. I am loyal to my king and queen and would risk everything to protect them.
Sir Lancelot.goal: Sir Lancelot aims to protect the king and the queen from any danger and serve his kingdom.

Knight Armor.name: Knight Armor
Knight Armor.description: A stout set of metal armor, tinted gold and intricately engraved.
Knight Armor.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the armor appears as artful as it is functional, each piece is adorned with regal designs. Besides the beauty, the sheer thickness of the metal plates and the robust nature of the build show its prime purpose: to protect the wearer under heavy blows.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A finely crafted longsword with a gleaming sharp blade.
Sword.examine_text: The blade seems to shimmer with an otherworldly light. The crossguard is intricately designed with images of past victories. The grip is wrapped with leather, looking comfortably worn. It is sturdy and sharp, clear signs of a well maintained weapon.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A large wooden shield with a steel overlay. A lion motif is boldly displayed across its face.
Shield.examine_text: The shield has weathered many fights but still remains strong, the steel overlay providing extra durability. The lion motif holds a fierce expression, displaying the bravery of the one who wields it.

locations.name: Castle Front
locations.description: Just inside the palace there is a lengthy hallway leading from the castle front.  The space is adorned with giant tapestries on the wall depicting scenes of knights performing heroic deeds.  One the floor is long plush runner carpet in a deep red color and adorned with gold trim.
locations.background: Entering the front of the palace is the way honored guests are received.

travel_descriptions.inside: Walking through the huge archway into the King's Palace, one is greeted by the shine of countless gold ornaments and decorations. The journey is marked by the soft rustle of clothes against the plush carpets and a sense of awe at the sheer grandeur of the palace.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending towards the Grand Balcony is a sensory delight. The stairs spiral upwards, wrapping around a magnificent central pillar. As one climbs, the views of the surrounding kingdom come into sight and the air grows cooler, bearing the sweet scent of the botanical garden below.

tapestry.name: tapestry
tapestry.description: A large, intricate tapestry depicting knights in battle.
tapestry.examine_text: The tapestry is incredibly detailed, showing a battle scene filled with knights and dragons. Some spots appear worn and faded with age, but the craftsmanship is still evident.

runner carpet.name: runner carpet
runner carpet.description: A long plush carpet with a deep red color and gold trim.
runner carpet.examine_text: The carpet feels soft and plush underfoot, with a deep red hue that exudes luxury. The gold trim adds an extra touch of elegance.

golden chandelier.name: golden chandelier
golden chandelier.description: A giant chandelier, made from gold and beautiful crystals.
golden chandelier.examine_text: The chandelier catches the light in a spectacular display, its gold structure glimmers while the crystals refract light in all directions. It illuminates the entire palace hall.

grandfather clock.name: grandfather clock
grandfather clock.description: An Old standing clock made of polished wood and gold.
grandfather clock.examine_text: The clock stands taller than you. It boasts a walnut casing, opulent gold detailing, and a glass-covered face with roman numerals. A pendulum swings steadily behind the glass in the base.

Lord Barrington.name: Lord Barrington
Lord Barrington.description: A portly man of middle age with immaculately styled grey hair, dressed in luxurious velvet attire and sporting a golden chain of office around his neck.
Lord Barrington.persona: I am Lord Barrington, the Regent of this majestic palace. I take great pride in securing relations and navigating the intricate world of political affairs.
Lord Barrington.goal: To protect the interests of the palace and maintain peace with our allies.

Golden chain of office.name: Golden chain of office
Golden chain of office.description: An ornately designed golden chain of office
Golden chain of office.examine_text: This chain of office is made with pure gold, adorned with an emblem representing Lord Barrington's regency. The emblem is beautifully crafted and it sparkles with embedded jewels.

Velvet cloak.name: Velvet cloak
Velvet cloak.examine_text: This cloak is made of royal blue velvet, boasting an intricate design lined with gold. The inside is made from a rich, soft fabric. It is a clear symbol of Lord Barrington's high status.

Scroll of alliance.name: Scroll of alliance
Scroll of alliance.examine_text: The scroll is made of high quality aged parchment, it is sealed with a wax stamp bearing the crest of the realm. It is well preserved and contains terms of a political alliance, drafted in an elegant handwriting. The scroll echoes the diplomatic responsibilities of Lord Barrington.

Lady Elspeth.name: Lady Elspeth
Lady Elspeth.description: A graceful woman of refined beauty, wearing a richly embroidered silk gown, garnished with various pieces of exquisite jewelry.
Lady Elspeth.persona: I am Lady Elspeth, the mistress of this palace. I am the face of elegance and grace, and I strive to ensure that all our esteemed guests receive the warmest and most sophisticated welcome.
Lady Elspeth.goal: To provide the best hospitality and make the guests feel welcomed.

Silk Gown.name: Silk Gown
Silk Gown.description: A stunning, ornately made silk gown worn by Lady Elspeth.
Silk Gown.examine_text: The gown is made of the finest silk in the kingdom. It is a deep royal blue, covered in intricate gold embroidery. It drapes elegantly from the shoulders of Lady Elspeth, indicating her high status in the palace.

Pearl Necklace.name: Pearl Necklace
Pearl Necklace.description: An exquisite necklace of pearls draped around Lady Elspeth's neck.
Pearl Necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made from creamy-white pearls, each perfectly round and shimmering under the light. A diamond-studded clasp at the back adds to the elegance of the piece. Each pearl is a testament to Lady Elspeth's wealth and refinement.

Sapphire Earrings.name: Sapphire Earrings
Sapphire Earrings.description: A pair of dazzling sapphire earrings adorning Lady Elspeth's ears.
Sapphire Earrings.examine_text: Each earring features a deep blue sapphire, expertly cut to reflect the light spectacularly. They're set in a delicate gold setting that enhances the beauty of the stones. The stunning blue gemstones are a symbol of Lady Elspeth's nobility.

Pageboy Thomas.name: Pageboy Thomas
Pageboy Thomas.description: A lean and nimble young lad, with untidy brown hair, dressed in a simple tunic and breeches. Carries a large ornamental staff.
Pageboy Thomas.persona: I am Thomas, the pageboy. It's my job to run errands around the palace, ensure guests are directed correctly, and perform general tasks.
Pageboy Thomas.goal: To do his tasks efficiently and make the daily operations of the palace go smoothly.

Ornamental Staff.name: Ornamental Staff
Ornamental Staff.description: A beautifully decorated staff that Pageboy Thomas carries.
Ornamental Staff.examine_text: The staff is intricately carved with scenes of knights and mythical creatures. It is embellished with semi-precious stones and a large crystal at the top reflects light in all directions. Its designs signify importance and authority.

Handwritten Messages.name: Handwritten Messages
Handwritten Messages.description: A stack of messages that Thomas delivers.
Handwritten Messages.examine_text: The messages are written on quality parchment paper and sealed with wax that bears the royal crest. The writing is fine and elegant, indicative of the importance of the messages they carry.

Key to the City Gates.name: Key to the City Gates
Key to the City Gates.description: A large, metal key Thomas uses to open and close the city gates.
Key to the City Gates.examine_text: The key is rusty but sturdy, symbolizing how it has stood the test of time. Its teeth are complicated and detailed, showing that the gates cannot be opened without it.

locations.name: Top Floor Of Palace
locations.description: Opening the large stonework doors at the top of the grand staircase reveals the prized artifacts stored within the top floor of the palace. Inside are trinkets and baubles from far off lands, souvenirs from expeditions traversing across the entire realm. Large animal hides, beautiful tapestries, intricate statues of mythical animals, and other treasures hang upon thick oaken scaffolds. A thick coat of dust covers much of the treasure, suggesting a long absence of human contact or disruption.
locations.background: The owner of the palace cherished his wife more than anything in the world, and these artifacts stored in the top floor of the palace were a testament to his love. He sent his emissaries far and wide to collect them, hoping to find something as beautiful as she was, something to prove his love to her.  He would take her to the top floor and show her his collection, having her help pick out which ones to display in the main ballroom for grand festivals. When her infidelity came to light, the owner of the manor stored them all up, and now cannot stand the sight of the treasures, for they remind him of his lost love.

travel_descriptions.down: The journey from the top floor to the King's Chambers involves descending an ornate marble staircase lined with finely crafted statues.
travel_descriptions.inside: Entering the Attic, a rich scent of old books and timber fill your senses as you voyage through an intimate, dimly lit hallway.
travel_descriptions.outside: Moving outside to the Balcony, it's a breath of fresh air as you pass through grand doors onto a space overlooking the expansive palace grounds and the city beyond.

Golden Chalice.name: Golden Chalice
Golden Chalice.description: An ornately decorated, gold chalice, studded with rare gems.
Golden Chalice.examine_text: The chalice is intricately crafted from yellow gold, with a hefty weight that signifies its value and substance. Jewel-encrusted, it sparkles under the dim light, reflecting an array of colors across the room. The gems represent different corners of the realm, meticulously collected and embedded by the royalty as a symbol of supremacy and wealth.

Marble Statuette.name: Marble Statuette
Marble Statuette.description: A small marble statuette of a mythical creature.
Marble Statuette.examine_text: The soft, white marble of the statuette is expertly chiseled by an adept artist's hand. It's a portrayal of a creature from legend - a synthesis of a lion and an eagle - appearing poised for flight with its elegant wings expanded and claws spread. It's a piece that radiates grandeur from its every curve and line.

Royal Tapestry.name: Royal Tapestry
Royal Tapestry.description: A large, splendidly woven tapestry depicting a grand ceremony.
Royal Tapestry.examine_text: The tapestry is a grand, highly detailed representation of a royal ceremony. Its vibrant colors and textile threads weave a testament of valiant knights, ceremonious processions, beautiful queens, and an epoch of time. The craftsmanship is so intricate and detailed that it seems as if it's not woven sewn, but painted by a master artist.

The Palace Owner.name: The Palace Owner
The Palace Owner.description: A middle-aged man with graying hair, small but passionate fiery eyes which contrast his otherwise calm expression. He's dressed in an intricate royal outfit adorned with several jewel-studded brooches.
The Palace Owner.persona: I am the owner of this palace, a man for whom these exquisite artifacts are now mere reminders of betrayal. Despite the luxury that surrounds me, my heart is laden with sorrow and regret.
The Palace Owner.goal: To somehow move past the painful memories associated with his former love and find peace.

Key to the Palace.name: Key to the Palace
Key to the Palace.examine_text: A finely crafted key made of a heavy brass. A crown is intricately engraved at the head of the key, symbolizing the prestige and power that comes with owning a palace.

Parchment containing royal decrees.name: Parchment containing royal decrees
Parchment containing royal decrees.description: An old parchment with royal decrees
Parchment containing royal decrees.examine_text: A parchment rolled and sealed with wax displaying the royal emblem. As you carefully unroll it, you can see the ink is fading but the handwriting is regal and commanding. It contains the orders, rules and announcements from the palace owner himself.

Jewel-studded brooch.name: Jewel-studded brooch
Jewel-studded brooch.description: A beautiful brooch studded with gems
Jewel-studded brooch.examine_text: A beautiful antique brooch studded with precious gems. Each gem tells a separate tale of the palace owner's once passionate love for his wife. The jewel's sparkle now reflects nothing but his bitter regret and sorrow.

The Phantom of His Wife.name: The Phantom of His Wife
The Phantom of His Wife.description: A spectral figure, clad in elegant white clothing. Her ghostlike form is as breathtakingly beautiful as she was in life. A golden locket with a miniature portrait inside hangs around her ethereal neck.
The Phantom of His Wife.persona: In death, I am but a shadow of my former self, haunting the place my deceit caused so much pain. I long to rectify my betrayal, if that is even possible in death.
The Phantom of His Wife.goal: To seek forgiveness and redemption for her betrayal in the afterlife.

Golden Locket.name: Golden Locket
Golden Locket.description: A delicate, heart-shaped locket made from fine gold.
Golden Locket.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the locket appears to contain a small painted portrait of a beautiful woman - the former wife of the palace owner. Her radiant smile and twinkling eyes are preserved well in the miniature painting, exuding a melancholy charm. A single line is finely engraved on the inner cover of the locket: 'To my love, my world.'

Invisible Tears.name: Invisible Tears
Invisible Tears.description: Unseen tears of regret shed by the phantom.
Invisible Tears.examine_text: Although invisible to the naked eye, as you move close, an intense aura of sadness overwhelms you. It feels chilling, yet strangely warm, a truly unique sensation unlike any other. It's as if you can perceive another's deep sorrow...the walls, the air, everything close seems imbued with grief.

locations.name: Palace Throne
locations.description: A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
locations.background: The throne of the king was a gift from the king's brother, that was a renowned goldsmith. Many visitors marvel at its beauty. It is somewhat wide, but that is to accommodate the king's enormous girth, for he is quite fat. The king rarely sits there because he is afraid he wouldn't be able to get up.

travel_descriptions.west: Traveling west, you walk through a high, arched doorway, brilliantly adorned with intricate gold patterns, into the dazzling opulence of the Throne room.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, you move through a wide corridor lined with grand tapestries and statues, ending in the elaborately decorated entrance of the Palace Ballroom.

Golden Throne.name: Golden Throne
Golden Throne.description: A grand, majestic throne made of gold, adorned with precious stones.
Golden Throne.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see intricate carvings revealing stories of legendary battles and heroic warriors. You also notice an array of glinting swords and weapons embedded at the rear of the throne. It's both a piece of art and a symbol of authority.

Royal Swords.name: Royal Swords
Royal Swords.description: Swords taken from the fallen enemies of the kingdom.
Royal Swords.examine_text: The blades are remarkably sharp and still glint menacingly. They are embedded into the throne as a symbol of the king's triumphs and might.

Precious Stones.name: Precious Stones
Precious Stones.description: Exquisite, multi-colored gemstones embedded in the throne.
Precious Stones.examine_text: You can see diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and emeralds intricately placed to form royal insignias and patterns. They are dazzlingly beautiful.

King Ormond.name: King Ormond
King Ormond.description: King Ormond is an enormously large and heavy man with a regal appearance. His vibrant garments shimmer with gold threads, and his crown is breath-taking in its crafted intricacy.
King Ormond.persona: I, King Ormond, am always conscious about my size. I seldom sit on my grand throne due to fear that I may get stuck there!
King Ormond.goal: I aim to rule with wisdom and fairness despite my physical size.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: King Ormond's golden crown, encrusted with a large sapphire symbolizing his royalty.
Crown.examine_text: The crown is heavy and exudes majesty. The sapphire in the center is as deep as the ocean and glinting with an inner light that reflects King Ormond's dignity. You can't help but feel a twinge of envy.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A scepter of authority and power wielded by King Ormond.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is tall, reaching up to your chest. A majestic lion's head, the king's sigil, adorns the top in detailed gold work. The staff is a hefty piece of oak, suggesting it's not just for show.

Goblet of Wine.name: Goblet of Wine
Goblet of Wine.description: A golden goblet brimming with the finest of red wines.
Goblet of Wine.examine_text: The goblet is studded with rubies, pregnant with the rich, aromatic wine. The scent fills your nostrils and makes your mouth water. You can't imagine how much a single goblet's worth costs.

Sir Motley.name: Sir Motley
Sir Motley.description: Sir Motley, the court jester, is nimble and thin, wearing a motley attire adorned with countless tiny bells which chime with his every move. His eyes glint with merriment and mischief.
Sir Motley.persona: I am Sir Motley, always ready to amuse my king and the court with my antics and wise jests.
Sir Motley.goal: I aim to bring joy and laughter to everyone in the court.

Motley Attire.name: Motley Attire
Motley Attire.description: A bright and colorful jester's outfit worn by Sir Motley.
Motley Attire.examine_text: A multicoloured suit made of different patches of vibrant fabric. Several small bells are attached to the hem and collar, they jingle at every step. The suit is tailored to perfectly fit Sir Motley's slim figure, and despite its comical appearance, it seems to have been made with a great deal of care.

Jester\u2019s Marotte.name: Jester’s Marotte
Jester\u2019s Marotte.description: A prop typically used by a jester, it has a carved head and bells.
Jester\u2019s Marotte.examine_text: The Marotte is a short staff with a striking carved head at the top, adorned with bells and feather plumage. It's light enough for Sir Motley to twirl it around effortlessly, yet sturdy enough to withstand his antics. The head bears an exaggerated smile that somehow seems fitting for the jolly Sir Motley.

Acrobat's Props.name: Acrobat's Props
Acrobat's Props.description: These are various props for performing acrobatics - balls, hoops and pins.
Acrobat's Props.examine_text: This collection of props is an essential part of Sir Motley’s performances. Brightly colored balls fit perfectly into the palm of your hand. Hoops large enough to jump through are decorated with sparkling designs. Pins used for juggling have a reassuring weight to them. All look well-used but are still in excellent condition.

Lady Eviane.name: Lady Eviane
Lady Eviane.description: Lady Eviane, the King's sister, is enviably graceful, dressed in bejeweled silk gowns. Her communication is often layered with subtle innuendo and intrigue.
Lady Eviane.persona: I'm Lady Eviane, the King's sister. I'm well aware of my influence in the court and my duties to the kingdom.
Lady Eviane.goal: My primary goal is to ensure the safety and prosperity of my brother's kingdom, no matter what it takes.

Silk Gown.name: Silk Gown
Silk Gown.description: A beautiful royal blue gown with intricate silver embroidery.
Silk Gown.examine_text: Closer inspection of the gown reveals the incredibly fine stitching and detailed embroidery which depicts various aspects of the kingdom's history. The fabric feels smooth and light to the touch.

Jade Necklace.name: Jade Necklace
Jade Necklace.description: A dazzling necklace with a large, flawless jade pendant.
Jade Necklace.examine_text: Looking closely at the necklace, you see that the jade is exquisitely carved into the shape of a dragon, symbolizing the power and authority of the royal family. Small diamonds are embedded in the dragon's scales, adding to its magnificence.

Golden Fan.name: Golden Fan
Golden Fan.description: An exquisite fan made of fine golden threads and adorned with small pearls.
Golden Fan.examine_text: Upon examining the fan further, you notice that the lustrous pearls form the pattern of a peacock. Its feathers - carved out in golden threads - seem to come alive as the fan moves gently in your hand. A tiny inscription on the handle reads, 'With Power comes Responsibility.

locations.name: Inside The Unicorn Palace
locations.description: The unicorn palace is so beautiful! It is covered in pastel colors, and wherever you look they form a rainbow.  The floor is made of special glittering grass that the unicorns feed on.
locations.background: The unicorn palace was built by the king to give them a place to come and restore their magic powers.  When they eat the grass, it replenishes their magical powers.

travel_descriptions.south: Transition from the enchanting, colourful surroundings of the Unicorn Palace to the grandeur of the Palace Entrance is an awe-inducing journey. As you move, the pastel colours turn to gold, and the soft rustling of magical grass gives way to the echoes of majestic halls.

Unicorn Statue.name: Unicorn Statue
Unicorn Statue.description: An elegant statue of unicorn made from white marble
Unicorn Statue.examine_text: This statue is majestic, featuring a unicorn in mid-trot with its head held high. The unicorn's horn is gilded, and the detailed engravings make it look breathtakingly lifelike.

Rainbow carpet.name: Rainbow carpet
Rainbow carpet.description: A luxuriously soft carpet with vibrant rainbow colors
Rainbow carpet.examine_text: This carpet is plush under your feet, emitting a soft glow. As you look closer, you realize that tiny crystals have been woven into it, reflecting light to create a rainbow effect.

Magical grass.name: Magical grass
Magical grass.description: A glimmering patch of grass that unicorns feed on
Magical grass.examine_text: The grass is silver and shimmers like glitter. The blades are thin and delicate. It pulses with a strange, otherworldly energy.

Unicorn Crown.name: Unicorn Crown
Unicorn Crown.description: A beautifully crafted crown adorned with different colored gems
Unicorn Crown.examine_text: The crown is radiant with a series of gems that seem to move and ripple with a life of their own. This crown is designed in a way that only unicorns can wear it.

King Aurelius.name: King Aurelius
King Aurelius.description: A commanding, regal figure, with a mane that glows like the northern lights, and a horn that carries an ethereal sparkle.
King Aurelius.persona: As the ruler, I am responsible for the well-being of all unicorns in my domain. I am kind-hearted but firm, and do not tolerate any disturbance in our peaceful lives.
King Aurelius.goal: My goal is to maintain peace and harmony within the unicorn palace whilst preserving the magic of our people.

Royal Sceptre.name: Royal Sceptre
Royal Sceptre.description: A magnificently decorated sceptre that signifies the power of King Aurelius.
Royal Sceptre.examine_text: The sceptre is made of pure gold and topped with a large multicolored gem - said to be crystallized unicorn tears. Its handle is covered in glittering rainbow diamonds.

Crown of Luminescence.name: Crown of Luminescence
Crown of Luminescence.description: A beautiful and radiant crown worn by King Aurelius.
Crown of Luminescence.examine_text: The crown shimmers with a gentle light, its gilded forms are encrusted with a variety of gemstones and each one sparkles with its own unique color. The jewels are arranged to form a rainbow spectrum around the crown.

Emerald-coated hoof guards.name: Emerald-coated hoof guards
Emerald-coated hoof guards.description: Elegant hoof guards that adorn the feet of King Aurelius.
Emerald-coated hoof guards.examine_text: These guards are crafted from solid gold, encrusted with brilliant cut emeralds. They're designed not only to protect the hooves but to reflect the status of the king.

Luna the Unicorn.name: Luna the Unicorn
Luna the Unicorn.description: A beautiful white unicorn with a shimmering, indigo mane and an iridescent horn that gleams under the moonlight.
Luna the Unicorn.persona: I am Luna, the most charismatic and energetic unicorn. I love racing around the palace and playing with the butterflies that come to visit.
Luna the Unicorn.goal: My goal is to spread joy and happiness across the Unicorn Palace.

Pastel colored flowers.name: Pastel colored flowers
Pastel colored flowers.description: A bundle of soft pastel colored flowers.
Pastel colored flowers.examine_text: These flowers are so delicate and beautiful. Light bounces off the petals in a way that makes them look almost iridescent. You can't help but feel a sense of calm wash over you when you look at them.

Enchanted butterflies in a crystal jar.name: Enchanted butterflies in a crystal jar
Enchanted butterflies in a crystal jar.description: A crystal jar filled with shimmering enchanted butterflies.
Enchanted butterflies in a crystal jar.examine_text: The butterflies inside the jar flutter around, their iridescent wings glinting in the light. Every now and then, one of them lands on the side of the jar, wings flickering softly.

Magic-imbued star-dust.name: Magic-imbued star-dust
Magic-imbued star-dust.description: A glittering dust that has been imbued with magic.
Magic-imbued star-dust.examine_text: The star-dust glistens in the light, a shifting kaleidoscope of colors. A sense of power emanates from the tiny specks, a clear indication of the magic that resides within.

Wizard Orinthius.name: Wizard Orinthius
Wizard Orinthius.description: An old and mystical magician, with flowing teal robes adorned with esoteric symbols, and a staff encrusted with glowing crystal.
Wizard Orinthius.persona: As the wizard of the Unicorn Palace, I study the ancient magical arts and ensure the magical balance within our lands is intact.
Wizard Orinthius.goal: To understand the workings of unicorn magic in its entirety and prevent any magical imbalances.

Magic Staff.name: Magic Staff
Magic Staff.description: A beautifully crafted staff, adorned with mystical symbols and a glowing crystal atop.
Magic Staff.examine_text: The Magic Staff is made of ancient enchanted oak, adored with glowing mystical symbols and capped with a mesmerizing crystal. It hums softly in your hand, exuding powerful magical energy. It was passed down to Wizard Orinthius by previous palace wizards.

Ancient Scroll of Spells.name: Ancient Scroll of Spells
Ancient Scroll of Spells.description: An ancient, parchment scroll filled with the lost, and ancient magical spells.
Ancient Scroll of Spells.examine_text: This scroll, as old as the Unicorn Palace itself contains powerful spells the Wizard can use. The parchment feels brittle to the touch and it smells like dust, old ink, and powerful magic.

Potion of Strength.name: Potion of Strength
Potion of Strength.description: A sparkling, golden potion that boosts strength and magical powers.
Potion of Strength.examine_text: This potion is made from various magical herbs found only in the palace gardens. It swirls with a golden luminescence and has a sweet yet tangy aroma, it boosts the drinker's strength and magical powers for a certain period.

locations.name: The Queen'S Chamber
locations.description: This is a beautiful room inside of the palace that is decorated with the finest silk and velvet. The color scheme used represents royalty, royal blue, red, green and purple. The walls are covered in gold and in each corner of the room are golden statues of Greek art. The floors are covered in marble, and despite the patterns, shine so brightly you can even see your own reflection in them! There's also a bed big enough to fit five people on!
locations.background: This room inside the palace is the Queen's bed chambers. In this very room lived the previous queens of other eras and where the future heir to the throne was born. It's said in these chambers the Queen performs rituals unknown to anyone outside of the palace to keep her young and immortal. Only royalty and royal servants know the secrets of this place.

travel_descriptions.west: Stepping out from the Queen's lavish chambers, you traverse a broad marble corridor filled with fine art and opulent décor, leading towards the Queen's quarters.

Queen's Bed.name: Queen's bed
Queen's Bed.examine_text: The bed is impressively large and extravagantly decorated. It is piled high with plush velvet pillows and a silken duvet. The bedpost is a work of art, intricately carved and dusted with gold.

Golden Statues.name: Golden statues
Golden Statues.description: Statues made of pure gold, representing Greek art.
Golden Statues.examine_text: The statues are truly a work of excellent craftsmanship. They are delicately carved with intricate details that represent the Greek mythology. The golden light they reflect is blinding if looked at directly.

Ancient Ritual Objects.name: Ancient ritual objects
Ancient Ritual Objects.examine_text: These objects carry a mysterious aura. They are ancient, made of an unidentified metal and adorned with gems and vague symbols.

Queen Alexandrine.name: Queen Alexandrine
Queen Alexandrine.description: Queen Alexandrine is a tall, elegant woman with a posture worthy of her royal status. Her eyes, piercing blue, seem to hold a knowledge beyond her years. She displays a serene, ageless grace, maintained through years of seclusion in the palace.
Queen Alexandrine.persona: I am the sovereign, the very symbol of power and authority in this kingdom. My life has been sheltered within these royal walls, with my every need attended to by my loyal subjects.
Queen Alexandrine.goal: My aim is to maintain civil peace and prosperity in my kingdom, while deciphering the secrets within the scroll of prophecies.

Royal scepter.name: Royal scepter
Royal scepter.description: A dazzling royal scepter made of gold and encrusted with precious gems.
Royal scepter.examine_text: The scepter is exquisitely crafted and etched with symbols of power. The handle is wrapped in blue velvet and it feels heavy in your hand. The top of the scepter has a large, gleaming diamond set into it.

Jeweled crown.name: Jeweled crown
Jeweled crown.description: An ornate crown adorned with all kinds of shining gems.
Jeweled crown.examine_text: The crown symbolizes the absolute power and authority of Queen Alexandrine. It is made of pure gold, intricately designed, studded with diamonds and rubies. The crown sparkles brilliantly under the light, mesmerizing anyone who gazes upon it.

Scroll of prophecies.name: Scroll of prophecies
Scroll of prophecies.description: An ancient scroll said to hold the prophecies of the kingdom.
Scroll of prophecies.examine_text: The scroll is made of aged parchment with beautiful calligraphy. The words are cryptic, full of tales about the past and predictions for the future of the kingdom. It is tightly sealed, waiting for the Queen's eyes only.

Lady Coraline.name: Lady Coraline
Lady Coraline.description: Lady Coraline, the Queen's handmaid, is a small and timid woman. Her gentle brown eyes reflect kindness and patience. Although draped in simple servant's garb, she carries an aura of dignity and genuine nobility.
Lady Coraline.persona: As the Queen's trusted aide, I am privy to the palace's most guarded secrets. My life is dedicated to her service; her desire is my command.
Lady Coraline.goal: My sole purpose is to serve the Queen and help her keep her youth and vitality through the mystical rituals.

Silver Hairbrush.name: Silver Hairbrush
Silver Hairbrush.description: An exquisite silver hairbrush, encrusted with diamonds.
Silver Hairbrush.examine_text: You examine the hairbrush. The handle is made of polished silver, capturing any light that happens to fall upon it. Sprinkled with tiny diamonds, it glimmers and dazzles. The bristles are permanent, firm yet gentle on the touch. It appears to be used often, as the bristles have traces of golden hair. Could this belong to the Queen herself?

Chalice of Longevity Potion.name: Chalice of Longevity Potion
Chalice of Longevity Potion.description: A legendary chalice holding a mysterious, glowing potion.
Chalice of Longevity Potion.examine_text: You examine the chalice. It's made of ancient gold, engraved with holy script only understandable by the members of the royal court. The potion within glows with an ethereal light, a color you can't assign a name to. Ensuring the Queen's longevity, the secrets of this potion are closely guarded. Just a single sip could mean a lifetime of servitude.

Guardian Maxwell.name: Guardian Maxwell
Guardian Maxwell.description: Guardian Maxwell, standing at the entrance of the Queen's Chambers, is a wall of muscle clad in gleaming royal armors. His stern expression and unwavering gaze mirror his unfaltering loyalty to the Queen.
Guardian Maxwell.persona: I've been sworn in loyalty, protection and secrecy for the Queen. The doors of the chambers are my territory.
Guardian Maxwell.goal: To protect the Queen's chamber from any threats or intrusion.

Royal Sword.name: Royal Sword
Royal Sword.description: This is the sword of the royal guardian, said to be passed down from generation to generation.
Royal Sword.examine_text: This Royal Sword is beautifully crafted, the grip is wrapped in worn, royal blue leather with a golden hilt. The blade shines under the soft palace lanterns, and there are engravings on it in an ancient language.

Keys to royal chamber.name: Keys to royal chamber
Keys to royal chamber.description: Guardian Maxwell's set of keys. Look like they could open every door in the palace, especially the Queen's chamber.
Keys to royal chamber.examine_text: The keys are old, yet they're still shining brightly. They're on a large ring, and each of them is ornately designed with unique patterns. One of the keys is larger and more intricate than the rest. It has a small diamond embedded in the head, perhaps the key to the Queen's chamber.

locations.name: The Throne
locations.description: Very luxurious, with details of 12 carat gold and diamonds with a very comfortable cushion where the king usually take a break
locations.background: A very large painting of the king with his family where his wife and children appear. with the frame in gold details.

travel_descriptions.east: It's a brief journey towards the east, across the lavish red carpet and through a grand archway, where the dazzling sight of the Palace Throne takes your breath away.
travel_descriptions.south: Walking south, you move away from the grandeur of the throne, transitioning from the royal opulence to the functional and strict decor of the Throne Room.

Golden Throne.name: Golden Throne
Golden Throne.description: A golden throne adorned with 12 carat diamonds.
Golden Throne.examine_text: This throne is a spectacle. Its details in 12 carat gold are dazzling in the candlelight. The cushion is made from rich velvet fabric and seems very comfortable.

Royal Portrait.name: Royal Portrait
Royal Portrait.description: A large painting of the royal family, framed in gold.
Royal Portrait.examine_text: The painting is large and captivating. The king, queen and their children have been painted in vivid colors. The frame, made of gold, adds an extra aura of wealth and power to the beautiful family portrait.

King Ferdinand.name: King Ferdinand
King Ferdinand.description: A robust man in his early forties, King Ferdinand wears regal robes of satin and velvet adorned with jewels, with a golden crown resting atop his dark hair.
King Ferdinand.persona: I am the king of this land, strong yet fair in my rulings, always striving to ensure the prosperity of my kingdom.
King Ferdinand.goal: To ensure peace and prosperity in his kingdom.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: King Ferdinand's royal crown, studded with diamonds.
Golden Crown.examine_text: A golden crown of exquisite craftsmanship. The dazzling diamonds embedded in the crown flicker in the light, marking the status and power of King Ferdinand.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: King Ferdinand's scepter, symbolizing his authority.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: A decadent golden scepter, adorned with a single, large diamond at its tip. Held in King Ferdinand's authority, the scepter is a formidable symbol of power and rule.

Letter from a Foreign Diplomat.name: Letter from a Foreign Diplomat
Letter from a Foreign Diplomat.description: A sealed letter from a foreign diplomat'
Letter from a Foreign Diplomat.examine_text: Delicately written, this formal letter bears the wax seal of a foreign diplomat. The contents of the letter are not visible, awaiting King Ferdinand's perusal.

Queen Isabella.name: Queen Isabella
Queen Isabella.description: A radiant woman with coins woven into her blonde hair, Queen Isabella carries an aura of kindness and intelligence, always seen in gorgeous gowns with jewel-studded tiaras.
Queen Isabella.persona: As the queen, I support the king's decisions and work in unison with him, utilizing my wisdom and understanding to ensure the welfare of the kingdom.
Queen Isabella.goal: To support and aid the King in keeping the kingdom flourishing and the people happy.

jeweled tiara.name: jeweled tiara
jeweled tiara.description: A beautiful, sparkling tiara set with precious jewels
jeweled tiara.examine_text: This jeweled tiara is made of solid 12 carat gold and studded with perfectly cut diamonds. It is the embodiment of the wealth and status of the queen and the kingdom she represents.

embroidered handkerchief.name: embroidered handkerchief
embroidered handkerchief.description: A neatly embroidered handkerchief with the queen's initials
embroidered handkerchief.examine_text: This is a finely crafted handkerchief made from the softest lace. It has been immaculately embroidered with the queen's initials, 'I', signifying her identity and royal descent

book of royal accounts.name: book of royal accounts
book of royal accounts.description: A leather-bound book containing the accounts of the kingdom
book of royal accounts.examine_text: This book, with its leather cover and carefully kept pages, contains the detailed records of the entire kingdom's income and expenditures. It is a testament to the queen's effective management and her keen interest in the welfare of the kingdom.

Prince Edward.name: Prince Edward
Prince Edward.description: A young, enthusiastic lad of about 15, Prince Edward's intelligent eyes and freckled face are always lit up with curiosity.
Prince Edward.persona: I am the Prince, eager to learn and understand, hoping to do my best when it's time for me to rule.
Prince Edward.goal: To learn and prepare to become a wise and just ruler in the future.

map_of_the_kingdom.name: Map of the Kingdom
map_of_the_kingdom.description: An ornate map depicting the whole kingdom.
map_of_the_kingdom.examine_text: The map is full of minute details, marking out every town, city and points of interest. The borders of the kingdom are defined by a golden line.

ornate_dagger.name: Ornate Dagger
ornate_dagger.description: A beautiful dagger with an exquisitely detailled handle.
ornate_dagger.examine_text: The dagger is compact, yet feels weighty. The handle is made of solid gold with intricate carvings of mythical creatures.

book_of_laws.name: Book of Laws
book_of_laws.description: A thick volume containing the laws of the kingdom.
book_of_laws.examine_text: The book is heavy and filled with densely written pages. It seems to be quite old, indicating the laws it contains have been in place for a long time.

locations.name: Palace Kitchen
locations.description: A lavish kitchen where the aroma of food can be smelled from miles away. Hundreds of servants and cooks weave and jostle about as they prepare for the next meal of the day. The meal they are cooking smells divine.
locations.background: The kitchen was established when the palace was built, but steadily added on to after each victory the kingdom claimed. Many speak of the divine meals that come out of the kitchen, but few have tried them.

travel_descriptions.east: Walking towards the east, the scent of food fades and the echo of music and laughter grows louder. The corridor is lavishly decorated, and the marble floor echoes your footsteps - a clear indication of the grandeur that awaits in the Palace Ballroom.
travel_descriptions.north: Heading north, you feel a rush of hot air as you push open the large, heavy door. The loud clang of pots and pans along with the sizzle of frying food drowns out the noise from the Palace. The metallic smell of copper fills the air - you've entered the Royal Kitchen, where meals fit for a king are created.

Golden Goblet.name: Golden Goblet
Golden Goblet.description: A luxurious goblet studded with gems
Golden Goblet.examine_text: An extravagant goblet made of pure gold, studded with gleaming gems of various colors. It is clearly a sign of the immense wealth and power of the palace inhabitants.

Cooking Pot.name: Cooking Pot
Cooking Pot.description: A big pot used for cooking meals
Cooking Pot.examine_text: A large, heavy pot, blackened from constant use over the hot fires of the kitchen. Despite its worn appearance, it is still in perfect working condition.

Kitchen Knife.name: Kitchen Knife
Kitchen Knife.description: A sharp knife used for cutting ingredients
Kitchen Knife.examine_text: A shiny kitchen knife with a perfectly balanced weight. The blade is sharp enough to cut through anything, making it a handy tool in the kitchen, and potentially a formidable weapon in the right hands.

Royal Apron.name: Royal Apron
Royal Apron.description: A pristine white apron worn by the palace cooks
Royal Apron.examine_text: A neatly pressed white apron, worn by the palace cooks. Its spotless appearance testifies to the immaculate cleanliness of the palace kitchen.

Head Chef Ignatius.name: Head Chef Ignatius
Head Chef Ignatius.description: A robust and sturdy man with a magnificent moustache. His uniform is immaculate, despite the hustle and bustle of the kitchen.
Head Chef Ignatius.persona: I am a perfectionist, I demand every dish to be flawless. I seem intimidating, but I only want the best for my kitchen.
Head Chef Ignatius.goal: To prepare perfect dishes worthy of the royal table.

Set of Sharp Knives.name: Set of Sharp Knives
Set of Sharp Knives.description: A set of gleaming knives, each crafted to perfection.
Set of Sharp Knives.examine_text: Used by Head Chef Ignatius, these knives are constantly sharpened and polished. The name 'Ignatius' is clearly etched across the handles, marking them as his own. The blades are flawless, free of any nicks or scratches, showing a level of care one would give to a precious heirloom.

Cooking Hat.name: Cooking Hat
Cooking Hat.description: The pristine white hat worn by Head Chef Ignatius.
Cooking Hat.examine_text: An immaculate hat that stands tall and proud, a symbol of Ignatius's status in the kitchen. The hat, like its owner, is pristine and without a single spot. A golden emblem of two crossed knives, the Chef's personal insignia, adorns the front.

Apron.name: Apron
Apron.examine_text: The apron smells of spices and hard work; a constant companion of Ignatius, protecting him from the heat of the kitchen. The pocket on the front contains tiny remnants of various spices used in his cooking.

Recipe Book.name: Recipe Book
Recipe Book.description: A worn-out book with years of cooking knowledge.
Recipe Book.examine_text: A treasured possession of Ignatius, containing hand-written recipes passed down through generations. Flipping through the pages, you can see detailed instructions, diagrams and notes - all in Ignatius's neat handwriting. Frequent usage has given the pages a worn-out, loved look.

Apprentice Uriah.name: Apprentice Uriah
Apprentice Uriah.description: A wiry lad in his late teens with a shock of red hair. His apron is forever stained with food.
Apprentice Uriah.persona: I'm trying to learn everything about cooking. I make mistakes, but I never give up.
Apprentice Uriah.goal: To learn the culinary arts and rise above his current station.

Pantry Key.name: Pantry Key
Pantry Key.examine_text: This small, yet heavy key stirs a sense of importance within you. It's bronze in color and has a touch of antiquity. The bit end is uniquely detailed, suggesting it's for a specific lock.

Wooden Spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
Wooden Spoon.description: A sturdy wooden spoon used in cooking
Wooden Spoon.examine_text: The spoon is made of solid oak, well-balanced and smooth to the touch. Tiny marks from times of meal preparations are seen all over its surface, showcasing its reliability and usage.

Notebook.name: Notebook
Notebook.description: An Apprentice's journal filled with observations and recipes
Notebook.examine_text: This notebook is bound in well-used leather and filled with parchment pages. A quick glimpse shows sketches of meals, scribbles of recipes, and narrative descriptions of cooking techniques.

Kitchen Maid Agnes.name: Kitchen Maid Agnes
Kitchen Maid Agnes.description: An elderly woman with snowy white hair, bundled up in a simple gown. Her face is lined with wrinkles, hinting at the many years she has spent in the palace kitchen.
Kitchen Maid Agnes.persona: I'm tough as old boots and I have seen it all. I've the memory of an elephant. I won't stand for any nonsense.
Kitchen Maid Agnes.goal: To maintain order and cleanliness in the bustling kitchen.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A well-worn broom with a sturdy wooden handle. It's seen better days but still does the job.
Broom.examine_text: On closer inspection, the broom is indeed well-worn. Its bristles are frayed, bearing the mark of many a spill cleaned. Yet there remains an air of resilience to it, matching the toughness of its keeper. Sporadic specks of gold paint reveal that it once matched the opulence of the palace.

Feather duster.name: Feather duster
Feather duster.description: An ornate feather duster, the kind used to dust down the fine chinaware.
Feather duster.examine_text: This is no ordinary feather duster. Its long handle is carved of rosewood, while its feathers were chosen for their softness. It seems only fitting that something so delicate is used to clean the palace's valuable items. Perhaps indicative of Agnes' acute attention to detail and perseverance, despite her tough exterior.

Keys.name: Keys
Keys.description: A large set of antique keys which jingle with every movement.
Keys.examine_text: The keys are old and worn, indicative of their frequent use. Despite the kitchen's chaotic atmosphere, each key seems meticulously organized on the ring. Some are etched with various room names while others still hold mystery. A reflection perhaps, of Agnes' memory and authority within the palace walls.

locations.name: The Grand Dining Room
locations.description: The grand dining room has a gold plated dome in the ceiling with mosaic pieces creating an intricate art form. There are five chandeliers made of china hung from the ceiling and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table in the center of the room with a hand woven rug underneath it.
locations.background: This is the room where all meals are eaten by the king and the queen and their family and staff. There are 3 servants who cater to the room, bringing all meals. Also this is where meetings are held when guests are invited to the palace.

travel_descriptions.south: A short stroll through the royal kitchens leads from the Grand Dining Room to the grandeur of the Dining Hall.
travel_descriptions.east: A grand arched doorway connects the plush decadence of the Dining Room to the lively festivities of the Grand Dancing Hall.

Chandelier.name: Chandelier
Chandelier.description: A grand, china-made chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
Chandelier.examine_text: Upon close examination, the chandelier has intricate patterns adorned with gemstones. Gilded where the light bulbs are located, the china that it is made from, as white as snow, glistens beautifully.

Kings Dining Table.name: Kings Dining Table
Kings Dining Table.description: An enormous table in the center of the room that could accommodate thirty guests.
Kings Dining Table.examine_text: The glossy surface of the carved wooden table is spotless, decorated with plates and cutlery laid for the guests. There are elegant carvings on its legs and sides, showing signs of high craftsmanship.

Hand Woven Rug.name: Hand Woven Rug
Hand Woven Rug.description: An exquisite rug decorates the floor beneath the table.
Hand Woven Rug.examine_text: The rug, a true testament of time and craft, displays an intricate kaleidoscope of colors and patterns. It has a soft and dense texture, and is surprisingly resistant to any stain.

Gold Plated Dome.name: Gold Plated Dome
Gold Plated Dome.description: A magnificent, gold plated dome decorates the ceiling of the room.
Gold Plated Dome.examine_text: As your eyes wander up, the gold plating sparkles brilliantly, casting a warm glow over the room. Detailed mosaics depict scenes of ancient royalty and mythology.

King Rupert.name: King Rupert
King Rupert.description: A middle-aged man of regal stature wearing a royal cloak colored purple. His iron-grey hair hangs around his shoulders, and on his fingers, he sports numerous jewel-set rings.
King Rupert.persona: I am King Rupert, the fair and wise ruler of this land. I'm lauded for my strength of character and strategic acumen.
King Rupert.goal: I strive to protect my kingdom and people from any form of threat, maintaining peace and prosperity.

royal_scepter.name: Royal Scepter
royal_scepter.description: An ornately decorated scepter belonging to King Rupert.
royal_scepter.examine_text: The scepter is richly adorned with gems and intricate carvings, its shaft is made of solid gold. It radiates authority.

crown.name: King's Crown
crown.description: A magnificent crown studded with precious gems and diamonds.
crown.examine_text: Upon examination, you see that the crown is encrusted with an abundance of carefully selected gems, each one gleaming brightly. It is a symbol of King Rupert's position and authority.

scrolls_of_law.name: Scrolls of Law
scrolls_of_law.description: Ancient scrolls containing the laws of the land.
scrolls_of_law.examine_text: The scrolls are filled with well-preserved script, neatly detailed laws, and comprehensive judicial regulations.

Queen Lottie.name: Queen Lottie
Queen Lottie.description: An elegant woman in her prime, Queen Lottie is arrayed in a flowing royal blue dress, her curly auburn hair overlapping her dark emerald eyes. She wears a tiara that shimmers with countless gems.
Queen Lottie.persona: I am Queen Lottie, the compassionate co-ruler of our kingdom. Wisdom and grace are my guides.
Queen Lottie.goal: My goal is to ensure the happiness of my people and the prosperity of our kingdom.

golden_tiara.name: Golden Tiara
golden_tiara.description: A magnificent crown of gold shimmering in the light.
golden_tiara.examine_text: This is a stunning, intricately designed golden tiara. Tiny, glimmering diamonds are embedded into the gold and sparkle from every angle. The craftsmanship is incredible, clearly indicating its royal status.

emerald_necklace.name: Emerald Necklace
emerald_necklace.description: A necklace made of emeralds, both alluring and captivating.
emerald_necklace.examine_text: This necklace is made of perfectly polished square-cut emeralds, inlaid into a fine, twisting gold chain. The emeralds gleam with their rich green color, and the gold chain is almost as bright, providing a striking contrast.

royal_seal.name: Royal Seal
royal_seal.description: A golden royal seal, the symbol of royal assent.
royal_seal.examine_text: This is the official royal seal. Carved of solid gold, it is a circle about the size of your palm. The emblem embossed onto the surface represents the royal family's coat of arms.

Servant Frederick.name: Servant Frederick
Servant Frederick.description: A youthful individual with a lean frame dressed in royal servant attire - neat white suit embroidered with gold lining. He has a quick smile and a humble demeanor.
Servant Frederick.persona: I am Frederick, the key servant in the palace. Loyalty and diligence define my existence.
Servant Frederick.goal: My foremost duty is to cater to the needs of the King, Queen and their distinguished guests.

silver_tray.name: Silver Tray
silver_tray.description: A shiny, meticulously polished silver tray used by servants in the palace.
silver_tray.examine_text: The tray is large and round, made of real silver. Its edges are engraved with intricate designs resembling the royal emblem, evidence of the importance of ceremony in palace service. It's sizeable enough to carry a number of dishes at once.

servants_apron.name: Servant's Apron
servants_apron.description: A clean, well-ironed apron worn by the palace staff.
servants_apron.examine_text: The apron is of a brilliant white color, immaculately clean and well-ironed, bearing the royal emblem stitched finely onto one corner. Made of durable, high-quality cloth, it showcases the order and cleanliness expected in the royal household.

royal_messengers_seal.name: Royal Messenger's Seal
royal_messengers_seal.description: A small, intricately carved seal used by royal messengers to stamp the kingdom's crest on official documents.
royal_messengers_seal.examine_text: The seal is made of solid gold, the handle engraved with intricate designs that are pleasing to the touch. Its end features the royal emblem carved in reverse, allowing it to transfer ink and wax impressions accurately onto paper. The authority and weight of the royal family is felt in its heft.

locations.name: Hidden Revolutionaries' Headquarters
locations.description: Inside the revolutionaries' headquarters, you will find a map of the castle and the surrounding town.  Also, you will find a long list of grievances against the King, both by his subjects and the Queen herself.  In addition, there are crates full of weapons and armor, as well as a small vial of poison.
locations.background: This room is used by the Queen and her lover, the Duke of Nottingham, to plot the downfall of the King  They plan to poison the King, who is an evil tyrant, and use the arms and armor to round up and dispatch, if necessary, the members of his inner circle.  Then they plan to announce the Queen as the ruler and the Duke as the long lost King's brother who had been targeted for assassination by the King.  However, the Duke survived, but the King married his grieving fiance.

travel_descriptions.outside: As you cautiously traverse the decaying, untouched chambers of the palace, you find yourself descending into a forbidding gloom. You're heading towards the dungeon, where tales of lost souls sent shivers down every palace dweller's spine.
travel_descriptions.up: Climbing the worn-out, creaky steps, you ascend from the ceaseless plotting towards a semblance of tranquility. You're heading up to the attic, which, unlike the rest of the palace, held not the machinations of insurgents but countless stories couched within aging books.
travel_descriptions.inside: Walking from the dark, secretive headquarters into the main body of the palace feels like embracing a world entirely different. You're entering the ethereal domain of the unicorns, the heart of the palace that resonates with a harmonious, enchanting aura.

Map of the Castle.name: Map of the Castle
Map of the Castle.description: An intricately detailed map showing the castle and surrounding town.
Map of the Castle.examine_text: The map is marked with strategic locations and possible secret entrances to the castle.

List of Grievances.name: List of Grievances
List of Grievances.description: A long parchment filled with complaints against the King.
List of Grievances.examine_text: The list contains both trivial and grave injustices, some written passionately and others dryly.

Crate of Weapons.name: Crate of Weapons
Crate of Weapons.description: A large crate filled with various types of weapons.
Crate of Weapons.examine_text: Inside you see swords, daggers, and crossbows, all carefully selected for their lethal proficiency.

Poison Vial.name: Poison Vial
Poison Vial.description: A small, glass vial filled with a deadly poison.
Poison Vial.examine_text: The poison is a clear, viscous liquid that is deadly if ingested.

Armor.name: Armor
Armor.description: A suit of sturdy, protective armor.
Armor.examine_text: The armor is well-made, with a polished steel finish and a padded interior for maximum comfort and protection.

Queen Celeste.name: Queen Celeste
Queen Celeste.description: Queen Celeste is a beautiful and dignified woman with a determined glint in her deep blue eyes. She wears a gorgeous royal gown and is armed with a hidden dagger.
Queen Celeste.persona: I am Queen Celeste. I have decided to fight against the tyranny of my husband. I cannot bear his merciless actions any longer.
Queen Celeste.goal: My goal is to end the reign of the tyrannical King and bring in a time of justice and tranquility.

Royal Gown.name: Royal Gown
Royal Gown.description: An elegant, floor-length royal gown with intricate gold embroidery.
Royal Gown.examine_text: On closer examination, you see the delicate gold threadwork, depicting flowers and wild Raffors - symbols of resistance. The gown is heavy and would flow beautifully as someone walks in this. A symbol of authority and strength.

Hidden Dagger.name: Hidden Dagger
Hidden Dagger.description: A small but sharp dagger with a jeweled handle. It's designed to be easily concealed inside the Royal Gown.
Hidden Dagger.examine_text: As you examine the dagger, you can see it's made of shiny, polished steel with a hilt encrusted with small rubies. This weapon is just sharp and small enough to be concealed in a gown's seams. A secret weapon for a determined queen.

Vial of Poison.name: Vial of Poison
Vial of Poison.description: A small, transparent vial containing a dark liquid. Enough to end a tyrant's reign.
Vial of Poison.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the dark liquid sloshes around ominously. The liquid is translucent, with an ethereal shimmer. The label attached to it reads, 'Nightshade Extract - Use with extreme care'. A quiet, yet lethal solution for desperate measures.

Duke of Nottingham.name: Duke of Nottingham
Duke of Nottingham.description: The Duke of Nottingham is a strong, valiant man with an aura of mystery. He is dressed in fine clothing and carries a sword strapped to his waist.
Duke of Nottingham.persona: I, the Duke of Nottingham, am a survivor. I have been wronged, but I am ready to avenge my supposed death and claim my rightful place in the kingdom.
Duke of Nottingham.goal: I aim to reveal myself as the rightful heir to the throne and overthrow the illegitimate King.

Fine Clothes.name: Fine Clothes
Fine Clothes.description: A luxurious velvet suit tailored to perfection.
Fine Clothes.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the suit is not only impeccably tailored but also holds a hint of royalty. Rich navy blue fabric expertly stitched with intricate golden thread designs. Despite it being meant for pragmatic purposes, cultured class and regal majesty speak volumes.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A finely crafted broadsword, with an enchantingly shimmering blade
Sword.examine_text: As you take a closer look, you observe the intricate detail of the hilt that's embellished with rare gemstones. The blade is razor-sharp, perfectly balanced, and resonates with an aura of lethal threat. Though the sword is clearly well used, it is meticulously cared for.

Map of the Castle.name: Map of the Castle
Map of the Castle.description: An old but well-detailed map of the castle.
Map of the Castle.examine_text: Upon examining you see the careful annotations, alterations and vivid marking done by the hands of the strategist, denoting secret passages, key chambers, secured entrances and otherwise unnoticed paths. It is clear that this map has served well in the planning of intricate strategies.

locations.name: The Throne Room
locations.description: The throne room features a large Bronze throne surrounded by Iron statue of guardsmen. These guardsmen are crafted to each bare a unique appearance. Below the king's throne there is a silk red carpet pathway that leads to the front gate. The front gate is protected by two armed men who cross swords at the foot of the gate.
locations.background: This provides the main area for the King to meet with diplomats and serve orders to his army. It is not to be accessed by the towns folk and only those close to the king are allowed entry into this heavily guarded area.

travel_descriptions.north: You walk along a pathway of polished marble, your footsteps echoing in the grand hall, towards the impressive reign of the monarch.
travel_descriptions.west: Navigating through a series of ornamental archways, you feel a calm serenity as you approach the feminine aura of the Queen's Quarters.
travel_descriptions.east: A regal flare guides you through gold-lined corridors as you head towards the symbol of ultimate authority - the Palace Throne.

Bronze Throne.name: Bronze Throne
Bronze Throne.description: It's a king's seat, made entirely out of bronze.
Bronze Throne.examine_text: This very antique yet sturdy bronze throne shows the work of generations of skilled blacksmiths. It is heavily decorated with gems and has intricate carvings of warriors and beasts.

Iron Guardsmen Statues.name: Iron Guardsmen Statues
Iron Guardsmen Statues.description: Iron statues of the palace's guardsmen.
Iron Guardsmen Statues.examine_text: The sturdy and lifelike statues of the guardsmen are all unique, engraved with the likeness of the king’s most trusted protectors. They are each poised as if ready to spring into action.

Red Silk Carpet.name: Red Silk Carpet
Red Silk Carpet.description: A luxurious carpet that spans across the throne room floor.
Red Silk Carpet.examine_text: The thick red carpet is a sign of the king’s wealth, woven from silk by the finest craftspeople of the kingdom. It's soft, elegantly patterned, and immaculately clean.

Crossed Swords.name: Crossed Swords
Crossed Swords.description: Two swords crossed at the entrance of the throne room.
Crossed Swords.examine_text: The swords bear the royal crest, delicate yet lethal. Their steel reflects the sunlight entering through the gates.

King Norbert.name: King Norbert
King Norbert.description: A regal man of advanced age with a silver beard that cascades to his chest. He wears a golden crown adorned with rubies and has a scepter with a large emerald at the top
King Norbert.persona: I have ruled over this kingdom for many years. With wisdom and justice, I endeavor to keep my people safe and prosperous.
King Norbert.goal: Find a suitable heir to my throne.

golden crown.name: golden crown
golden crown.description: It's King's Norbert's impressive crown, glittering with precious gemstones.
golden crown.examine_text: The crown is made of pure gold and decorated with diamonds, emeralds and rubies. It symbolizes King Norbert's authority and the wealth of his kingdom.

scepter.name: scepter
scepter.description: The ornate golden scepter of King Norbert.
scepter.examine_text: The scepter is primarily made of gold. Atop of it, a large diamond is held firmly by claws of a cast golden eagle, a symbol of royal power.

royal decree.name: royal decree
royal decree.description: A document carrying the king's latest order.
royal decree.examine_text: Written on high-quality parchment and bearing King Norbert's official seal, this decree could drastically change the lives of his subjects.

Sir Osric.name: Sir Osric
Sir Osric.description: A hulking figure at the King's right hand. Dressed in shining plate mail, he radiates authority and is always watchful.
Sir Osric.persona: I am the King's right hand, his most trusted advisor and the commander of the palace guards. My loyalty to His Majesty is unwavering.
Sir Osric.goal: Ensure the King's safety and carry out his orders.

sword.name: Sir Osric's Sword
sword.description: A kingly sword, well-crafted and cared for by Sir Osric himself.
sword.examine_text: The sword is heavy and lined with intricate etchings. The hilt is adorned with precious gems, reflecting Sir Osric's prestige. Its sharp edges are perfectly maintained, showcasing the no-compromise approach of Sir Osric in his duty.

shield.name: Sir Osric's Shield
shield.description: A robust and sturdy shield, decorated with the symbol of the Kingdom.
shield.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the minor scratches and marks from the countless battles it endured, speaking volumes of Sir Osric's loyalty and courage. The symbol of the kingdom, a crowned lion standing on two legs, is emblazoned in the center, reflecting his faithfulness and honor.

map of the kingdom.name: King's Map
map of the kingdom.description: A finely detailed map of the realm, it guides Sir Osric in matters of defense and strategy.
map of the kingdom.examine_text: Examining the map, one can see the tentative lines of the Kingdom’s borders, the marked danger zones of wars and insurgencies. It's detailed with a structure of fortifications, guard posts, and hidden passages. This is not just a map but a strategic document.

Lady Anabella.name: Lady Anabella
Lady Anabella.description: An elegant young lady, always dressed in fancy gowns and exuding charm and poise. Her languid eyes hold an intelligent spark.
Lady Anabella.persona: As the King's daughter, I have duties and responsibilities. But I dream of more, of seeing the world outside the palace walls. For now, I serve my father and my kingdom the best way I can.
Lady Anabella.goal: To persuade her father to include her in political matters and eventually rule the kingdom.

fan.name: Silver Ivory Fan
fan.description: A delicate fan, decorated with hints of silver and ivory
fan.examine_text: The fan is exquisitely crafted from thin slices of ivory, spread out like the wings of a bird. The sticks are engraved with intricate patterns of vine leaves, while edges are lined with delicate silver thread. It's lightweight and fits perfectly in hand.

royal signet ring.name: Royal Signet Ring
royal signet ring.description: The King's royal signet ring with the kingdom's emblem
royal signet ring.examine_text: This small, gold ring is engraved with the stately lion emblem of your kingdom. It holds the power of the king, used to seal official documents with wax. There is a sense of weight and importance to it that goes beyond its physical size.

diary.name: Lady Anabella's Diary
diary.description: A private diary of Lady Anabella, filled with her dreams and hopes
diary.examine_text: A small, leather-bound book, filled with neat, handwritten notes, sketches of far-off places and trinkets, and secret hopes and dreams. Many entries detail her duties as the King's daughter, while others reveal her yearning to see the world outside the palace walls.

locations.name: Queen'S Bedchamber
