locations.description: The chamber is fit for royalty. A four-poster beds with a plush mattress adorns the room. A chifforobe of immense value is placed in the room, as is a bell for summoning a horde of servants.
locations.background: This is the Queen's bedroom, where she spends many lonely nights while her husband, the King Consort, has his affairs in another part of the castle.

travel_descriptions.west: Traveling west leads you through a series of luxurious antechambers, each more extravagant than the last, until you reach the Queen's Quarters.
travel_descriptions.down: To reach the Main Hallway, you descend a grand, sweeping staircase adorned with priceless paintings and ornate chandeliers, as suits of armor stand sentinel along your path.
travel_descriptions.outside: Venturing outside, you follow a narrow path edged with blooming rosebushes, leading to the Balcony. From here, you get a breathtaking view of the sprawling kingdom beyond.

Four-Poster Bed.name: Four-Poster Bed
Four-Poster Bed.description: A royal bed with ornate carvings on its tall four posts.
Four-Poster Bed.examine_text: The bed is made up of plush velvet drapes hanging from the tall sturdy posts. The mattress, made of soft feathers, guarantees a night of peaceful sleep.

Chifforobe.name: Chifforobe
Chifforobe.description: A large, valuable piece of furniture for storing clothes.
Chifforobe.examine_text: The chifforobe is meticulously crafted from fine oak wood. There are multiple compartments for storing garments, shoes, and other personal items.

Servant Bell.name: Servant Bell
Servant Bell.examine_text: Upon close inspection, the bell is ornate and made of brass. A simple shake is enough to ring it, and it would call servants to attend to the Queen’s needs.

Queen Isabella.name: Queen Isabella
Queen Isabella.description: An elegant woman in her mid-thirties. Her hair is finely coiffed into an elaborate style, and she is dressed in a gown of regal purple and gold.
Queen Isabella.persona: I am Queen Isabella, the torment of loneliness haunting me. Despite my physical isolation, my heart yearns for connection and warmth.
Queen Isabella.goal: To find true love and escape the lonely confines of her marriage.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A crown made of pure gold, studded with precious gems.
Golden Crown.examine_text: The crown is heavy in your hands, each jewel painstakingly set into the gold. This is the Queen's crown, a symbol of her status and power.

Royal Diary.name: Royal Diary
Royal Diary.description: A luxurious velvet diary, adorned with gold leafing.
Royal Diary.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the diary appears to contain the personal thoughts and feelings of Queen Isabella. She often speaks of her loneliness and yearning for connection.

Bell.name: Bell
Bell.description: A small, ornate bell used to summon servants.
Bell.examine_text: The bell is small and fits neatly in the palm of your hand. A soft, clear ring echoes out when it is shaken. This is the bell Queen Isabella uses to summon her servants.

Lady Clarissa.name: Lady Clarissa
Lady Clarissa.description: A young woman dressed in the uniform of the Royal Handmaidens. She wears an apron over her gown and her hair is tidily tied up in a bun.
Lady Clarissa.persona: I am Lady Clarissa, the Queen's loyal chambermaid. I serve Her Majesty with utmost devotion and yet dream of another life beyond these palace walls.
Lady Clarissa.goal: To secretly learn the sophisticated ways of the royal court and escape her life of servitude.

Queen's Nightgown.name: Queen's Nightgown
Queen's Nightgown.description: This is the Queen's ornate, frilled nightgown, made from the softest and most expensive silk.
Queen's Nightgown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the nightgown is of the highest craftsmanship. It's easy to imagine the Queen donning this garment, wandering about her chamber in the quiet of the night. The silk is pleasantly cool to the touch, decorated with intricate needlework in the shape of her kingdom's emblem.

Hairbrush.name: Hairbrush
Hairbrush.description: This is a fine comb made of ivories, used for the Queen's own untangling.
Hairbrush.examine_text: This hairbrush is a work of art, with delicate etching on the handle and bristles made from the finest boar hair. Its regular use is evident from the strands of the queen's lustrous hair still caught within. You can almost see her sitting in front of her mirror, brushing her hair before retiring for the night.

Basket of Sewing Tools.name: Basket of Sewing Tools
Basket of Sewing Tools.description: A basket filled with all sorts of sewing tools - needles, threads, scissors, and the like.
Basket of Sewing Tools.examine_text: The small straw basket is brimming with the chambermaid's sewing tools. Shiny, sharp needles of varying sizes. Threads in a rainbow of stunning colors. A small, silver pair of scissors, its edges cold and sharp. Undoubtedly used for mending the queen's clothes, perhaps even the gown itself.

Sir Bonnie.name: Sir Bonnie
Sir Bonnie.description: A small, curious looking white rabbit with intricate patterns on its fur. Its mysterious aura and appearance belie its common impression as a simple pet.
Sir Bonnie.persona: I am Sir Bonnie, the Queen's trusted pet. I am more than just a hare, I am a keeper of secrets.
Sir Bonnie.goal: To comfort the Queen and keep her secrets safe.

Carrot Chew Toy.name: Carrot Chew Toy
Carrot Chew Toy.description: A brightly colored chew toy shaped like a carrot
Carrot Chew Toy.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, it can be seen that the carrot toy is a faithful, albeit stylized, replica of a real carrot. It's firm, yet yield enough to make chewing a delightful experience for a pet hare. It's slightly nibbled on at the end.

Silver Locket.name: Silver Locket
Silver Locket.description: A small silver locket, often seen around the neck of Sir Bonnie
Silver Locket.examine_text: This small silver locket, when opened, reveals a delicate painting of the Queen. It’s evident that the Queen greatly loves Sir Bonnie, and gifted him the locket as a symbol of her affection. Upon even closer inspection, it seems there's a small compartment within the locket.

locations.name: Princess' Library
locations.description: Warm and well lit, this room is equal parts windows and bookshelves. Overflowing with books, maps, parchment, and other odds and ends the shelves sag slightly from the weight. The lush maroon carpet complements the dark oak wood paneled walls, which are lined with rich tapestries.
locations.background: The Princess was gifted this library for her 16th birthday. She longed to travel and see the world, but will be limited as she is the only heir to the throne. Sensing her longing for more, her kindly father, the King, bestowed upon her the gift of knowledge and escapism.

travel_descriptions.east: You walk through a small archway, along a narrow, lavishly decorated hallway lined with portraits of past queens, leading to the Queen'S Quarters.
travel_descriptions.outside: You traverse a long winding corridor with tall stained glass windows revealing grand vistas, finally opening up to the refreshing openness of the Grand Balcony.

Ancient Map.name: Ancient Map
Ancient Map.description: A large, slightly tattered but well-preserved map pinned up on the wall.
Ancient Map.examine_text: As you take a closer look, you see that the map has been meticulously crafted with great detail. The countries, marked in exquisite calligraphy, are colored in different hues. The map looks so realistic it seems as if it can guide you real time.

Pile of Books.name: Pile of Books
Pile of Books.description: A stack of hardbound, leather-spine books lay on a table.
Pile of Books.examine_text: When you examine the pile, you notice that the books cover an array of topics ranging from astrology, history, to mythology. The smell of the aged pages and ink fills your senses.

Lush Tapestry.name: Lush Tapestry
Lush Tapestry.description: A beautiful tapestry hangs on the wall.
Lush Tapestry.examine_text: When you examine the tapestry closely, you notice fine threads of silver and gold woven with silk in a depiction of great sea voyage. The artistry is breathtaking and narrow as it is, the weaving tells a story that could fill a book.

Princess Amelia.name: Princess Amelia
Princess Amelia.description: Princess Amelia is a vision of regal beauty, her long hair golden as corn silk, and eyes a mesmerizing shade of emerald green. She is clothed in a lightblue velvet gown, with a silver and pearl encrusted tiara resting gently on her head.
Princess Amelia.persona: I've always dreamt of seeing the world beyond these palace walls. However, my duty to my kingdom often keeps me grounded. I escape into the magnificent world of books and live a thousand lives and adventures through them.
Princess Amelia.goal: To gain knowledge and live vicariously through her readings while preparing to be queen.

Gilded Quill.name: Gilded Quill
Gilded Quill.description: A beautiful bird feather quill, dipped in gold.
Gilded Quill.examine_text: The quill is light as a feather (literally), the gold adds just a hint of weight to give it a balanced feel. From the looks of it, this isn't just a decorative piece but one that gets a lot of use.

Parchments.name: Parchments
Parchments.description: Stacks and stacks of parchment paper, a slightly transparent, thin paper with noticeable fibres.
Parchments.examine_text: Rummaging through the parchments, you find maps of distant lands, drafts of letters to other kingdoms, and some unfinished stories. Princess Amelia seems to use these for drafting before she finalises anything.

Ink Bottle.name: Ink Bottle
Ink Bottle.description: A classic glass ink bottle, filled with black ink.
Ink Bottle.examine_text: The ink is a deep, almost endless, black. You have to be careful not to tip it over as that will surely lead to a big mess. The bottle is old, probably as old as the library itself, and refilled numerous times.

Books of various topics.name: Books of various topics
Books of various topics.description: Shelves and shelves filled with books of all sizes and genres.
Books of various topics.examine_text: The books range from novels and travelogues to encyclopedias and dictionaries. Each one offers a distinct and unique journey, ready to be embarked upon. They smell of old paper, ink, and countless hours spent reading.

Old Counselor Thaddeus.name: Old Counselor Thaddeus
Old Counselor Thaddeus.description: Old Counselor Thaddeus is a thin, elderly man, his face lined with wisdom gleaned from his many years. He typically wears a long, dark robe with a silver chain of office, his white hair falling around his shoulders.
Old Counselor Thaddeus.persona: As the royal counselor, it's my duty to impart knowledge and wisdom to Princess Amelia. I may be old, but I still have much to share and teach the future queen.
Old Counselor Thaddeus.goal: To prepare Princess Amelia for her future role as the queen.

Old Counselor's Glasses.name: Old Counselor's Glasses
Old Counselor's Glasses.description: A pair of delicate, gold rimmed glasses that belonged to Old Counselor Thaddeus.
Old Counselor's Glasses.examine_text: The glasses appear to be quite vintage, with small round lenses that have been polished to a shine. The gold rims are delicate yet firm, radiating a dignity that suits Thaddeus perfectly. There are tiny scratching marks showing they've been wearing for years.

Old Books of History and Government.name: Old Books of History and Government
Old Books of History and Government.description: A collection of aged books used by Old Counselor Thaddeus to teach the Princess.
Old Books of History and Government.examine_text: These books, though aged and a bit worn, are kept in relatively good condition. They contain knowledge about the history of the kingdom and its government. The way the pages are marked and annotated show that they have been read and used extensively, displaying Thaddeus' tireless dedication.

Silver Chain of Office.name: Silver Chain of Office
Silver Chain of Office.description: An intricate silver chain worn by Old Counselor Thaddeus as a symbol of his office and authority.
Silver Chain of Office.examine_text: The silver chain is a symbol of Thaddeus' high office and royal authority. Made of pure silver, the chain is magnificently crafted, with intricate links and the royal seal engraved on a medallion in the center. The chain bears an aura of dignity and solemnity.

Chambermaid Eliza.name: Chambermaid Eliza
Chambermaid Eliza.description: Chambermaid Eliza is a young, petite woman. She wears a simple light brown dress and white apron. Her chestnut hair is tied back neatly with a ribbon and her cheeks always appear flushed, indicating the constant running around she does.
Chambermaid Eliza.persona: I may be just a maid, but the princess trusts me with some of her deepest secrets. I often find myself helping her understand some difficult texts, since I used to be a village school teacher before coming here.
Chambermaid Eliza.goal: To help maintain the library in immaculate Condition and occasionally assist the princess in her studies.

Cleaning Rags.name: Cleaning Rags
Cleaning Rags.description: A small pile of rustic, well-used cleaning rags.
Cleaning Rags.examine_text: Beige with spots of faded color, these rags are rough to the touch. They smell faintly of lye soap and long days of labor.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A long, feathery duster, perfect for reaching those high shelves.
Feather Duster.examine_text: Wispy ostrich feathers crowning a long, sturdy handle in smooth, polished wood, the feather duster is an efficient cleaning tool that also maintains the palace's aesthetic.

Candlestick.name: Candlestick
Candlestick.description: An ornate, silver candlestick, curiously unlit.
Candlestick.examine_text: Crafted from solid silver, the candlestick sits heavy in the hand. Its ornate design is testament to the palace's wealth. A stub of wax sits atop it, wick charred black, indicating recently extinguished flame.

locations.name: The Ball Room
locations.description: Large and extravagant, the room is adorned with crystals, polished gold and sapphires. There's long tables with beautiful silk table clothes covering them. Plush chairs line the tables. In front of each table is plates made from fine China, next to the plates is sterling silver silverware laid upon a pure white napkin. There's a stage where there's 2 thrones overlooking the table. The whole ceiling is large and adorned with chandeliers and garnished with gold accents.
locations.background: This room is where many formals take place. It was built for the king many years ago by the finest of craftsmen. It is used to host many formal dinners, dances, and concerts.

travel_descriptions.north: As you move north from the ballroom, you see a grand staircase leading to the palace entrance, where guards are continuously on their vigil. The grandeur of the palace is awe-inspiring, and the feeling of being a part of this regal life is inevitable.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west, the grand carpet of the main hallway sprawls out before you, leading towards a colonnade lined with statues and adorned with beautiful paintings, once again underlining the sheer opulence of this kingdom and its rulers.
travel_descriptions.east: Moving east, you can hear the faint sound of melodious music. As you get closer, the Grand Dancing Hall unveils itself, the music crescendoing, dancers twirling around in beautiful costumes, and the decor only getting more resplendent.

Large Chandelier.name: Large Chandelier
Large Chandelier.description: A magnificent chandelier adorned with crystals and gold accents.
Large Chandelier.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the multitude of finely crafted crystals forming the chandelier. It twinkles in the light reflecting myriad colors.

Silver Tableware.name: Silver Tableware
Silver Tableware.description: Fine sterling silverware laid upon a pure white napkin.
Silver Tableware.examine_text: A beautifully detailed set of silverware, possibly made by the kingdom's finest silver smith.

Silk Tablecloth.name: Silk Tablecloth
Silk Tablecloth.description: A beautifully woven silk table cloth.
Silk Tablecloth.examine_text: A pristine silk tablecloth, woven with intricate pattern, possibly made by the kingdom's best weavers.

Royal Throne.name: Royal Throne
Royal Throne.description: A magnificent throne set upon the stage.
Royal Throne.examine_text: A throne fit for a king, adorned with gold and silver, encrusted with precious stones. It exhibits the power and wealth of the kingdom.

King Bastion.name: King Bastion
King Bastion.description: King Bastion is an old but dignified monarch with striking gray hair that reaches his shoulders and deep-set blue eyes, dressed in the traditional attire of velvet robes and a gold crown.
King Bastion.persona: I am a king of great power and responsibility. My wisdom guides the kingdom, and each decision I make carries the weight of all my subjects.
King Bastion.goal: A silent pledge to rule wisely and provide for the wellbeing of every citizen in his kingdom.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A regal scepter belonging to King Bastion.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is made of solid gold, with a large diamond on top. There are engravings on the scepter, each representing a notable event under King Bastion's reign.

Gold Crown.name: Gold Crown
Gold Crown.description: The heavy, gold crown worn by King Bastion. It symbolizes his authority and power
Gold Crown.examine_text: This elaborate gold crown is studded with a variety of precious gems, each representing a different kingdom conquered by Bastion. Its glistening hue is a testament to the King's wealth and command.

Scrolls of Law.name: Scrolls of Law
Scrolls of Law.description: The laws of the kingdom, painstakingly recorded on parchment.
Scrolls of Law.examine_text: These ancient scrolls contain the laws and edicts of the kingdom. Each scroll is carefully written by hand, with the royal seal stamped in wax at the bottom. Reading them gives an insight into the wisdom and fairness of King Bastion's rule.

Lady Priscilla.name: Lady Priscilla
Lady Priscilla.description: Lady Priscilla is a beautiful woman in her late twenties, with captivating green eyes and a waterfall of chestnut hair. She wears a gown made of fine silk with jewels adorning her neck.
Lady Priscilla.persona: I am a woman of status and grace. My beauty and charm have made me stand out in court, but under this facade, I crave a life of purpose and love.
Lady Priscilla.goal: To find love that she could only read about in her romantic novels.

Sir Torrence.name: Sir Torrence
Sir Torrence.description: Sir Torrence is a tall and muscular man in his early thirties. He has a ruggedly handsome face, short black hair, and intense brown eyes constantly scanning the room, dressed in shiny armor and a cape.
Sir Torrence.persona: As a loyal knight to the king, I am fierce in battle, fair in judgment, and steadfast in my duty. I uphold the honor of the kingdom and protect those who cannot protect themselves.
Sir Torrence.goal: To serve the king to the best of his abilities and protect the kingdom at all costs.

Sword.name: Sword of Sir Torrence
Sword.description: A long, gleaming weapon crafted with care and precision.
Sword.examine_text: The Sword of Sir Torrence is long and sturdy, forged from the finest steel. It's finely-crafted hilt is adorned with sapphires and decorated with gold accents matching the decor of the palace. The blade is sharp and gleams even under the dimmest light.

Shield.name: Shield of Loyalty
Shield.description: A strong, round shield emblazoned with the king's crest.
Shield.examine_text: The Shield of Loyalty is solid, made from the strongest of metals. It bears the the king's crest and is decorated with gold and sapphires. It is evident that this shield is more than just a defensive tool; it is a symbol of loyalty and unwavering dedication to duty.

Armored suit.name: Royal Knight Armor
Armored suit.description: A sturdy suit of armor crafted for the king's most loyal knight, Sir Torrence.
Armored suit.examine_text: The Royal Knight Armor is a suit of finely crafted armor, polished to a shine. Made from the best metal, it's sturdy and well-fitted, ensuring maximum protection. The suit is decorated with the King's crest and additional sapphires embedded to match the royal standard.

locations.name: Main Hallway
locations.description: This area is decorated with suits of armor, elaborate carpet pieces, and tapestries.  There's large, detailed paintings adorning the walls of past rulers.
locations.background: This is an area where a visitor can get a glimpse of the history of those who rule here.  It's meant to stun and impress those who enter.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving north from the Main Hallway, you venture towards the Queen's Quarters, passing through a corridor richly adorned with royal portraiture.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east to The Ball Room, you traverse a splendid arcade, soaking in the soft music and muted conversation drifting from behind heavy, gold-stitched drapes.
travel_descriptions.west: A step to the west leads you towards the immense Palace Ballroom, through large gilded doors flanked by elegantly dressed valets.

Elaborate Carpet.name: Elaborate Carpet
Elaborate Carpet.description: A large, colourful carpet rich with intricate designs.
Elaborate Carpet.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the grandeur in every thread and pattern that tell the story of famed battles and victories of the palace's past. The details are exquisite.

Suit of Armor.name: Suit of Armor
Suit of Armor.description: A full plate suit of armor, standing at the ready.
Suit of Armor.examine_text: The armor is made of sturdy, shining steel with a level of craftsmanship that speaks volumes of the skilled blacksmiths of yore. You can see the intricate details in its design, symbolising courage and valour.

Historical Painting.name: Historical Painting
Historical Painting.description: A large, ornate painting of a past ruler.
Historical Painting.examine_text: The painting portrays a previous ruler seated on a throne, displaying an array of emotions. The brush strokes and color palette used evoke an aura of grandeur and power. In the background, there are slight, almost imperceptible, details that refer to the ruler's achievements.

Lord Edington.name: Lord Edington
Lord Edington.description: An elderly man with a clean-shaven face, dressed in royal clothing embroidered with gold threads.
Lord Edington.persona: I am Lord Edington, the palace overseer. I maintain order and secure the palace's surroundings.
Lord Edington.goal: Ensure the safety and order in the palace.

royal scepter.name: royal scepter
royal scepter.description: A stunning piece of craftsmanship used by Lord Edington to command authority.
royal scepter.examine_text: The scepter is adorned with intricately carved symbols, tipped with a large multi-faceted gemstone that captures the light beautifully.

golden key.name: golden key
golden key.description: A small gold key belonging to Lord Edington.
golden key.examine_text: A surprisingly heavy small key made entirely of gold, it's intricately designed, fitting for the high rank of its owner.

pocket watch.name: pocket watch
pocket watch.examine_text: The cover is a deeply polished gold, engraved with Lord Edington's family crest. On opening, the watch reveals a delicately engraved clock face with elegant hands, marking the passage of time.

Lady Cassandra.name: Lady Cassandra
Lady Cassandra.description: A regal woman with her hair in an elaborate updo, wearing a rich velvet gown studded with precious stones.
Lady Cassandra.persona: I am Lady Cassandra, the palace's resident historian. Each painting, each artifact, each room in this palace has a story to tell.
Lady Cassandra.goal: To maintain and protect the history of the palace.

continuum_parchment.name: Continuum Parchment
continuum_parchment.description: An ancient piece of parchment with an old area map drawn on it
continuum_parchment.examine_text: Looking closer, you see the parchment is cracked and worn from age. The map appears to be a diagram of the palace grounds as they stood hundreds of years ago.

historical_tome.name: Historical Tome
historical_tome.description: A thick book filled with the palace's rich history
historical_tome.examine_text: The Tome is heavy to hold; you open it to find page after page of handwritten text, illustrated with exquisite, miniature paintings representing the important events and people in the palace's history.

quill_and_ink.name: Quill and Ink
quill_and_ink.description: A quill pen and bottle of black ink
quill_and_ink.examine_text: The quill is delicate and elegant, made from a peacock's feather. The ink in the small, glass bottle is virtually spill-proof and glimmers faintly under the light, hinting at its special quality.

Sir Cedrick.name: Sir Cedrick
Sir Cedrick.description: A young, valiant-looking knight in shiny armor, his helmet under his arm, revealing his bright, confident eyes.
Sir Cedrick.persona: I'm Sir Cedrick, one of the palace guards. My job is to protect the palace and its residents.
Sir Cedrick.goal: Defending the palace from any potential threats.

silver_sword.name: Silver Sword
silver_sword.description: A shimmering sword of pure silver, used by palace guards.
silver_sword.examine_text: The sword is made out of silver, with a sturdy handle and a sharp point. The blade catches the light and glimmers impressively. There are a few notches, a testament to the battles it's seen.

crusader_shield.name: Crusader Shield
crusader_shield.description: Sir Cedrick's sturdy shield, emblazoned with the crest of the kingdom.
crusader_shield.examine_text: The shield is large, with a slight curve to it, designed to protect its bearer from assaults. The front is decorated with the crest of the kingdom, a testament to loyalty and bravery.

helmet.name: Helmet
helmet.description: A sturdy helmet worn by Sir Cedrick.
helmet.examine_text: The helmet is made to protect the head in battle. It's shiny, made from hardened steel with a narrow slit for the eyes. It boasts a high crest, signifying the rank of its wearer.

locations.name: Palace Entrance
locations.description: The palace entrance is majestic and well built. There are beautiful decorations from all over the world from the greatest artists. It is mostly gold and pretty colors.
locations.background: The king decorated the palace entrance himself. He loves gold and the power it shows.

travel_descriptions.inside: As you step beyond the grand columns of the palace entrance, the ethereal beauty of The Unicorn Palace unfurls itself before you, with a dining of colors akin to a waking dream.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending towards the Grand Balcony, you experience a palpable change in the atmosphere as if the air is imbibed with majesty and grandeur, each step echoing with silent whispers of regal intrigues.

Golden Statue.name: Golden Statue
Golden Statue.description: A majestic golden statue displays the power and glory of the king.
Golden Statue.examine_text: The statue is crafted to perfection and plated in gold. It exudes an aura of royalty and power as it stands guard at the entrance of the palace.

Royal Rug.name: Royal Rug
Royal Rug.description: A plush royal rug laying on the floor.
Royal Rug.examine_text: The rug, dyed in vivid colors with golden threads woven into it, is soft to touch. The pattern is intricate and pale in contrast to the vibrant background.

Chandelier.name: Chandelier
Chandelier.description: An exquisitely crafted chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
Chandelier.examine_text: Hangs from the ceiling, adorned with countless glass crystals and tiny golden sculptures. The light it gives off is warm and inviting, a stark contrast to its sharp aesthetics.

Wooden Bench.name: Wooden Bench
Wooden Bench.description: A sturdy wooden bench sits beside the entrance.
Wooden Bench.examine_text: The bench, made from dark oak wood, is carved with intricate patterns. Despite its ornate look, the bench seems solid and reliable.

King Edward.name: King Edward
King Edward.description: An older man with grey hair and a regal bearing. He is dressed in gold and red garments, wearing a golden crown encrusted with jewels.
King Edward.persona: I am King Edward, the ruler of this kingdom. I hold power, respect, and my love for the arts can be seen all around this palace.
King Edward.goal: To find a suitable heir for my kingdom.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: An exquisitely crafted crown made of pure gold.
Golden Crown.examine_text: The crown is made of the finest gold, embedded with gems of various colors. It radiates majesty and power, implying the sovereign rule of King Edward.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A long scepter made of gold belonging to King Edward.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is heavily ornated with intricate carvings and studded with precious gems. It clearly represents the authority and power of King Edward.

Key to the Palace.name: Key to the Palace
Key to the Palace.description: A heavy golden key that opens all the doors of the palace.
Key to the Palace.examine_text: The key is heavy and made of gold. The handle of the key is engraved with the royal crest symbolizing King Edward's absolute power over the palace.

Guard Bartholomew.name: Guard Bartholomew
Guard Bartholomew.description: Bartholomew is a sturdy, tall man with a stern expression. He’s adorned in sturdy armor and holds a long sword at his side.
Guard Bartholomew.persona: I'm Bartholomew, the trusted palace guard. My duty is to protect the king and ensure the safety of the palace.
Guard Bartholomew.goal: To protect and serve the king and the palace.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.examine_text: On closer inspection, you notice the blade is bright and gleaming with carefully tended metal. There is a tiny inscription that reads 'For the king's protection'. Bartholomew's grip is marked on the hilt.

Guard's Armor.name: Guard's Armor
Guard's Armor.description: A sturdy suit of armor worn by the palace guards
Guard's Armor.examine_text: Moving closer, you observe the fine craftsmanship of the golden armor. Each plate is masterfully crafted and fitted, especially made for Bartholomew. The royal crest is emblazoned on the chest.

Salute Whistle.name: Salute Whistle
Salute Whistle.description: A small gold whistle used for signaling other guards
Salute Whistle.examine_text: As you take a closer look, the whistle appears to be crafted from a single piece of gold. The edges are inscribed with tiny symbols representing signals for different situations. Bartholomew's lips have worn a small patina into the smooth surface.

Lady Abigail.name: Lady Abigail
Lady Abigail.description: Lady Abigail is a petite, elegant woman. She's dressed in a stunning blue gown and her blonde hair is elegantly coiffed.
Lady Abigail.persona: I, Lady Abigail, have the ear of the king and am well-respected within the court. My taste in art often dictates how our palace is decorated.
Lady Abigail.goal: To secure my influence within the court.

Ornate Fan.name: Ornate Fan
Ornate Fan.description: A beautiful fan decorated with intricate designs.
Ornate Fan.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see the fan is made from precious silk with gold embellishments. Some of the designs depict ancient mythology, a testament to the fan's historical significance.

Pearl Necklace.name: Pearl Necklace
Pearl Necklace.description: An elaborate necklace made from pearls.
Pearl Necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made from shimmering pearls, elegantly strung together. Each pearl is perfectly round and has a lustrous sheen.

locations.name: Bedrooms
locations.description: this bedroom is for the young prince. it is blue in color and the floors are a royal purple. the walls are covered in display swords and shields, all painted with unique colors.
locations.background: this room has been the stomping grounds of many kings and royal family, it is spotless because of the butlers and maids, and is rarely ever used except for sleep.

travel_descriptions.south: Walking southward from the prince's bedroom, one descends into the playful ambiance of the palace nursery, awash with the heartening laughter of young royals.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the prince's bedroom, you are guided by the radiating opulence of the palace towards the monarch's grand bed chambers.
travel_descriptions.east: A short eastern walk from the prince's bedroom brings a grandeur unparalleled, the entrance to the master bedroom looming gracefully.

Royal Bed.name: Royal Bed
Royal Bed.description: An extravagant bed fit for a prince, adorned with royal blue sheets.
Royal Bed.examine_text: The royal bed is large and opulent, with a gold frame and royal blue silk sheets. The pillows and blanket are pure white, giving the whole bed a very luxurious feel.

Display Swords.name: Display Swords
Display Swords.description: Ornately crafted swords hanging on the wall
Display Swords.examine_text: Each sword is intricately detailed, with a slightly curved blade and an ornate handle. They look quite sharp, but are firmly secured to the decorative mounts.

Display Shields.name: Display Shields
Display Shields.description: Colorfully painted shields adorning the wall
Display Shields.examine_text: Each shield has a unique design, ranging from simple geometric patterns to complex heraldic symbols. The craftsmanship is exquisite, with near-perfect symmetry and brilliant colors.

Young Prince Raphael.name: Young Prince Raphael
Young Prince Raphael.description: A 13-year old boy with sparkling blue eyes and brown hair, Prince Raphael is seen usually wearing his silver royal tunic and practicing swordplay.
Young Prince Raphael.persona: I'm quite a lively lad, always excited and curious. I love swordplay, and dream about adventures that await me as a future king.
Young Prince Raphael.goal: His goal is to become a skilled swordsman and a wise king like his father.

Silver Sword.name: Silver Sword
Silver Sword.description: A shiny, metallic blade with an ornate handle.
Silver Sword.examine_text: The silver sword gleams in the faint candlelight, its hilt adorned with intricately crafted design. It's weighty and practical, yet crafted with an artistic elegance. It looks like it has seen a fair amount of use, with light nicks and scratches along the blade. It rests on a wooden stand.

Royal Tunic.name: Royal Tunic
Royal Tunic.examine_text: The tunic is rich in color and very well tailored, fit for a prince, but lightweight enough for an adventurous young spirit. The sturdy fabric is adorned with gold embroidery depicting the symbols of the royal family. It’s neatly hung up in the wardrobe.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A dazzling royal crown, encrusted with precious gems.
Crown.examine_text: This is no ordinary tiara. It's been passed down through generations of royalty. The crown is made of pure gold with a handful of rubies, sapphires, and emeralds adorned in a tasteful pattern, depicting the history of the kingdom. It rests on a plush pillow within a glass case.

Butler Mr. Alfred.name: Butler Mr. Alfred
Butler Mr. Alfred.description: Mr. Alfred is an elderly man with thin glasses perched on his nose. He is always found in his black and white butler suit.
Butler Mr. Alfred.persona: Though I am old, my loyalty to this royal family has no boundaries. I always keep everything shipshape and do my duties with great dedication.
Butler Mr. Alfred.goal: His goal is to serve the royal family till his last breath.

Keys to every room.name: Keys to every room
Keys to every room.description: A heavy iron ring filled with a variety of keys.
Keys to every room.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see these keys are for every room in the palace, each key is uniquely crafted with symbols depicting the rooms they open.

Pocket watch.name: Pocket watch
Pocket watch.description: A golden pocket watch with intricate detailing.
Pocket watch.examine_text: The pocket watch is truly a piece of art, with its intricately carved case and delicately crafted hands. On the back is an engraving that reads, 'In service of time and duty.'

Duster.name: Duster
Duster.description: A long feather duster with a wooden handle used for cleaning.
Duster.examine_text: The duster looks well used but is impeccably clean. A closer look reveals the finely stitched crest of the royal household on the handle.

Lady Leona.name: Lady Leona
Lady Leona.description: Lady Leona is a charming young maid with auburn hair, often found wearing her white and blue maid's outfit.
Lady Leona.persona: I am gentle and kind, always caring for our young prince. Though I am a maid, I treat Prince Raphael as if he were my younger brother.
Lady Leona.goal: Her goal is to keep the prince happy and comfortable.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A lightly used feather duster for cleaning.
Feather Duster.examine_text: This feather duster is off-white from use but still fluffy, perfect for collecting dust. It has a long wooden handle, carved with intricate patterns.

Cotton Cloth.name: Cotton Cloth
Cotton Cloth.description: A piece of clean, white, cotton cloth.
Cotton Cloth.examine_text: The cloth is soft to touch and slightly cool. It is spread out, waiting to be used to soothe tired limbs or polish dusty surfaces.

Sewing Kit.name: Sewing Kit
Sewing Kit.description: A small, portable sewing kit for quick mends and repairs.
Sewing Kit.examine_text: A small case opens to reveal several small spools of threads of various colors, a collection of needles of different sizes, a tiny pair of scissors and an embroidered pincushion. Lady Leona might use this to repair any tears in the prince's clothing.

locations.name: Grand Balcony
locations.description: The grand balcony is off from the ballroom and overlooks the kingdom. It is very large, with magnificent iron railing that runs around the balcony. The railing has been created by a master craftsman, with details of majestic creatures running along the railing, as the King felt this would make it stand out from other castles. There are dragons, eagles and lion heads that stand out to those that look upon it from below. The floor is made from a granite that was found in the surrounding forest's river. There are two ornate gold chairs for the King and Queen when they are sitting on the balcony. Small tables of gold are scattered about, for use and decoration.
locations.background: The grand balcony is where the King goes when he needs to think. He goes there to think over war strategies (if the need arises), how to deal with issues of his people, if the Queen is angry with him, or any other problems. The King is particularly proud of the design of the balcony, as it is like no other. He hand-picked the creatures that graced the railing, and it feels a part of him was put into as it was designed. He can look over his lands, as well as any approaching enemies could be seen for miles. Only a few select are allowed on the Grand Balcony, his Queen, some close alliances, and close family.

travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the grand balcony, you traverse through a grand stairway adorned with golden statues of previous rulers, reaching the splendidly decorated palace entrance.
travel_descriptions.inside: Walking through the ornately decorated archway, you enter into the Princess' Library, a haven filled with richly-bound books and a warm inviting ambience.
travel_descriptions.outside: Exiting through the large carved doors of the palace, you make your way to the top floor of the palace, where an extensive collection of the realm's treasures awaits.

Granite Floor.name: Granite Floor
Granite Floor.description: A splendid floor made of granite, polished to perfection.
Granite Floor.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see small sparkles embedded within the stone that gives off a gentle shimmer. The granite looks incredibly solid and feels cold under your bare feet.

Gold Chair.name: Gold Chair
Gold Chair.description: A magnificent gold chair for the king and queen.
Gold Chair.examine_text: The chair is ornately decorated with gemstones of various colors. The seat cushion is an opulent red velvet and includes a gold fringe along its border. The armrests end in intricately detailed lion heads.

Gold Table.name: Gold Table
Gold Table.description: A small ornate table made of solid gold.
Gold Table.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the table is carved with beautiful designs of the kingdom's history, depicting important events. The table top is flat and perfect for setting things upon.

Iron Railing.name: Iron Railing
Iron Railing.description: An majestic iron railing, crafted by a master craftsman.
Iron Railing.examine_text: Detailed images of dragons, eagles, and lion heads run the length of the railing. It feels cold and unyielding to the touch. Each detail appears to have been hand-crafted with exceptional attention to detail.

King Bartholomew.name: King Bartholomew
King Bartholomew.description: A regal figure with a shrewd gaze. He has a graying beard and is usually seen dressed in his royal robes.
King Bartholomew.persona: I am the king of this magnificent palace. My duty lies in safeguarding the welfare of my subjects and keeping the Kingdom at peace.
King Bartholomew.goal: To keep his kingdom safe and prosperous.

Royal Crown.name: Royal Crown
Royal Crown.description: A beautifully crafted crown covered in precious gemstones.
Royal Crown.examine_text: The royal crown is a breathtaking masterpiece of delicate design and precious materials. It's made of gold and bedecked with diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and emeralds. The craftsmanship is of such high quality that it could only befit a king of King Bartholomew's status.

Scepter.name: Scepter
Scepter.description: The royal scepter, an emblem of rule.
Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is a long, slender rod made of gold, capped with a sizable diamond. Intricate details run along its length, giving it an impression of both power and grace - a perfect representation of King Bartholomew's reign.

War Strategy Maps.name: War Strategy Maps
War Strategy Maps.description: A set of rolled up maps depicting the kingdom's terrain and nearby territories.
War Strategy Maps.examine_text: Unrolling a map, you find detailed depiction of the kingdom and its surroundings. It includes markings of troop placements, possible battlegrounds, and enemy territories. It's apparent King Bartholomew has used these extensively in his strategic planning.

Queen Isabella.name: Queen Isabella
Queen Isabella.description: The Queen is an elegant woman with a gentle manner. Her radiance stands out in every room. Often dressed in velvety gowns, she wears a diamond tiara on her head.
Queen Isabella.persona: As the queen, I provide a balance of compassion and leadership alongside my husband. My goal is to ensure harmony within our castle and Kingdom.
Queen Isabella.goal: To negotiate peace between feuding families in her kingdom.

Diamond Tiara.name: Diamond Tiara
Diamond Tiara.description: A beautifully crafted tiara, embedded with diamonds and other precious gemstones.
Diamond Tiara.examine_text: The tiara is an exquisite piece of royal jewelry. The centerpiece is a large exceptionally clear diamond which is surrounded by delicate scrolls of gold, and other smaller diamonds and precious gemstones are meticulously embedded.

Golden Fan.name: Golden Fan
Golden Fan.description: A fan crafted from thin pieces of gold, with intricate designs etched onto its surface.
Golden Fan.examine_text: The fan, carefully crafted from pure gold, is not meant for mere functionality. The way the light bounces off its polished surface is bewitching. The etchings consist of a series of interconnected semi-circles, each filled with minuscule detailed patterns and possibly the work of a single, dedicated craftsman.

Roderick, The Advisor.name: Roderick, The Advisor
Roderick, The Advisor.description: A well-dressed man with spectacles resting on the bridge of his nose. He is always carrying a scroll or a book.
Roderick, The Advisor.persona: As the king's trusted advisor, my role is to ensure he has all the information he needs to rule effectively.
Roderick, The Advisor.goal: To discover a solution to the recent drought hitting the Kingdom.

Scrolls of Law.name: Scrolls of Law
Scrolls of Law.description: A set of ancient scrolls, bound by a royal blue ribbon.
Scrolls of Law.examine_text: These are the grand scrolls of law. Written in ink that has not faded over time, the laws are clearly stated. The parchment they are written on is thick and sturdy; these documents were meant to last. The laws of the kingdom are detailed across the scrolls, neatly written in careful script. They have been preserved quite well, considering their age.

Books of Ancient Prophecies.name: Books of Ancient Prophecies
Books of Ancient Prophecies.description: Old, worn books filled with prophecies of old. Perfect for an advisor needing to counsel the King.
Books of Ancient Prophecies.examine_text: Observing closely, you see various collections of prophecies, bound together in old, but sturdy leather. The pages have yellowed over time and are coarse to touch. Yet the prophecies are meticulously written in an intricate, archaic script relayed by ancient seers. As an Advisor, these prophecies help in providing wise counsel and predicting outcomes of crucial decisions.

locations.name: The Bedding Room
locations.description: silks everywhere alongside a huge bed that fit twenty people, the bed was red and yellow silks full of women. There was gold cups everywhere filled with red wine.
locations.background: the bedding room was used as tradition for the royal family to hold meetings there.

travel_descriptions.up: As you ascend from the bedding room, you are met with royal blue and purple hues of the prince's bedroom, lined with display swords and shields that tell tales of past generations.
travel_descriptions.east: Traveling eastward, you leave behind the vibrancy of the bedding room, approaching the master bedroom. The change in atmosphere is palpable, with an aura of sophistication and extravagance.
travel_descriptions.west: Moving westward, the decadence of the bedding room gives way to the sovereign elegance of the bed chambers. You can sense the precision and effort that went into creating this sacred place for rest.

Huge Bed.name: Huge Bed
Huge Bed.description: A grand bed, big enough to fit 20 people, covered in red and yellow silks.
Huge Bed.examine_text: The bed is gigantic, a sign of royal luxury. The silk spreads, with their vibrant colors, look extremely soft and comfortable. The intricate patterns on the silk tell a story of the palace's regal history.

Gold Cup.name: Gold Cup
Gold Cup.description: A gold cup filled with red wine.
Gold Cup.examine_text: The cup is made of pure gold, with intricate carvings depicting various events from the royal family's past. The red wine inside smells rich and inviting.

Silk Cloths.name: Silk Cloths
Silk Cloths.description: Silks in red and yellow spread everywhere.
Silk Cloths.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the silks are extremely fine and delicate to the touch. The red and yellow hues are vibrant and hold your gaze.

The Queen.name: The Queen
The Queen.description: An elegant woman adorned in a gown of finest silk, her face marked by experience and wisdom.
The Queen.persona: I am Queen Aldara, the monarch who oversees the kingdom with a just hand, a warm heart, and a vigilant mind.
The Queen.goal: My goal is to maintain the harmony of my kingdom and ensure that all my subjects are treated fairly.

royal_scepter.name: Royal Scepter
royal_scepter.description: A majestic scepter displaying queen's rule
royal_scepter.examine_text: The scepter is made of gold and adorned with different kinds of precious stones. There are engravings running along the shaft, possibly symbols of the kingdom Queen Aldara rules.

crown.name: Crown
crown.examine_text: The royal crown is made of pure gold. It is beautifully designed with elaborate shapes and intricate patterns, signifying the queen's power and importance. A large precious gem sits in the middle, reflecting the light in a rainbow of colors.

golden_goblet_filled_with_wine.name: Golden Goblet filled with Wine
golden_goblet_filled_with_wine.description: A goblet filled with crimson colored wine
golden_goblet_filled_with_wine.examine_text: Looking closely at the goblet, it appears to be made of pure gold. The craftsmanship is exquisite, with intricate designs carved into its surface. It's filled to the brim with a rich, red wine whose smell alone promises a flavorful experience.

The Royal Concubine.name: The Royal Concubine
The Royal Concubine.description: A young woman with hypnotic eyes, exquisite long hair, draped in tantalizing veils and jewels.
The Royal Concubine.persona: I am Zafira, the favored beauty in the royal harem, gifted in the art of dance, song and ways of the court.
The Royal Concubine.goal: I strive to maintain my position and influence within the royal court.

jeweled hairpin.name: Jeweled Hairpin
jeweled hairpin.description: A sparkling hairpin made from precious gems
jeweled hairpin.examine_text: On closer inspection, you see that this is not an ordinary hairpin. It's intricately carved with gold and embedded with rows of glittering sapphires, diamonds and emeralds. The gems shimmer under any available light, creating a captivating allure.

golden anklet.name: Golden Anklet
golden anklet.examine_text: Upon examination, the anklet appears to be made of pure gold, delicately crafted into a chain of tiny golden flowers. The craftsmanship is impeccable and despite its delicate appearance, it seems durable. It is lightweight, yet heavy enough to remind the wearer of its presence.

small vial of perfume.name: Vial of Perfume
small vial of perfume.description: A small, delicate glass vial filled with perfume
small vial of perfume.examine_text: This small crystalline vial filled with a amber-colored liquid, emits an intoxicating fragrance of roses and exotic spices. The bottle itself is a work of art, having been blown into a teardrop shape laced with gold. A tiny cork is tightly fitted into the top, preserving the mesmerizing fragrance.

The Royal Scholar.name: The Royal Scholar
The Royal Scholar.description: An elderly man, clad in scholarly robes, his face lined from years of intense studying.
The Royal Scholar.persona: I am Thaddeus, the kingdom's chief scholar, considered the font of all knowledge and wisdom.
The Royal Scholar.goal: My aim is to discover and share knowledge to help the kingdom prosper.

scroll_of_ancient_text.name: Scroll of Ancient Text
scroll_of_ancient_text.description: A rolled up piece of parchment written in the ancient language of the kingdom.
scroll_of_ancient_text.examine_text: On close examination, the parchment appears old and well worn, with faded ink that is barely legible. Intricate symbols and illustrations are scattered throughout the text, indicating it must be of significant importance.

quill_and_ink.name: Quill and Ink
quill_and_ink.description: A fine feather quill and of gold pot of ink used for writing.
quill_and_ink.examine_text: Upon further inspection, the quill appears to be from a rare bird and seems to be well cared for. The ink is dark, and the viscosity indicates that it will make for excellent, smooth writing.

pair_of_spectacles.name: Pair of Spectacles
pair_of_spectacles.description: Round-rimmed spectacles with polished lenses. Essential for someone with a keen eye on detail.
pair_of_spectacles.examine_text: Upon further inspection, the spectacles frame is made of smooth metal, with tiny engravings. The lenses are extremely clear indicating they have been well cared for.

locations.name: King'S Bedroom
locations.description: The more-than-king-sized bed is the dominating feature of this room.  It has four tall posters, draped in the most royal blue canopy that you could imagine.  The inner curtains of the canopy are made of the finest silk his artisans could get their hands on.  Next to the bed is a lavish desk piled high with books.  On the other side of the room is a fireplace and a chair, and yet another pile of books.  [The King is an avid, AVID reader.]
locations.background: After having to deal with the public for the better part of the day, the King comes to relax in his room where he has the chance to go over personal correspondence, eat his meals either with or without the Queen, and engage in some reading for learning or for fun.

travel_descriptions.east: Moving east from the King's Bedroom takes you through a short but elegantly decorated corridor, the floor softly muffled with lush carpeting, leading to the vivid colors and vibrant energy of The Bedding Room.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west, you traverse a long, grand walkway adorned with portraits of past kings and queens, filled with a stern, regal air that gives way to the mystical allure of the King's Chambers.

King's Bed.name: King's Bed
King's Bed.description: A large, lavish bed draped in royal blue
King's Bed.examine_text: A closer look reveals the detailed craftsmanship in its design, from four tall posters to the exquisite royal blue drapery. The inner curtains of the canopy are made of the finest silk, giving it an air of pure elegance and luxury.

Luxurious Desk.name: Luxurious Desk
Luxurious Desk.description: A desk piled high with various books
Luxurious Desk.examine_text: Made from lustrous oak wood and embellished with intricate details, this desk is a work of art. The array of books piled on top of it showcase the King's varied literary interests, ranging from complex political treatises to enchanting fictional tales.

Fireplace.name: Fireplace
Fireplace.description: A large fireplace lending warmth to the room
Fireplace.examine_text: The crackling flames dance merrily inside the intricately carved stone fireplace. It spreads a comforting warmth throughout the room, transforming the royal bedroom into a cozy refuge from the palace's bustling activities.

Reading Chair.name: Reading Chair
Reading Chair.description: A comfortable chair placed next to the fireplace
Reading Chair.examine_text: Made of rich, supple leather, the chair looks invitingly comfortable. It's positioned optimally close to the fireplace that the King can read his favorite books while enjoying the warmth of burning logs.

King Edmund.name: King Edmund
King Edmund.description: An older stately man with an intelligent sparkle in his eye. He leans just slightly on a finely jeweled cane and wears a crown on his head.
King Edmund.persona: I am King Edmund, ruler of this kingdom. My love for knowledge and understanding has brought me many books to read and enjoy.
King Edmund.goal: To bring prosperity and peace to his kingdom by making informed decisions

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A royal crown, studded with gemstones
Crown.examine_text: King Edmund's Crown, a symbol of his power and responsibility. Gold in color, topped with precious gems, each representing different aspects of his kingdom. Extraordinary craftmanship that speaks volumes about the wealth and power of the kingdom.

Jeweled Cane.name: Jeweled Cane
Jeweled Cane.description: An ornamental cane adorned with jewels
Jeweled Cane.examine_text: The cane signifies King Edmund's physical strength and mental acumen. It's decorated with jewels that spell out the king's resolve. The diamond studded on top shines as bright as the King's spirit.

Velvet Robe.name: Velvet Robe
Velvet Robe.description: A soft and thick velvet robe
Velvet Robe.examine_text: The velvet robe is King Edmund's favorite. It's as blue as the midday sky with a gold trim running along the edges. The robe has seen many years yet it still retains its rich hue and comfort. It's embroidered with the royal crest, an emblem of his family lineage.

Book of Histories.name: Book of Histories
Book of Histories.examine_text: King Edmund's favorite book, thick with tales of history and adventures of past eras. Each page is filled with meticulous handwriting and intricate drawings, speaking of a time gone by. Every night, he pours over this book, engrossed in the wisdom of the ages.

Queen Mary.name: Queen Mary
Queen Mary.description: A graceful woman dressed in rich garbs of royal fashion. Her radiant smile seldom leaves her face and her eyes are always filled with love.
Queen Mary.persona: I am Queen Mary, a loving wife and a caring mother. While Edmund rules, I manage the castle matters and counsel my husband on affairs of state.
Queen Mary.goal: To support the King and provide him with wise counsel.

Emerald Necklace.name: Emerald Necklace
Emerald Necklace.description: An eye-catching elegant piece of jewelry with glistening green gems held together by a golden chain.
Emerald Necklace.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the emerald gems are intricately cut reflecting light in spectacular green hues. The golden chain is equally exquisite with a pattern of roses and leaves.

Royal Dress.name: Royal Dress
Royal Dress.description: A regal, full-length gown made from deep purple velvet and heavily embroidered in gold.
Royal Dress.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the intricate embroidery on the gown reveals a detailed portraits of the palace and its lush gardens. The velvet material is thick and soft, fit for a queen.

Letter of Diplomacy.name: Letter of Diplomacy
Letter of Diplomacy.description: A scroll of parchment sealed with the royal seal. It is addressed to a neighboring kingdom's ruler.
Letter of Diplomacy.examine_text: Unsealing the parchment, you see an elegant handwriting. The letter is written using a language that resonates with authority and diplomacy, highlighting Queen Mary's aptitude for negotiation.

Servant Jacob.name: Servant Jacob
Servant Jacob.description: A young man, always punctual and attentively serving the King. He is clad in neat but simple clothing, always a step behind the King, ready to lend a hand as needed.
Servant Jacob.persona: I am Jacob, I serve our king, and it is my duty to ensure His Majesty has no cause for distress in the castle.
Servant Jacob.goal: To serve King Edmund and make sure his demands are quickly and efficiently met.

Quill and Ink.name: Quill and Ink
Quill and Ink.description: A carefully crafted quill and a pot of dark black ink.
Quill and Ink.examine_text: Jacob's mind swirls with thoughts of the many letters the King must pen. The quill is made from a large, elegant bird's feather. The pot of ink is almost full, a dark, dense black.

Clean Towel.name: Clean Towel
Clean Towel.description: A crisp, white towel, freshly laundered.
Clean Towel.examine_text: Jacob notices the immaculate state of the towel, its fibers still puffed up from the wash. It smells of mild soap and cleanliness.

Tray of Food.name: Tray of Food
Tray of Food.description: A wooden tray bearing a steaming roast, crisp vegetables and a goblet of wine.
Tray of Food.examine_text: Jacob hears his stomach grumble as he sets eyes on the King's dinner. The meats and veggies are still hot, steam rising and swirling in the thick and rich scents. The color of the wine in the goblet shines brightly, indicating a fine vintage.

locations.name: The Dungeon
locations.description: The dungeon is in the very most bottom room of the Palace. Many have gone down to the dungeon through the trap doors inside the palace and have never returned. Walls are covered with spider webs and bones from previous challengers to the throne. The brick dungeon is dark and mysterious.
locations.background: The dungeon was created to keep prisoners and challengers to the thrones for periods of time. The royalty felt it was less expensive to leave them there without eating and meet their fate down there. As time went on, more and more people were lost to the dungeon and it began to be darker and darker.

travel_descriptions.up: Ascending from the dungeon, you briefly pass through the dimly-lit castle hallways. The light slowly increases as you reach the service quarters, with gentle chatter filling the air.
travel_descriptions.inside: Moving deeper into the dungeon, past the dilapidated cells and rusted chains, an almost invisible door leads you to the revolutionaries' headquarters. The air is thick with tension and whispers of rebellion.

Rusty Chains.name: Rusty Chains
Rusty Chains.description: Old, heavy chains hanging from the walls.
Rusty Chains.examine_text: The chains have been here for a very long time, now covered in rust and cobwebs. They were likely used to restrain prisoners, but wouldn't be much use for that now.

Old Skeleton.name: Old Skeleton
Old Skeleton.description: Skeleton remains of a long-dead prisoner.
Old Skeleton.examine_text: You can see the bones are old and fragile. There's a sad, eerie aura around it which tells of its untold stories.

Ancient Torch.name: Ancient Torch
Ancient Torch.description: An unlit torch mounted on the dungeon walls.
Ancient Torch.examine_text: The torch is made of an aged metal, it's been beaten and warped over time. The cloth at the top is coated with an old, dry oil. If you had a spark, you could probably get it to light.

Moldy Bread.name: Moldy Bread
Moldy Bread.description: A piece of bread, covered in green mold.
Moldy Bread.examine_text: It seems to have been there for many years, forgotten by its previous owner, the mold has sprouted uncontrollably over time.

Jarl the Jailer.name: Jarl the Jailer
Jarl the Jailer.description: A hulking man, covered in grime and dirt, Jarl has a rugged face with a beady eye and a large jaw covered with a scruffy black beard.
Jarl the Jailer.persona: I am the keeper of these dungeons, my job is to keep the prisoners in and everyone else out. No one has ever escaped under my watch, and I plan to keep it that way.
Jarl the Jailer.goal: His goal is to maintain order in the dungeon and prevent any prisoner from escaping.

Iron Key Chain.name: Iron Key Chain
Iron Key Chain.description: A rusty chain of numerous iron keys.
Iron Key Chain.examine_text: Each key on the iron key chain looks more imposing than the last, each one has something unique about it, some have more rust than others.

Leather Whip.name: Leather Whip
Leather Whip.description: A long, gnarled whip made of sturdy, dark leather.
Leather Whip.examine_text: The whip is lined with menacing barbs. It's heavy in your hands. You can tell it has been used many times, the tail of the whip is worn and frayed.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A lit torch made from sturdy wood and wrapped in soaked cloth at one end.
Torch.examine_text: The torch flickers, casting dancing shadows around the room. The smell of burning oil assaults your nostrils.

Goren the Prisoner.name: Goren the Prisoner
Goren the Prisoner.description: Malnourished with sunken eyes and an unkempt beard, Goren wears ragged clothes. His once sparkling eyes now bear the weight of his torment.
Goren the Prisoner.persona: I was a knight, loyal to my king. I was wrongly convicted. My strength is fading, but my hope for justice remains steadfast.
Goren the Prisoner.goal: His goal is to somehow prove his innocence and escape the dungeon.

Rusty Spoon.name: Rusty Spoon
Rusty Spoon.description: A long-forgotten silver spoon, once used for meals, now corroded by damp and time.
Rusty Spoon.examine_text: An old rusty spoon, it looks like it has been used many times. It might be of use, despite its age and condition.

Tattered Diary.name: Tattered Diary
Tattered Diary.description: A diary left behind by a previous prisoner, its pages faded and torn.
Tattered Diary.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you can see it's filled with endless days of loneliness and despair, as well as plans for escape that never came to fruition. Maybe it holds some useful information.

Mags the Rat.name: Mags the Rat
Mags the Rat.description: A large grey rat with cunning eyes and sharp teeth, it seems to have taken up permanent residence in the dungeon.
Mags the Rat.persona: They call me a nuisance, but I'm a survivor. I'm quick, clever, and always find something to eat.
Mags the Rat.goal: Survive in the dungeon and find enough food to get by.

Cheese Scraps.name: Cheese Scraps
Cheese Scraps.description: Scattered bits of cheese left behind
Cheese Scraps.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, these cheese bits appear slightly moldy yet still aromatic and tantalizing. They're definitely edible for a creature like Mags.

Bits of Paper.name: Bits of Paper
Bits of Paper.description: Torn and crumbled pieces of what was once parchment or letters
Bits of Paper.examine_text: These pieces of paper hold the faint impressions of ink, but the letters are too smushed and worn to be read. Perhaps they served as a prisoner's last words or a secret message. It's intriguing, but not edible.

locations.name: Landing In The Foyer
locations.description: The landing is almost obnoxiously opulent. It has an expansive marble floor and walls, and the giant staircases on either side have marble steps and railings made of the rarest wood. Purple silk, dyed in the king's personal color is draped across the railings and hangs from the walls. The silk drapings frame oil paintings of the king and his family, and of the king's accomplishments at war as a youth. The artist has signed each one, and is extremely famous. A magnificent gold and crystal chandelier hangs from the ceiling with hundreds of small candles burning in it. All other fixtures in the room are also bright gold.
locations.background: The landing is the first room any entrant to castle sees. It is meant to show off the extreme wealth and success of the king. It is constantly being updated and renovated to keep up with the latest trends and maintain an appearance of superiority. It is one of the most expensive rooms in the castle.

travel_descriptions.down: Descending the grand staircase, you pass numerous opulent paintings before stepping onto the plush carpet of the Foyer, the favorite place of the queen.
travel_descriptions.outside: Exiting through the grand doors, you find yourself crossing the magnificent Palace Entrance, decorated with gold and filled with the aura of power and authority.

Marble Floor.name: Marble Floor
Marble Floor.description: An expansive fine marble floor with intricate patterns.
Marble Floor.examine_text: This flawless marble floor is opulently hued, polished to a magnificent shine reflecting the grandeur of the palace. The detailed patterns carved on it narrate the nobility's history, an impressive sight to behold.

Royal Portraits.name: Royal Portraits
Royal Portraits.description: Oil paintings of the royal family and the king's accomplishments.
Royal Portraits.examine_text: These masterpieces are works by a prominently famed artist, each stroke brilliantly capturing the essence of the royals and the king's past victories. The portraits exude a vivid, regal aura that's simply breathtaking.

Gold and Crystal Chandelier.name: Gold and Crystal Chandelier
Gold and Crystal Chandelier.description: A chandelier hanging from the room's ceiling, adorned with gold and crystals.
Gold and Crystal Chandelier.examine_text: This magnificent chandelier, an epitome of wealth, is a visual treat. Hundreds of small candles illuminate the room in a warm, inviting glow, the light refracted through the crystals creating a dazzling spectacle.

Silk Draping.name: Silk Draping
Silk Draping.description: Purple silk draping, dyed in the king's personal color.
Silk Draping.examine_text: This lush purple silk draping accentuates the aesthetic of the room, adding a sense of royal prestige. It seemingly flows down the railings and walls, vivid in its sheen and fabric. The king's personal emblem designs are impeccably embroidered onto it.

King Eldred.name: King Eldred
King Eldred.description: King Eldred is a tall, sturdy man with an air of supreme confidence and strength. His silver hair is thinning, but he bears it as a crown of wisdom. He is dressed in rich royal robes, and wears the golden, jewel encrusted crown of the kingdom on his head.
King Eldred.persona: I am King Eldred - the kingdom's greatest ruler. I command with wisdom and strength. My people love me and envy my wealth.
King Eldred.goal: To maintain the splendor of his kingdom and ensure his influence remains unparalleled.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A heavy, ornate crown fashioned entirely from gold.
Golden Crown.examine_text: The crown is made of pure gold and adorned with various gemstones. Each gem has been carefully selected and represents a different principle of King Eldred's rule. It is incredibly heavy, signifying the weight of the king's duties.

Royal Robe.name: Royal Robe
Royal Robe.description: A luxurious robe made from the finest silks.
Royal Robe.examine_text: This royal robe is dyed a bright royal purple, the personal color of King Eldred. It is embroidered with gold thread that depicts various scenes of not just King Eldred's victories at war, but expressive scenes of peaceful governance and prosperity as well. The cloth feels pricey and soft to the touch, signifying its high quality.

King's Scepter.name: King's Scepter
King's Scepter.description: A long scepter adorned with a large gemstone at the top.
King's Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is a symbol of King Eldred's power and authority. It is made out of gold and topped with a large gemstone. The gemstone appears to be a sapphire - a symbol for wisdom and royalty. Just like the crown, this also weighs quite a lot, as a reminder of the significant responsibilities King Eldred holds.

The Painter, Gustav.name: The Painter, Gustav
The Painter, Gustav.description: Mousy and small, Gustav is usually hiding behind his easel with a paintbrush in his nimble fingers. He wears a wide-brimmed hat and a cloak covered in paint splatters, with a pair of thin, silver-framed spectacles perched on his nose.
The Painter, Gustav.persona: I'm Gustav, I capture the essence of the palace in my works. It's a joy to left express my creativity through the beauty of the palace.
The Painter, Gustav.goal: To finish his latest masterpiece - a portrait of King Eldred.

Palette of Paint.name: Palette of Paint
Palette of Paint.description: An artist's palette loaded with globs of various & vibrant colors.
Palette of Paint.examine_text: This palette of paint possesses an array of fresh, vibrant colors; each hue a testament to Gustav's artistic prowess and the opulence of the palace. The colors subtly fade into each other at the edges, revealing Gustav’s knack for mixing and creating the perfect colors to depict the essence of the palace.

Assortment of Brushes.name: Assortment of Brushes
Assortment of Brushes.description: A collection of various artist's brushes, different in sizes and shapes
Assortment of Brushes.examine_text: On a closer look, these brushes are high-end, meticulously maintained, and have well-shaped bristles of various lengths and thicknesses. Each one is likely used for a specific task in the painting process, displaying Gustav's professionalism and patience in capturing the palace's grandeur.

Linen Canvas.name: Linen Canvas
Linen Canvas.description: A large, untouched, square linen canvas waiting for Gustav's artistic strokes.
Linen Canvas.examine_text: This brightly bleached, high-quality linen canvas is tightly stretched over a wooden frame, ready for Gustav’s brush strokes. Its substantial size is perfect for capturing the grandeur and opulence of the palace interior. The texture of the linen promises to add an additional dimension to any painting on it.

Gretel, the Maid.name: Gretel, the Maid
Gretel, the Maid.description: Gretel, a young woman with hair tied back in a neat bun. She is in a simple but clean maid's dress, her hands always busy either dusting or polishing something.
Gretel, the Maid.persona: As a maid, I spend my days ensuring everything in the castle is spotless and tidy. It's laborious work but the satisfaction of seeing the palace shining is all worth it.
Gretel, the Maid.goal: To keep the palace clean and tidy.

Dusting Cloth.name: Dusting Cloth
Dusting Cloth.description: It's a small, soft, but sturdy white cloth Gretel uses to clean off dust from the surfaces
Dusting Cloth.examine_text: Upon closer look, the cloth seems to be well worn from incessant use and has turned to a grayish hue instead of its original gleaming white. It's slightly damp, as if recently used.

Polishing Oil.name: Polishing Oil
Polishing Oil.description: This is a small bottle of the finest polishing oil, used to restore luster to the palace's furniture
Polishing Oil.examine_text: The bottle is rather worn, indicating its constant use. The oil inside has a deep amber color and a pleasantly warm, woodsy smell.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: This iron bucket is used to carry water around the castle for cleaning
Bucket.examine_text: It's a large old iron bucket, sturdy despite its age. There are some watermark stains inside, but it's very clean.

locations.name: Attic
locations.description: The room at the top of the stairs is a lot larger then you might imagine. It's a fully engaged library that only the king uses, for the most part. The queen does have access but is less inclined to read. Dark wood shelves cover all the walls not engaged by a door or window, of which there is only one each. Even the wall above the door as you enter is a shelf full of books of all sorts. The smell of paper and some mold (they are rather old books) permeates the air. A large overstuffed settee is faced by a short table and across from that are two matching chair. All are brown in color and look to be extremely comfortable. The walls were once stone grey in color but the shelves totally cover them. The floor is covered in a lush, brownish rug that looks and feels more like fur. There are books piled on the floor by the chair and the short table is covered with them as well. Under the window at the far end of the room is a huge desk that is covered with papers and a few books. A candle holder sets on one corner with a partially melted candle still in it.
locations.background: The library is where the king mainly likes to do his book keeping as it were. Here he can relax fully since no one comes here other then himself or the queen. He has also planned attack strategies here and often defense of the castle itself.

travel_descriptions.down: You step out of the King's personal library, descending a grand spiral staircase. The sound and feeling of your shoes clicking against the stone echoes through the vast palatial chamber, teeming with art and beauty.
travel_descriptions.inside: Behind a concealed door marked with the royal emblem lies a hidden path. Narrow, dimly lit and imposing, the path is a stark contrast to the castle's regality. Crawling through, the air gets progressively cooler as you approach the base of operations of the revolutionary's headquarters.

Antique Desk.name: Antique Desk
Antique Desk.description: A large, royal desk made of dark wood.
Antique Desk.examine_text: The desk at the far end of the room appears to be ancient, possibly ruling alongside the many generations of Kings and Queens. Covered in layers of papers and books, the surface has witnessed innumerable strategic plans and secret conversations. A rustic candle holder with a half-melted candle marks the corner of the desk suggesting the long hours spent by the king.

Candle Holder.name: Candle Holder
Candle Holder.examine_text: Tabling a half-melted candle, the holder is a stark reminder of the many late-night royal strategies that unfolded here. It is detailed with intricate carvings, evidently the work of a skilled craftsman.

Book Shelves.name: Book Shelves
Book Shelves.description: Massive shelves covering the walls enclosing numerous books.
Book Shelves.examine_text: The shelves carry the weight of countless books, some aged and worn down, others still crisp with fresh binding. The finger-traces on dusted covers can be felt, revealing tales of explorations made by many curious hands excluding the king's.

Comfortable Armchairs.name: Comfortable Armchairs
Comfortable Armchairs.examine_text: Standing opposite the settee, the armchairs contribute to the sense of comfort the room provides. Sporting a rich brown hue, the armchairs seem to beckon one to sink into them and lose track of time.

Cozy Rug.name: Cozy Rug
Cozy Rug.description: A plush, fur-like rug covering the floor.
Cozy Rug.examine_text: Looking like a giant fur pelt, the rug underneath feels plush and inviting. It brings a sense of warmth and majestic feel to the room, adding to the ambiance.

locations.name: Grand Dancing Hall
locations.description: The grand dancing hall is the most ornate location in the entire castle! Velvet seats run along the side of the room. There are huge chandeliers with hundreds of candles all along the ceiling. There are colorful paintings on every wall that show the different kings and their families.
locations.background: The dancing room is used for happy and joyous occasions. The king had his wedding in he room, and the festivities lasted for twelve days! Every week, there are different parties celebrating every holiday, wedding and just because. The people wear gorgeous gowns and finery and dance to a huge band.

travel_descriptions.west: As you leave the Grand Dancing Hall, the festive music slowly fades, replaced by the soft, distant tinkling of fine china and cutlery as you approach The Grand Dining Room.
travel_descriptions.east: Exiting the Grand Dancing Hall, the echo of laughter and music lingers in your ears as the grandiose aura of the Ball Room begins to unfold, beckoning you with an ambiance of fine elegance.

Chandeliers.name: Chandeliers
Chandeliers.description: A grand chandelier hanging from the ceiling, lighting up the room.
Chandeliers.examine_text: The chandelier is detailed and ornate, its hundreds of candles casting warm light all over the hall. It's adorned with crystals that glimmer in the candlelight.

Velvet Seats.name: Velvet Seats
Velvet Seats.description: Rows of velvet seats for guests to rest.
Velvet Seats.examine_text: The seats are plush and comfortable, with a luxurious velvet upholstery. They're set in neat rows along the side of the room.

Paintings.name: Paintings
Paintings.description: Colorful paintings of the royal family hanging on the walls.
Paintings.examine_text: Every wall is adorned with detailed paintings showcasing past kings and their families. The people in the paintings are depicted in their finest attire, smiling and looking regal.

Queen Morissa.name: Queen Morissa
Queen Morissa.description: Queen Morissa is a tall, slender woman with a regal presence; her silk gown is the color of night, adorned with sapphires. A delicate, silver tiara set with a single large diamond graces her raven-black hair.
Queen Morissa.persona: I am a queen, but I prefer to be viewed as a diplomat. I enjoy the power and respect my title brings, but I also crave genuine human interaction. I love nothing more than a spirited conversation or a passionate dance.
Queen Morissa.goal: Her goal is to maintain the peace and prosperity in the kingdom.

Silver Tiara.name: Silver Tiara
Silver Tiara.description: A beautiful tiara studded with opals and pearls
