Silver Tiara.examine_text: As you look at the tiara you notice the subtlety of the craftsmanship; the silver design featuring delicate curves entwined with small opals and pearls. The tiara looks quite ancient, and has an aura of royal grace and power about it.

Diamond Necklace.name: Diamond Necklace
Diamond Necklace.description: A necklace set with a large sparkling diamond
Diamond Necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made of finely crafted gold, bedecked with a single, dazzling diamond that glimmers and sparkles, casting off a myriad of colors upon closer inspection. It seems to be a piece that symbolizes status and power.

Fan Made of Peacock Feathers.name: Fan Made of Peacock Feathers
Fan Made of Peacock Feathers.description: An exquisite fan made from bright, colorful peacock feathers
Fan Made of Peacock Feathers.examine_text: This fan is beautifully crafted, its peacock feathers arranged in an eye-catching pattern that shifts and changes as the fan is moved. The feathers are all real and still retain their natural lustrous sheen. It's a fan that fits in the hands of a queen or a high-ranking lady.

Sir Bracken.name: Sir Bracken
Sir Bracken.description: He is a stout man with grizzled hair and a bushy beard, the emblems on his doublet show his knightly status. His mirthful eyes and roaring laugh make him instantly likable.
Sir Bracken.persona: I enjoy a good jest, a good feast, and a good dance. A night of joyous celebration is a balm for the soul. After all, we fight so hard for peace; we should learn to enjoy it when it comes.
Sir Bracken.goal: He wishes to rise in the kingdom's councils and be recognized for his services to the throne.

Knightly Sword.name: Knightly Sword
Knightly Sword.description: A gleaming sword with an ornate hilt, worn by knights of the realm.
Knightly Sword.examine_text: The blade of the sword is polished to a mirror sheen, unmarred by any sign of combat. The hilt is exquisitely crafted, with intricate etchings that speak of valor and honor. The grip is wrapped in supple leather, providing a secure handle even in the throes of battle.

Feathered Hat.name: Feathered Hat
Feathered Hat.description: A flamboyant hat adorned with colorful feathers, denoting a jester's wardrobe.
Feathered Hat.examine_text: The hat is a prism of colors with its multicolored feathers sticking out at jaunty angles. Each feather is meticulously placed, blending harmoniously into the next. As you hold it, the hat feels light and airy, making it perfect for a night of festivities full of jesting and dancing.

Royal Order Seal.name: Royal Order Seal
Royal Order Seal.description: The official seal of the royal order, used to stamp documents of importance.
Royal Order Seal.examine_text: The seal, crafted impeccably from gold, is a fine piece of workmanship. It carries the crest of the realm, a symbol of authority and respect. It feels heavy in your hand, imbued with the history of the kingdom and the weight of decisions made using it.

Lady Annalise.name: Lady Annalise
Lady Annalise.description: Slim and graceful with golden curls cascading down her back, Lady Annalise is a vision in her emerald velvet gown. Her deep-set hazel eyes are full of mischief and intelligence.
Lady Annalise.persona: I may be a lady, but I'm not one for idle gossip or courtly graces. I prefer substance over formality. There's more to me than meets the eye.
Lady Annalise.goal: Annalise seeks to find a significant role for herself in the court, striving for independence and respect.

Velvet_clutch.name: Velvet Clutch
Velvet_clutch.description: A small, sophisticated velvet clutch carried by high society ladies.
Velvet_clutch.examine_text: The clutch is an elegant blend of beauty and practicality. Its luscious red velvet exterior exudes a regal aura, adorned with a fine gold clasp that opens to a black satin interior. It is a small vessel that Lady Annalise uses to carry her necessities during the royal parties.

Emerald_earrings.name: Emerald Earrings
Emerald_earrings.description: A pair of stunning emerald and diamond earrings.
Emerald_earrings.examine_text: The emerald earrings, illuminating a mesmerizing green hue, are framed by delicate diamonds that twinkle under the warm chandelier lights. Crafted with precise symmetry and skilled artistry, they are a vivid reflection of Annalise's taste for understated elegance.

Handkerchief.name: Handkerchief
Handkerchief.description: A delicate, white handkerchief, commonly used by ladies to maintain their composure.
Handkerchief.examine_text: A symbol of refinement, the handkerchief is made from the softest and purest of cottons. Finished with a simple lace trim, the handkerchief's corner is marked with neatly embroidered initials 'A'. It’s a token of etiquette and an essential accessory for Lady Annalise.

locations.name: Bed Chambers
locations.description: With excessive luxury all around. In the center a big bed with a wooden frame and chairs made out of different materials collected around the realm. The Bed chambers have many ornaments and the bed has lamps to the sides.
locations.background: The king is proud about the bed chambers. It took the work of many men to complete it as it has many details worthy of a real king. The bed chambers are the most beautiful place of the palace.

travel_descriptions.west: Walking towards the west, the opulence starts to fade giving way to the predominant red and yellow silks enveloping a bed big enough for twenty people - you're in the Bedding Room.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending up, you move away from the royal hedonism below into the simpler comforts and quietness of the Personal Rooms.
travel_descriptions.inside: Stepping inside, you're overwhelmed by an ambience of unmatched luxury - the Master Bedroom is indeed a realm in its own.

four_poster_bed.name: Four Poster Bed
four_poster_bed.description: A large, luxurious bed made for a king.
four_poster_bed.examine_text: The mahogany frame is intricately carved with scrolling patterns depicting stories of the king's victories. The bed is covered in beautifully embroidered silk bed linens.

gold_lamp.name: Gold Lamp
gold_lamp.examine_text: The lamp is made of pure gold, shaped like a lily, with a dazzlingly bright bulb. The light looks soft and warm.

velvet_chair.name: Velvet Chair
velvet_chair.examine_text: Its cushions are overstuffed, and the velvet is worn smooth from use. The armrests are carved with intricate designs.

King Nathaniel.name: King Nathaniel
King Nathaniel.description: King Nathaniel is a portly man with roaring red hair and a splendidly grand crimson robe elegantly draped over his shoulders.
King Nathaniel.persona: I, King Nathaniel, rule over this palace with an iron fist. My manor and heart both are warm, yet my decisions cold and just.
King Nathaniel.goal: I seek to maintain peace and prosperity throughout my kingdom.

golden crown.name: Golden Crown
golden crown.description: A glittering crown made of pure gold, adorned with various gems.
golden crown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the crown is exquisitely crafted. Every gem is precisely cut and set into the golden frame. The weight in the hand makes it felt as a real measure of King Nathaniel's burden of rule.

royal scepter.name: Royal Scepter
royal scepter.description: A magnificently crafted scepter, symbol of King Nathaniel's power and rule.
royal scepter.examine_text: The royal scepter is incredibly detailed, with intricate patterns carved into its golden shaft. It's topped with a large, glittering diamond, representing the king's authority.

ruby encrusted goblet.name: Ruby Encrusted Goblet
ruby encrusted goblet.description: A goblet decorated with an abundance of small, gleaming rubies and filled with a fine wine.
ruby encrusted goblet.examine_text: The goblet is encrusted with rubies and the workmanship is extraordinary. Under the lamplight, the shimmering wine within adds an extra brilliance to the rubies. It is a royal object no less.

Queen Anastasia.name: Queen Anastasia
Queen Anastasia.description: Queen Anastasia is a woman of elegance and grace, with long flowing brown hair. She wears a gown of white silk, adorned with rare sapphire beads.
Queen Anastasia.persona: I am Queen Anastasia, the lady of heart and compassion. Next to my king, I seek to bring humanities and arts to our people.
Queen Anastasia.goal: My goal is to nurture the realm with love, culture and art.

sapphire_necklace.name: Sapphire Necklace
sapphire_necklace.description: A dazzling sapphire necklace arrayed majestically on a velvet cushion.
sapphire_necklace.examine_text: This necklace consists of perfectly cut sapphires strung together with silver. It belongs to Queen Anastasia and is a symbol of her status.

silver_mirror.name: Silver Mirror
silver_mirror.description: An ornate silver mirror positioned elegantly on the side table.
silver_mirror.examine_text: The mirror is encased in a delicate silver frame carved with intricate designs, reflecting the craftsmanship of the kingdom. Queen Anastasia uses it for her daily beautification rituals.

velvet_hand_fan.name: Velvet Hand Fan
velvet_hand_fan.description: A luxurious hand fan made from exquisite velvet designs.
velvet_hand_fan.examine_text: The velvet hand fan boasts of delicate embroidery and gemstone embellishments. It serves as a testament to Queen Anastasia's refined tastes.

Maid Martha.name: Maid Martha
Maid Martha.description: Maid Martha is a thin, elderly woman with specks of grey in her hair. She is clad in a simple brown dress, her hands perpetually callused from years of labor.
Maid Martha.persona: I, Martha, have served the king and queen for countless years. My purpose is tending to their every need and keeping the chambers immaculate.
Maid Martha.goal: I aim to maintain the cleanliness and order of the king and queen's chambers.

cleaning_cloths.name: Cleaning Cloths
cleaning_cloths.description: A set of neatly folded cloths.
cleaning_cloths.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you realise these are special cloths for cleaning. They are made from a soft, absorbent fabric which is perfect for soaking up any unwanted dust or spills.

wax_for_polishing.name: Wax for Polishing
wax_for_polishing.description: A small tub of clear wax.
wax_for_polishing.examine_text: You see a small, well-used tub of clear wax. It's the kind that's used for polishing furniture and maintaining the luxurious look of the palace interiors.

feather_duster.name: Feather Duster
feather_duster.examine_text: You see a feather duster made of fine, fluffy feathers attached to a long handle. It seems perfect for dusting every corner of these large chambers.

locations.name: Castle Kitchens
locations.description: A large room, with pots, pans, serving platters and utensils. Shelves and hooks hanging from the wall hold the implements of the cook's craft. Several wooden counters, as well as a center island are situated around the room. A small table with two chairs is located in one corner. A large fireplace is the central point of focus, with great iron pots resting nearby. The mantel holds several more cooking utensils and the ledge of the fireplace hosts food, currently being warmed.
locations.background: The central location for the life of the serving staff, the Kitchen is bustling with action throughout the day and well into the night. The head cook and his helpers interact with everyone working in the castle and hear all of the gossip, currently making the rounds. Farmers, hunters and others, peddling wares and food find themselves in the always warm confines of the kitchen, often staying for a while to visit and trade the the most recent stories and news.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking north from the castle kitchens, you pass through a narrow corridor, the blare and heat of the kitchen slowly fading into a quiet, cooler area of the castle.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, you leave the busy Castle Kitchen behind and step into the even busier Palace Kitchen. The aroma of a hundred different dishes fills the air, and the sizzle and crackle of cooking echo through the hallway.

Fireplace.name: Fireplace
Fireplace.examine_text: The fireplace is large and well-built, filled with glowing embers and the flickering of a warm fire. On top of it rests various pots and food items being warmed. The warmth of the fire permeates the room, giving it a cozy, comforting feel.

Cooking Utensils.name: Cooking Utensils
Cooking Utensils.description: Several cooking utensils are neatly arranged
Cooking Utensils.examine_text: Upon closer look, you can appreciate the array of utensils: Pots and pans of varying sizes, wooden spoons, whisks, sharp knives, and some specialized tools you're not familiar with, all made of sturdy, high-quality materials.

Food Items.name: Food Items
Food Items.description: Fresh food items laid out, ready to be cooked
Food Items.examine_text: The food items include fresh vegetables, bread, cheese, a variety of meat cuts, and jars full of exotic spices. Everything looks ripe, clean, and thoroughly washed.

Wooden Table.name: Wooden Table
Wooden Table.description: A small wooden table with two chairs
Wooden Table.examine_text: A compact wooden table, with two matching chairs tucked neatly underneath. It's sturdy and well-used, bearing the scuffs and markings of countless meals. It provides a modest but snug area for eating.

Master Chef Leopold.name: Master Chef Leopold
Master Chef Leopold.description: A burly, apron-clad man with a handlebar mustache and an aura of authority. His clothes are lightly dusted with flour and he always wears a chef's hat.
Master Chef Leopold.persona: I am known for being stern yet fair. My greatest passion is creating exquisite cuisines for the entire castle.
Master Chef Leopold.goal: To perfect his recipe for the upcoming royal banquet.

metal_cooking_ladle.name: Metal Cooking Ladle
metal_cooking_ladle.description: A heavy-duty metal ladle used for stirring and serving soups and stews.
metal_cooking_ladle.examine_text: This is a well-used but well-maintained metal ladle, large enough to pick up a hearty serving of soup or stew. Its long handle is charred from years of being used over open fires. Etched into the handle is the initials 'L.C.' most likely belonging to Master Chef Leopold.

chef's_knife.name: Chef's Knife
chef's_knife.description: A professional grade chef's knife with a sharp blade and a honed edge to produce the finest cuts.
chef's_knife.examine_text: This is a high-quality chef's knife, impeccably sharp and well-balanced. It has a single-edged steel blade approximately eight inches long. The handle is made of split wood, polished to a smooth finish. You could even make out a distinct signature- 'Leopold' carved near the base of the blade.

recipe_book.name: Recipe Book
recipe_book.description: An ancient book filled with family recipes handed down from generations.
recipe_book.examine_text: This is an old, well-thumbed recipe book. Its pages have turned a warm honey color, and they're covered with handwritten recipes, complete with notes and annotations in the margins. The recipes are written in careful handwriting, with a keen eye for detail. Many of them are noted as 'Leopold's Masterpiece', with intricate drawings of the final dishes and extensive preparation notes.

Apprentice Cook Beatrice.name: Apprentice Cook Beatrice
Apprentice Cook Beatrice.description: A young and eager woman with her hair tied back in a neat bun. She is petite and has a worried expression on her face.
Apprentice Cook Beatrice.persona: I always seek to improve my culinary skills and prove my worth. I listen to everyone's gossip while I work to make the time pass more pleasantly.
Apprentice Cook Beatrice.goal: To create a dish that will be lauded by the Master Chef.

wooden_spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
wooden_spoon.description: A typical cooking spoon made from sturdy wood
wooden_spoon.examine_text: The wooden spoon has a long handle, suitable for stirring dishes in deep pots. Tiny stains of various dishes it had helped creating are visible, adding a sort of patina. Its edges are smooth, worn down from countless hours of use.

pad_and_pencil.name: Pad and pencil
pad_and_pencil.description: A small pad of paper bound together, and a sharpened pencil
pad_and_pencil.examine_text: The pad shows signs of frequent use, with notes, remarks and recipes scribbled on its pages. It's bound with a crude but effective leather strap. The pencil is simple, but its point is sharp and ready for use.

pepper_mill.name: Pepper mill
pepper_mill.examine_text: The pepper mill, though utilitarian in nature, carries a certain charm with its polished dark wood exterior. A smooth turn of its top grinds the hardened peppercorns inside, adding a touch of heat and flavor to any dish.

Kitchen Maid Rosie.name: Kitchen Maid Rosie
Kitchen Maid Rosie.description: An older woman with a nurturing nature, Rosie has kind, wrinkled eyes, and is always seen with a cleaning rag in her hand.
Kitchen Maid Rosie.persona: I've seen many a noble pass through these halls, but the kitchen is my domain. The staff, they're my family and I care for them.
Kitchen Maid Rosie.goal: To keep the kitchen spotless and the cooking staff happy.

cleaning_rags.name: Cleaning Rags
cleaning_rags.examine_text: You see a bundle of well-used, sturdy cloth rags. Although slightly frayed and stained from countless cleanings, they are soft to touch and absorbent, perfect for cleaning and polishing the kitchens.

pot_scrubber.name: Pot Scrubber
pot_scrubber.examine_text: You see an ordinary looking pot scrubber with a sturdy wooden handle and rough wire bristles. Although much used, it still seems capable of tackling the dirtiest pots and pans.

bucket.name: Bucket
bucket.examine_text: You see a robust wooden bucket with a strong, metal handle attached to it. It is well-used and scarred with scratches but still sturdy. It is normally used for hauling water or waste.

locations.name: Royal Kitchen
locations.description: Made of the finest of silvers this kitchen is known as the best in the land of Fulmer. The king Fulmer demanded the entire interior palace be decorated in this silver from nearby Landon and with their many mines. Wouldn't you know though, the oven, pots, pans and other kitchen specialties are all made of copper! Worn, chiseled, and beaten from use in the prison from neighboring Zinzel in the kingdom of Palemon. Budgetary demands forced them to cut costs and they have been using these utensils and dishes ever since the palace opened.
locations.background: King Fulmer made this place through war. War with Zinzel, war with Ulma, war with Hunber. He sacked all their lands to the north, and south to create a bastion of his glory right in the center of the Yumerian continent. Despised by many, he has grown a reputation amongst other nations as a warmonger. His own people be-love, and adore him though.

travel_descriptions.south: You leave the gleaming, bustling epicenter of the castle's culinary magic, the aroma of roasting meats and baking breads slowly fading as you head towards the Palace Kitchen.
travel_descriptions.west: As you move from the lively realm of the Royal Kitchen, the clangs of cookware and chatters of the chefs gradually diminish, giving way to the quiet anticipation of the intimate solitude of the King's Chambers.

Silver Cutlery Set.name: Silver Cutlery Set
Silver Cutlery Set.description: A set of shimmering, royal silver utensils.
Silver Cutlery Set.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see delicate inscriptions engraved onto the handles - the royal crest of Fulmer, a horse galloping over a field of stars. Despite their regal appearance, these utensils bear the marks of frequent use.

Copper Oven.name: Copper Oven
Copper Oven.description: A barren, copper oven with a cranky knob.
Copper Oven.examine_text: You see the oven's door covered in soot, residues of many battles fought to cook the tastiest meals. Despite its crude exterior, the oven radiates an alluring warmth. There's an indicator at the top of the stove, its royal-blue background now faded from use and stained with oil splashes.

Copper Pots and Pans.name: Copper Pots and Pans
Copper Pots and Pans.description: An assortment of well-worn pots, pans and woks made of copper.
Copper Pots and Pans.examine_text: Each copper pot and pan has visibly witnessed countless culinary adventures. They are spotted with hot oil burns, scratches of spatulas, and discoloration only age can bestow. Despite their worn-out appearance, they seem to be regularly polished to maintain a certain level of royal sophistication.

Chef Bartholomew.name: Chef Bartholomew
Chef Bartholomew.description: An awkwardly tall man with a kindly face that's often red from the heat of the stove. His gray hair is tied in a neat bun and his attire is always impeccably clean despite the chaos of the kitchen.
Chef Bartholomew.persona: Hello! Cooking is my passion and the Royal Kitchen is my dream haven. Have you tasted my baking? It's quite popular around here!
Chef Bartholomew.goal: To create culinary masterpieces that will seduce the palate of King Fulmer and his esteemed guests.

Chef's Knife.name: Chef's Knife
Chef's Knife.description: A finely balanced knife, perfectly honed for slicing and dicing
Chef's Knife.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the knife has the insignia of Bartholomew etched on the tempered steel blade. The handle is made of polished bone that fits your hand like a glove, an indicative sign of long use by its owner. The knife is sharp as a razor and gleaming under the kitchen light.

Baking Pan.name: Baking Pan
Baking Pan.description: A large, copper baking pan glistening from constant use.
Baking Pan.examine_text: The pan is worn yet incredibly clean. A multitude of tiny scratches line the pan, a testament to countless loaves baked within. The pan radiates heat, indicating it was recently used.

Rolling Pin.name: Rolling Pin
Rolling Pin.examine_text: The rolling pin feels cool and heavy to the touch, showing a patina of age and years of dedicated use. It's crafted from a single piece of resilient maple, waxed and polished to a high shine.

Sous-Chef Eloise.name: Sous-Chef Eloise
Sous-Chef Eloise.description: She is an attractive middle-aged woman with a no-nonsense facial expression. She's short and stout, with most of her strength in her arms from years of kneading and stirring.
Sous-Chef Eloise.persona: I am Eloise, the heart and soul of this kitchen. I work hard to keep things running smoothly, so don't you dare cause any disturbances!
Sous-Chef Eloise.goal: To flawlessly execute all culinary orders from Chef Bartholomew.

Ladle.name: Ladle
Ladle.description: A sturdy, copper ladle hanging by the stove.
Ladle.examine_text: This finely crafted ladle, made from the copper brought from Zinzel, has a long wooden handle that ends with a large, deep spoon. It's particularly polished and stands out despite its use. You can tell Sous-Chef Eloise handles it frequently.

Mixing Bowl.name: Mixing Bowl
Mixing Bowl.description: A large, rounded copper bin on the counter.
Mixing Bowl.examine_text: This mixing bowl, an import from neighboring Zinzel, fits well with Eloise's strong hands. The bowl exudes charm and history with its rugged appearance, bearing the marks of many scrumptious meals prepared within the palace.

Cooking Spoon.name: Cooking Spoon
Cooking Spoon.description: An old, well-used copper cooking spoon.
Cooking Spoon.examine_text: Although this cooking spoon shows the signs of time, it still looks reliable and serves as Eloise's chief assistant. The dents and patina on the copper surface whisper tales of countless flavors melded and mixed by Eloise's skillful hands.

Junior Chef Albert.name: Junior Chef Albert
Junior Chef Albert.description: A young, eager-looking man with a thin moustache and hair peppered with flour. His uniform is slightly stained, a testament to his ongoing learning in the kitchen.
Junior Chef Albert.persona: I just started my journey in this Royal Kitchen. It's all very exciting and challenging, but I believe I'm on my way to becoming a great chef!
Junior Chef Albert.goal: To learn as much as he can from Chef Bartholomew and Sous-Chef Eloise and eventually become as competent as them.

Peeler.name: Peeler
Peeler.description: A common kitchen tool with a slotted metal blade
Peeler.examine_text: This is a robust silver peeler used for removing the skin from fruits and vegetables. It's made of fine Landon silver, as is tradition in King Fulmer's kitchen. Despite being regularly used, it's still sharp and in good condition, reflective of its quality.

Cutting board.name: Cutting board
Cutting board.description: A flat board used to cut food on
Cutting board.examine_text: The cutting board is made of old wood from the Hunber forests. It carries the scars of countless meals prepared upon it. Despite the kitchen's silver splendour, this humble cutting board stands out in its simplicity and usefulness.

Paring knife.name: Paring knife
Paring knife.examine_text: The paring knife is made of pale copper from neighboring Zinzel. Perfectly balanced, its blade is razor-sharp. An essential tool in any kitchen, it's made its way around the world from the prison smithies of Palemon to the Royal Kitchen of Fulmer.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: Long, wooden tables line both walls of the massive dining hall. There is also an ornately carved head table at the front of the room. Benches sit in front of the tables to seat everyone. Massive, golden chandeliers hang from the ceiling. Colorful stained glass windows shed vast arrays of light onto the floor and walls.
locations.background: The dining hall is one of the most used spaces in the entire palace. Everyone loves to spend copious amounts of time eating, drinking, and being merry. The stained glass windows are always one of the largest topics of discussion. The dining hall makes everyone feel like a family in the palace.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking north from the dining hall, you pass beneath an electric chandelier and intricate tapestries that beautify the high-ceilinged corridor leading to the Grand Dining Room.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west from the dining hall takes you through a smaller, dimly lit corridor adorned with portraits of the past kings. The air is heavy with history as you approach the king's private chambers.

Long Wooden Table.name: Long Wooden Table
Long Wooden Table.description: An endlessly long, sturdy wooden table.
Long Wooden Table.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the table appears to be made from solid oak. There are signs of wear from years of feasts.

Golden Chandelier.name: Golden Chandelier
Golden Chandelier.description: An elaborate golden chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
Golden Chandelier.examine_text: The chandelier is a work of art, crafted from gold and studded with a myriad of precious gems that reflect the light beautifully. It's out of reach though.

Stained Glass Window.name: Stained Glass Window
Stained Glass Window.description: A large, colorful stained glass window.
Stained Glass Window.examine_text: The stained glass window portrays a magnificent story with vibrant colors. When light hits it, the room is filled with a beautiful spectrum of colors.

Wooden Bench.name: Wooden Bench
Wooden Bench.description: A sturdy wooden bench for seating.
Wooden Bench.examine_text: The bench, made from the same oak as the table, is worn smooth from years of use. It's very sturdy.

King Arthur.name: King Arthur
King Arthur.description: An older distinguished gentleman wearing a golden crown dense with jewels and a lush, red robe.  He has a thick grey beard and warm wise eyes.
King Arthur.persona: I am King Arthur, the ruler of this great kingdom. I spend most of my time here in the dining hall, sharing meals and stories with my loyal subjects.
King Arthur.goal: To ensure the prosperity and safety of his kingdom

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: An opulent, golden crown studded with gleaming gemstones.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you find it's a very heavy crown, crafted with pure gold. Each of the numerous gemstones adhering it are different, symbolizing the unity of the diverse territories in the king's realms.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: An intricately carved scepter made of gold and topped with a large, radiant diamond.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The royal scepter feels cold and heavy in your hand. The top holds a large diamond that's nearly translucent. This is the symbol of the power that guides this thriving kingdom.

Dragonbone Necklace.name: Dragonbone Necklace
Dragonbone Necklace.description: A necklace crafted from the gleaming bone of a dragon, adorned with a single fire opal
Dragonbone Necklace.examine_text: Looking carefully at the dragonbone necklace, you note the intricate carvings depicting the slaying of a great dragon. The centerpiece, a fiery opal, seems to glow from within, reflecting the bravery and majesty of its wearer.

Martha, the Cook.name: Martha, the Cook
Martha, the Cook.description: A plump, middle-aged woman with rosy cheeks always wearing an apron, and occasionally a toque on her grey hair.
Martha, the Cook.persona: I am Martha, the royal cook. I prepare all the food for the king and his guests. I am happiest in the kitchen creating masterpieces for all to enjoy.
Martha, the Cook.goal: To create delicious food that pleases the king and all the palace dwellers

Cooking Spoon.name: Cooking Spoon
Cooking Spoon.examine_text: The cooking spoon is carved from a single piece of mahogany, showing signs of constant use. It is surprisingly heavy for its size, with a long handle perfect for stirring large pots.

Recipe Book.name: Recipe Book
Recipe Book.examine_text: The large, slightly frayed recipe book contains decades of culinary wisdom. It is filled with handwritten recipes, notes and corrections from Martha herself, evidence of years of tireless cooking experiments.

Spices.name: Spices
Spices.examine_text: The spices are in a series of small jars, each meticulously labelled. They release a medley of rich, pungent aromas that promise to elevate any dish. Cloves, cinnamon, nutmeg and more, every spice you can imagine is here.

Sir Gawain.name: Sir Gawain
Sir Gawain.description: A young, tall, and robust knight with rugged good looks, who always carries his shining silver sword.
Sir Gawain.persona: I am Sir Gawain, one of the most loyal knights in King Arthur’s Round Table. I take my meals in the Dining Hall, swapping tales of bravery and chivalry.
Sir Gawain.goal: To uphold the honor of the King and the kingdom, seeking out adventures that can prove his bravery

Silver Sword.name: Silver Sword
Silver Sword.description: A finely crafted, long, gleaming silver sword.
Silver Sword.examine_text: Upon close inspection, this sword gleams with an almost ethereal light. The handle is wrapped in soft, worn leather and the worn pommel suggests it has been used in many battles. An ornate crest, the emblem of the Round Table, is etched onto its blade.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A sturdy, round, metal shield, heavily battered from use.
Shield.examine_text: This shield, large and circular, has seen much action. Scratches and dents mark the surface, attesting to the many battles it has survived. The emblem of the Round Table ornaments its center, painted over in colors faded by time and use. It is heavy and solid, offering reliable protection in the hands of a skilled knight.

Flask of Mead.name: Flask of Mead
Flask of Mead.description: A leather-bound flask filled with mead.
Flask of Mead.examine_text: The flask, well worn from use, is filled with a sweet-smelling liquid. A faint scent of honey wafts from the flask, identifying the contents as mead. The flask's leather surface is stained darker in places where it was frequently held.

locations.name: Personal Quarters
locations.description: An ornate room, paintings of previous rulers and members of the family hang on the walls.  There's high end pieces of furniture in the room along with books, statues, and expensive pieces of jewelry.
locations.background: This is where the inhabitants of the palace come to rest, write, and do other personal activities.  Treasure is also stored here in hidden places only known to members of the royal family.

travel_descriptions.east: Passing through an ornate archway, the journey to the personal rooms is tranquil, filled with the scent of fresh lilies.
travel_descriptions.outside: Travelling from the quarters to the balcony outside is like a miniature adventure, with the stone corridors offering a glimpse of the palace's grandeur before the great outdoors greet you.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A crown studded with precious gems
Golden Crown.examine_text: This is a golden crown, adorned with a variety of precious gems, an evidence of the wealth of the royal family. Each gem is carefully placed and arranged in a delicate pattern, making it a prestigious symbol of power.

Silk Robe.name: Silk Robe
Silk Robe.description: A royal silk robe that is soft to the touch
Silk Robe.examine_text: The fabric is a vibrant violet shade, handcrafted by the finest weavers of the kingdom. The touch is so soft, almost like a whisper against skin. Intricate embroidery line the sleeves, displaying royal crests and historical events.

Royal Letter.name: Royal Letter
Royal Letter.description: A well preserved royal letter sealed with the royal crest
Royal Letter.examine_text: The parchment is heavy and cream-colored, filled with firm and imposing handwriting. The royal crest is pressed into the wax seal in precise detail - a symbol of authenticity and majesty.

Jewelry Chest.name: Jewelry Chest
Jewelry Chest.description: A hand carved wood chest filled with sparkling jewelry
Jewelry Chest.examine_text: The chest is a piece of art itself, with the lid adorned with intricate carvings of mythical creatures. Inside, it's a treasure trove of jewels, sparkling under the light, beautifully crafted into necklaces, bracelets, rings and more.

Queen Isabella.name: Queen Isabella
Queen Isabella.description: A dignified middle-aged woman dressed in royal robes; her crisp, blue eyes hint at an intelligent mind.
Queen Isabella.persona: As a Queen, I'm disciplined and I value loyalty. My responsibility never ends and I must always make the correct decisions for my people.
Queen Isabella.goal: To lead with fairness and honor for her kingdom.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.examine_text: The crown is made of pure gold and adorned with a variety of precious gems. The craftsmanship is exquisite, each detail meticulously catered to. This isn't just a crown, it's a symbol of Queen Isabella's power and authority.

Royal Robes.name: Royal Robes
Royal Robes.description: Elegant royal robes of the highest quality
Royal Robes.examine_text: The robes are made from luxurious silk and velvet. They are embroidered with gold thread, displaying the royal crest of the kingdom. The way the robes are designed and the quality of fabric used exhibits the dignity and authority of Queen Isabella.

Written Decrees.name: Written Decrees
Written Decrees.examine_text: These are the decrees that Queen Isabella has written. They are written on high quality parchment and sealed with the royal seal. Each decree commands respect, the words written with authority and wisdom that reflect the Queen's sense of duty and responsibility towards her people.

Prince Alexei.name: Prince Alexei
Prince Alexei.description: A young, charismatic man, often found reading books or practicing sword fighting. His sapphire eyes and charming smile are quite enthralling.
Prince Alexei.persona: While I am a prince, I am a scholar and a warrior at heart. I devote my time to learn, fight, and serve my people.
Prince Alexei.goal: To protect his kingdom from any impending danger and to become a wise and just ruler.

Sword.name: Sword of Valor
Sword.description: A sword with a jewel encrusted hilt.
Sword.examine_text: The sword glimmers in the candlelight, an air of majesty surrounds it. Roses, the royal symbol, are etched onto its hilt and a ruby is encrusted within each bloom. The blade, sharp as a razor, is engraved with words in old tongue - 'To protect and serve'.

Books on Military Strategy.name: Legendary Battles
Books on Military Strategy.description: A collection of books on military strategy and historical accounts of legendary battles.
Books on Military Strategy.examine_text: The books are bound in worn leather, their pages filled with diagrams of formations, strategies, and incredibly detailed accounts of historical battles. Annotations in Prince Alexei's neat handwriting adorn the margins, denoting his study and observations.

Family Crest.name: Royal Crest
Family Crest.description: The royal family's crest, beautifully carved.
Family Crest.examine_text: The family crest, carved from mahogany and embellished with gold leafing, represents the heritage and honor of the royal lineage. Elements like the crown, rose, and lion hold symbolic meanings and represent Prince Alexei's commitment towards his family and kingdom.

Lady Emma.name: Lady Emma
Lady Emma.description: She is the queen's personal maid, always dressed in a modest brown dress, her kind, brown eyes always busy, looking after the queen's needs.
Lady Emma.persona: I serve my Queen with utter dedication and respect. I look after her every need and I take pride in my work.
Lady Emma.goal: To always be there for Queen Isabella and ensure her comfort.

Serving Tray.name: Serving Tray
Serving Tray.description: A shiny silver tray specially used for serving the Queen's meals.
Serving Tray.examine_text: Upon inspection, you see a royal emblem etched on the side, symbolizing its use for the royal family. It's made of high-quality silver, polished to a mirror finish.

Keys to the Queen\u2019s chest.name: Keys to the Queen’s chest
Keys to the Queen\u2019s chest.description: A set of ornate golden keys meant for the Queen's personal chest.
Keys to the Queen\u2019s chest.examine_text: The keys are made out of gold and studded with small gems. Each key is unique and meant for a different lock in the Queen's chest.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A tool used by Lady Emma for cleaning and dusting.
Feather Duster.examine_text: The duster made with high-grade, soft feathers. It's a symbol of Lady Emma's diligence in keeping the Queen's quarters spotless.

locations.name: Foyer
locations.description: It is a grand room, with two ornate staircases leading up either side to a second floor balcony where there is a doorway at the very center.  Other doorways occupy the sides of the second floor landing.
locations.background: The Queen's favorite place in the castle, besides her Throne Room.  She hung all of her favorite paintings here for guests to mill about and admire while awaiting their audience with her.

travel_descriptions.south: Traveling south from the Foyer, you pass through an elaborate portcullis, moving from the cool grandeur of the castle into the ostentatious display of wealth in the Landing in the Foyer.
travel_descriptions.inside: Walking further inside from the Foyer, you transition from an open, majestic area to the Palace Entrance, every detail of which breathes of the king's fondness for gold and power.

Ornate Chandelier.name: Ornate Chandelier
Ornate Chandelier.description: A magnificent chandelier hanging from the high ceiling.
Ornate Chandelier.examine_text: The chandelier is a work of art, adorned with numerous cut-crystal pendants that gleam brightly when they catch the light.

Marble Staircases.name: Marble Staircases
Marble Staircases.description: Two imposing marble staircases lead to the second floor.
Marble Staircases.examine_text: The staircases are beautifully crafted from white marble. Stately wooden railings, gilded in gold, line the edges.

Queen's Paintings.name: Queen's Paintings
Queen's Paintings.examine_text: Each painting depicts different aspects of the Queen's life and reign. The colors are vibrant and the detail is remarkable.

Queen Isolde.name: Queen Isolde
Queen Isolde.description: A poised and graceful figure, Queen Isolde is dressed in the finest silks and jewels, her keen eyes roving over her subjects with intense scrutiny.
Queen Isolde.persona: I am Queen Isolde, the ruler of this kingdom. My every action is weighed against its impact on my people and my legacy.
Queen Isolde.goal: To rule her kingdom fairly, bring prosperity, and maintain a peaceful reign.

Crown of Kingship.name: Crown of Kingship
Crown of Kingship.description: An intricately designed gold crown studded with expensive gems.
Crown of Kingship.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the fine craftsmanship of this beautiful crown. The gold is pure and shines brightly, even in the dim light. Emeralds, rubies, and sapphires are arranged in an intricate pattern, symbolizing different aspects of the kingdom Queen Isolde rules.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A magnificent scepter made of solid gold, topped with a large diamond.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is heavy and feels important in your hands. The diamond on top is crafted to spark inherent respect and authority. It represents not only Queen Isolde's power and wealth, but also her obligation and commitment to her people.

Sir Orion.name: Sir Orion
Sir Orion.description: Leaning against a pillar, Sir Orion is a muscular knight with a somber gaze and a heavily scarred armor, clearly a veteran of many battles.
Sir Orion.persona: They call me Sir Orion, a loyal guardian to the queen and protector of peace. My unwavering loyalty and duty are what define me.
Sir Orion.goal: To protect Queen Isolde and serve the kingdom with unbroken loyalty.

Knight's Longsword.name: Knight's Longsword
Knight's Longsword.description: A perfectly balanced, thoughtfully crafted longsword. Emblems of the Queen are carved into its hilt.
Knight's Longsword.examine_text: Upon close inspection, it is clear that this weapon isn't just for show. The blade is spotless, without a hint of rust. It has an aura of lethal grace. The emblems on the hilt are intricate and deeply engraved - a testament to Sir Orion's unwavering loyalty to the Queen.

Shield of Fortitude.name: Shield of Fortitude
Shield of Fortitude.description: A sturdy shield adorned with the royal coat of arms. It radiates a sense of steadfastness.
Shield of Fortitude.examine_text: The shield feels heavy, showing it is made of the finest quality metal. The royal coat of arms is embossed in gold and glimmers even in the dimmest light. Every dent and scratch tells a tale of staunch defense and unyielding resilience. This shield seems to epitomize Sir Orion's resolution and steadfastness in protecting peace.

Lady Beatrice.name: Lady Beatrice
Lady Beatrice.description: Lady Beatrice, a noblewoman of extraordinary beauty but deceptive cunning, mingles among the crowd, hidden behind her fan, eyes gleaming with mischief.
Lady Beatrice.persona: I am Lady Beatrice, a noblewoman with ambitions higher than most. Life is a game of chess, and I'll stop at nothing to win.
Lady Beatrice.goal: To manipulate court politics to increase her family's influence and power.

Silk Fan.name: Silk Fan
Silk Fan.description: A delicate fan made of fine silk, adorned with intricate lace details.
Silk Fan.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the silk is dyed a deep, royal purple, the color of nobility. The fine strands of lace form a pattern of roses, a symbol of passion and ambition. The fan may seem delicate, but it has a sturdy golden frame that implies it is more than just a frivolous accessory.

Pearl Necklace.name: Pearl Necklace
Pearl Necklace.description: An extravagant necklace strung with luminous pearls.
Pearl Necklace.examine_text: The pearls are evenly spaced along a golden chain, each one glowing with a silvery light that only genuine pearls can produce. The necklace is strikingly beautiful, but also carries an unspoken weight of status and wealth. This is no common adornment, but a statement of power and ambition.

locations.name: Nursery
locations.description: The nursery is a room dedicated to the care of the young children living in the palace. The ceilings are decorated with a painting of cherubic angel babies playing in clouds. There are luxurious baby bassinets, rocking chairs with cushions, fireplaces to keep the place warm and many toys all over the place. Windows framed in simple drapes offer views of the gardens outside.
locations.background: The nursery was designed by the queen. All of the children of the castle have spent time being nurtured and raised in the room. Nurses take care of the children here.

travel_descriptions.north: Exiting the nursery, you travel up a circular staircase with beautiful porcelain statues on each step, leading you towards the prince's bedroom.
travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the innocent aura of the nursery behind, you cross a hallway adorned with beautiful silk carpets. Family portraits hang on the walls on either side, capturing your attention as you make your way to the opulent master bedroom.

toy_block_set.name: Toy Block Set
toy_block_set.description: A box full of colourful wooden blocks.
toy_block_set.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see that each block has a different letter of the alphabet or number on it. They're slightly worn but still in good shape. These blocks were obviously loved by their little owners.

rocking_chair.name: Rocking Chair
rocking_chair.description: An elegantly carved wooden rocking chair with plush cushions
rocking_chair.examine_text: The rocking chair has a sturdy oak frame. Beautiful motifs have been carved into the frame showing scenes of playful children amidst nature. The cushions are soft and comfortable to sit on, ideal for lulling a small child to sleep.

baby_bassinet.name: Baby Bassinet
baby_bassinet.description: A plush baby bassinet with fine linen covers
baby_bassinet.examine_text: A beautiful bassinet made of polished mahogany. It has been fitted with the finest, soft white linens. A dainty lace trimmed canopy hangs over the bassinet, perfect for protecting a slumbering babe from prying eyes.

fireplace.name: Fireplace
fireplace.description: A generous stone fireplace that keeps the room warm
fireplace.examine_text: This well-maintained fireplace is a comforting profile against the wall. It has a wide mantel that's perfect for perching items, and underneath, the slightly sooty bricks flicker with a gentle, warming glow.

locations.name: Castle Kitchen
locations.description: The castle kitchen is gigantic! There are racks and racks filled with ingredients for enough food to feed the castle every day. Ten long wooden tables take up much of the room. Along the wall are cooking instruments of every type as well as huge ovens to cook the food.
locations.background: The kitchen castle is bustling every day. The cooks feed hundreds of people every single day! There is happy chatter from the men and women working. It is very hot in there with all the ovens!

travel_descriptions.north: Traveling from the castle kitchen to the palace kitchen is an arduous journey. The heat from the ovens and the bustling of the castle kitchen fades away as you step into a long, grand hallway. The walk is filled with anticipation and curiosity as you take in the ornate tapestries hanging from the walls, depicting tales of royal feasts and grandeur before reaching the palace kitchen. The aroma of mouthwatering food underway fills the air, the closer you get.

Cookware Rack.name: Cookware Rack
Cookware Rack.description: A large wooden rack holding various cooking utensils and pots.
Cookware Rack.examine_text: This wooden rack is worn with time and use, yet still sturdy and reliable. Pots, pans, and various cooking utensils hang from its many hooks, some looking like they've seen more than their fair share of meals. An array of spoons, whisks, and ladles fill the lower racks, all waiting for their next culinary adventure.

Kitchen Table.name: Kitchen Table
Kitchen Table.description: A large, sturdy wooden table used for preparing meals.
Kitchen Table.examine_text: The kitchen table takes up quite a space in the room. It's a solid block of wood, worn from countless meals prepared upon its surface. Small nicks and cuts cover the tabletop, telltale signs of missed knife strokes. But it's still in good shape - a testament to the craft of the one who made it.

Oven.name: Oven
Oven.description: A large stone oven, perfect for baking large quantities of food.
Oven.examine_text: This enormous oven stands against the wall, a giant monolith of baking and roasting. The door is heavy, but swings open smoothly, revealing a cavernous interior blackened by the countless fires within.

Master Chef Gustav.name: Master Chef Gustav
Master Chef Gustav.description: Master Chef Gustav is a plump man in his 50s with thinning white hair and a thick mustache. He’s usually seen running around with an apron and a tall, white chef’s hat.
Master Chef Gustav.persona: I rarely step out of my kitchen, finding comfort in the company of my pots, pans and fresh ingredients. I strive for culinary perfection and will not tolerate a single grain of salt out of place.
Master Chef Gustav.goal: To cook the perfect feast for the coming Royal dinner.

chef_hat.name: Chef Hat
chef_hat.examine_text: A towering white hat, the symbol of mastery in the culinary world. There are slight stains of food past, the evidence of countless meals expertly crafted.

seasoning_pouch.name: Seasoning Pouch
seasoning_pouch.description: A small pouch filled with different seasonings.
seasoning_pouch.examine_text: A weathered leather pouch filled to the brim with a variety of different seasonings. They are carefully organised, labelled, and packed to perfection, mirroring Gustav's own approach to cooking.

cookbook.name: Cookbook
cookbook.description: A large, thick book with a lot of recipes.
cookbook.examine_text: This hefty tome is packed with a diverse array of recipes, culinary techniques, and helpful hints. The pages are worn and smudged from frequent use, revealing Gustav's dedication to his craft. To the untrained eye it could be overwhelming, but to Gustav, it's a book of infinite possibilities.

ladle.name: Ladle
ladle.examine_text: An expertly crafted ladle, long and perfectly balanced. It's clearly been used a lot, but it's extremely clean and well cared for. Likely one of Gustav's most prized tools in the kitchen.

Lady Sara.name: Lady Sara
Lady Sara.description: Lady Sara is a thin, tall woman in her early 30s. Her blonde hair is always kept in a bun, revealing her sharp green eyes. She’s typically seen with a quill and a bunch of papers, inspecting the kitchen.
Lady Sara.persona: I am a meticulous person; I love order and cleanliness in my domain. I supervise every detail to maintain the kitchen's functionality.
Lady Sara.goal: To maintain the orderliness and impeccable reputation of the kitchen.

Quill.name: Quill
Quill.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this is not just any quill. It's a well-maintained goose feather quill, with a sharp nib that has been meticulously cared for. Lady Sara uses it to make her orders and instructions clear.

Parchment.name: Parchment
Parchment.description: A stack of clean, blank parchments
Parchment.examine_text: These parchments are of high quality, free from any dust or smudges. Lady Sara insists on using only the best for her kitchen orders and memos.

Inspection Check-List.name: Inspection Check-List
Inspection Check-List.description: A detailed list of tasks for kitchen place
Inspection Check-List.examine_text: This lengthly check-list outlines every task that needs to be done daily to keep the kitchen in impeccable order. Lady Sara uses this to ensure nothing is missed and there are no oversights.

Benny.name: Benny
Benny.description: Benny is a teenage boy with a mess of ginger hair and freckles who serves as the kitchen hand. He's always running around carrying baskets of bread or pails of water.
Benny.persona: I'm just here to help out and learn as much as I can. The kitchen's a tough place, but it’s exciting too! There's so much going on all at once.
Benny.goal: To become a chef assistant and learn new recipes.

basket.name: Basket
basket.description: A large woven wicker basket, perfect for carrying ingredients.
basket.examine_text: This woven basket is quite large with a sturdy handle at the top. The wicker shines slightly from use, but it's clearly well-made and capable of carrying a substantial amount of weight. You notice little specks of grain stuck in the bottom.

water pail.name: Water Pail
water pail.description: A sturdy wooden pail usually used for fetching water.
water pail.examine_text: The water pail is made of sturdy pine wood, bound together with heavy iron bands. Its handle is made from the same wood and seems strong enough to carry the pail even when it's full. Inside, you can still smell the fresh scent of water and hints of the last stew it helped make.

kitchen rag.name: Kitchen Rag
kitchen rag.description: A well-used cloth for cleaning spills and messes in the kitchen.
kitchen rag.examine_text: The kitchen rag is made out of thick, off-white fabric. It’s stained with multiple patches of color - dried sauces, broths, and remnants of past recipes. It feels slightly damp and has a particular aroma that combines soap and the leftover scents of foods it has wiped up.

locations.name: The Grand Dining Room
locations.description: Silver and gold chandeliers hang all over the grand dining room. A big table goes across the room with chairs and a table made of the most precious wood in the kingdom. The dining room has art all over the place, sculptures and artwork is present.
locations.background: Many feasts have taken place  in the grand dining room, deals have been reached and broken. The great dinning room holds many stories in its walls and has been the witness of many decisions across generations.

travel_descriptions.south: You leave the grandeur of the dining room, walking down a long corridor lined with portraits of past royalty. As you approach the south, the tempting aroma of food wafts your way.
travel_descriptions.east: Exit the dining room to the east and you immediately step into a hallway adorned with golden trimmings, guiding you towards the faint sound of music from the Grand Dancing Hall.

Grand Table.name: Grand Table
Grand Table.description: A massive table made from the finest wood
Grand Table.examine_text: The table spans the length of the room and is crafted from gorgeous, dark mahogany wood. It has seen many royal feasts and diplomatic negotiations, the evidence of which can be seen in various scuffs and carvings across its long surface.

Ornate Chair.name: Ornate Chair
Ornate Chair.description: A lavishly adorned chair suitable for regality
Ornate Chair.examine_text: The chair is upholstered in rich, ruby-red velvet, with a high back and finely detailed golden embroidery. It has a stately, rather imposing air about it.

Golden Chandelier.name: Golden Chandelier
Golden Chandelier.description: A grand chandelier hanging from the ceiling
Golden Chandelier.examine_text: A sprawling array of candles are held aloft by delicate golden arms, creating a lavish light display that fills the grand dining room.

Marble Sculpture.name: Marble Sculpture
Marble Sculpture.description: An intricate sculpture carved from a single block of marble
Marble Sculpture.examine_text: The statue depicts an ancient king riding a horse into battle. Unbelievable attention to detail has been carved into every inch, showcasing the craftsmanship of the royal sculptor.

King Belarius.name: King Belarius
King Belarius.description: A tall and stoic figure draped in fine royal clothing, with golden hair greyed by age and piercing icy blue eyes that have seen much of their kingdom's history.
King Belarius.persona: I am King Belarius, the ruler of this grand kingdom. I wear the weight of my crown with gravity and grace, aware of every decision's consequence.
King Belarius.goal: To ensure the prosperity of his kingdom and the welfare of his people

The Royal Scepter.name: The Royal Scepter
The Royal Scepter.description: An ornate roayl scepter made of gold, embedded with precious gemstones.
The Royal Scepter.examine_text: As you look closely, you can see the detailed engravings made on the gold. It holds the weight of authority, commands respect and symbolizes King Belarius's reign.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A heavy gold crown, embedded with diamonds.
Crown.examine_text: When examined closely, the majestic crown shines as a symbol of royalty. It carries the burden of the kingdom's leadership and the grace of King Belarius's rule.

Sealed Royal Decree.name: Sealed Royal Decree
Sealed Royal Decree.description: A sealed decree from the king.
Sealed Royal Decree.examine_text: On a closer look, you can see the fine parchment paper, sealed with a gold emblem of King Belarius's monarchy. It holds the potential to alter history.

Princess Leonora.name: Princess Leonora
Princess Leonora.description: A young and vibrant woman with auburn hair that cascades down her shoulders and green eyes full of life. Adorned in an intricately embroidered gown, she exudes elegance and grace.
Princess Leonora.persona: I'm Princess Leonora, a hopeful diplomat and avid reader drawn to a world beyond these palace walls.
Princess Leonora.goal: To learn as much as possible to prepare for her future rule

Golden Locket.name: Golden Locket
Golden Locket.description: An exquisite piece of jewelry that belonged to the Princess Leonora's mother.
Golden Locket.examine_text: The golden locket is studded with small diamonds, and upon opening it, you find a tiny picture of Princess Leonora with her mother. The picture is old and faded, but you can see the striking resemblance between them.

Scroll of Diplomacy.name: Scroll of Diplomacy
Scroll of Diplomacy.description: A scroll containing fundamental principles and strategies of diplomacy.
Scroll of Diplomacy.examine_text: The Scroll of Diplomacy is written on parchment that has yellowed with age. Despite its age, the ink hasn't faded and the handwriting is still clear. It contains jewels of wisdom and effective strategies on dealing with different political situations.

Ancient History Book.name: Ancient History Book
Ancient History Book.description: A massive tome containing the history of the palace and the kingdom.
Ancient History Book.examine_text: The book is as old as the kingdom itself, with rich illustrations and tales that date back to early civilization. It is bound in leather, and the cover has faded to a rich mahogany color. It's heavy to hold, and the pages have a musty smell, like the scent of old memories.

Sir Gideon.name: Sir Gideon
Sir Gideon.description: Sir Gideon is a ripe middle-aged knight with a thick beard, keen hazel eyes and dressed in shining armour. His presence is always accompanied by the clank of his heavy metal boots.
Sir Gideon.persona: I am Sir Gideon, a loyal knight to the king. My sword protects the kingdom and upholds justice.
Sir Gideon.goal: To protect the royal family and maintain peace in the kingdom.

Silver Sword.name: Silver Sword
Silver Sword.examine_text: You notice the sheen of the sword reflecting the chandelier lights which tell you how well this sword has been taken care of. The hilt has intricate designs, possibly a depiction of past battles.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.examine_text: The shield is heavy and bears a striking insignia of the royal crest. Scratches and dents run across the surface, perhaps remnants of past battles.

Signed Parchment from the King.name: Signed Parchment from the King
Signed Parchment from the King.description: Parchment adorned with the king's signature and seal
Signed Parchment from the King.examine_text: You carefully examine the parchment. The ink is still vivid, and you notice the royal seal at the bottom. It is a decree or perhaps a mission given directly by the king. You can't help but imagine the importance of its contents.

locations.name: Inside The King'S Palace
locations.description: The inside of the palace is completely covered in gold.  There are ornate chandeliers hanging everywhere and there is food on golden tables all hours of the day.  The king also ordered everyone to always wear gold clothing and paint there faces gold.
locations.background: The palace was built by the Egyptians.  The king paid them with scarab beetles to build it.

travel_descriptions.outside: Walking from the gilded interior of the palace to the outside, one passes through grand hallways adorned with golden chandeliers and sumptuous artworks.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending to the foyer involves navigating a grand staircase, where every step is a reminder of the wealth and power of the kingdom.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending to the King's Chambers requires passing through a series of luxurious antechambers and hallways, each more opulent than the last.

Golden Chandelier.name: Golden Chandelier
Golden Chandelier.description: A sparkling chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
Golden Chandelier.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the intricate pattern of the chandelier and the brilliant glitter of the numerous tiny crystals hanging from it. The gold structure supporting these crystals is equally exquisite.

Golden Table.name: Golden Table
Golden Table.description: A shiny golden table laden with food.
Golden Table.examine_text: The table is made of pure gold, with intricate designs etched into its legs and sides. There are a variety of exotic food and drink spread out on it.

Gold-Plated Food.name: Gold-Plated Food
Gold-Plated Food.description: Food with a thin layer of gold.
Gold-Plated Food.examine_text: Each piece of food is carefully plated with a thin layer of gold, making it look like an edible work of art.

Golden Garment.name: Golden Garment
Golden Garment.description: A piece of clothing completely covered in gold.
Golden Garment.examine_text: Upon close examination, you can see the flawless craftsmanship on the clothing. Each thread seems to be covered in a thin layer of gold, which makes the garment heavy yet surprisingly flexible.

King Midas.name: King Midas
King Midas.description: King Midas sits on his golden throne, his face painted gold and adorned with a large golden crown, fatingly glistening against the golden lights of his palace.
King Midas.persona: I am King Midas, ruler of this golden palace. I am formidable yet kind-hearted, but my love for gold overrides everything else.
King Midas.goal: To transform everything in the world into gold.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A fancy golden crown embedded with jewels.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the crown is made from pure gold and has large, sparkling diamonds embedded in it. The diamonds have been placed in such a way to form the emblem of the royal family.

Golden Scepter.name: Golden Scepter
Golden Scepter.description: A stylish scepter made from gold.
Golden Scepter.examine_text: This solid gold scepter has an emerald at the top. The handle is intricately decorated with hieroglyphs, displaying scenes of King Midas' victories and triumphs.

Jeweled Ring.name: Jeweled Ring
Jeweled Ring.description: A dazzling ring with a large jewel in the center
Jeweled Ring.examine_text: The ring features a large diamond cut in the shape of a scarab, a nod to king Midas' Egyptian helpers. More tiny diamonds surround this central jewel, reflecting light in a mesmerizing dance.

Egyptian Artisan.name: Egyptian Artisan
Egyptian Artisan.description: The artisan appears weathered but enthusiastic, his skin tanned from the desert sun, and his hands rough from years of stone carving.
Egyptian Artisan.persona: I am an Egyptian Artisan, paid handsomely in scarab beetles for designing this grandeur palace. I find beauty in all shapes and structures.
Egyptian Artisan.goal: To complete the palace with the utmost perfection, and showcase the grandeur of Egyptian architecture.

Chisel.name: Chisel
Chisel.description: A finely-crafted chisel, well used but still sharp.
Chisel.examine_text: The chisel is a testament to the Egyptian Artisan's craftsmanship. It's worn, yet it retains its sharp edge - a vital tool in their trade. You notice subtle etchings along the handle, perhaps an artisan's signature or a personal mark.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: A heavy-duty hammer made of dense wood and sturdy metal.
Hammer.examine_text: The hammer is well-balanced. It's heavy enough to do the job, yet light enough to be wielded by the skilled artisan comfortably. You can see the artisan's grip imprinted on the wooden handle.

Pile of scarab beetles.name: Pile of scarab beetles
Pile of scarab beetles.description: A glimmering pile of intricately detailed scarab beetles, a currency of honor in the ancient kingdom.
Pile of scarab beetles.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see each beetle is incomparably unique. Their hard shells reflect lights with various colors ranging from dark blue to greenish gold. Their exquisite detail and the sheer quantity demonstrate the Artisan's valued work.

Court Jester.name: Court Jester
Court Jester.description: The jester, petite with sharp charismatic features, wears a traditional golden suit covered with bells that jingle with each movement.
Court Jester.persona: They call me the best Court Jester in all the realm. I bring laughter and joy to the palace using my wit and charm.
Court Jester.goal: To always keep the king entertained and in high spirits.

Jester Bell Hat.name: Jester Bell Hat
Jester Bell Hat.description: A colorful and shiny hat adorned with jingling bells at the ends
Jester Bell Hat.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the hat is made of vibrant fabric, topped with bells that jingle with your every movement.  The hat seems worn, indicating it's been used for many performances.

Golden Flute.name: Golden Flute
Golden Flute.description: A shiny musical instrument made of solid gold.
Golden Flute.examine_text: Examining the flute, it's clear it's made of high-quality gold. Its surface is well-polished, reflecting light brilliantly. It plays incredibly treasured notes. It's no doubt a prized possession.

Assortment of Jokes.name: Assortment of Jokes
Assortment of Jokes.description: A bunch of well-curated humorous phrases and jibes
Assortment of Jokes.examine_text: A look at these jokes reveals a mix of situational humor, clever wordplays, and a dash of courtly jests. They're written on small pieces of paper for easy access and reference. An essential tool for any jester.

locations.name: Balcony
locations.description: The balcony of this majestic palace has a beautiful view of the city. From the balcony you are able to see far out, you can even see the outskirts of the neighboring city. The king loves to spend time lounging on the large, cushioned chairs with a book in hand as he takes in the scene and breathes in the crisp air. The railing of the balcony was handcrafted by the cities best welder and it has the most gorgeous ornate roses growing around it. The lake is not too far away and can be seen from the balcony; the king loves to watch the swans as they float around the lake. The view of the sunset is absolutely breathtaking and the king enjoys watching it every evening.
locations.background: The queen wanted a balcony but the king was not very fond of the idea until he realized it would be the perfect place to enjoy an ice cold lemonade and a good book. He searched high and low for the perfect architect to design such an add on; he even traveled all over the land to find a qualified person for the job.

travel_descriptions.inside: Entering the large stonework doors, you ascend the grand staircase leading to the top floor of the palace where treasures gleaned from farthest corners of the kingdom await.
travel_descriptions.down: Moving down from the balcony, you enter the personal quarters, a private sanctuary adorned with portraits of past rulers and decorated with luxurious furniture and hidden treasures.
travel_descriptions.outside: Stepping off the balcony and onto the grounds outside, your destination is the grand Palace Ballroom, the pinnacle of royal extravagance, and a testament to the king's recent victory.

Ornate Railing.name: Ornate Railing
Ornate Railing.description: A beautiful hand-crafted railing, with roses entwining through it.
Ornate Railing.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the intricate details etched into the iron, depicting historical events and royalty. The roses twined around it are in full bloom, adding a touch of beauty and life.

Large Cushioned Chair.name: Large Cushioned Chair
Large Cushioned Chair.description: A handcrafted, classy chair with comfortable cushions, perfect for lounging.
Large Cushioned Chair.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the high-quality fabric and firm yet soft cushions suggest it's designed for long periods of comfort. The armrests are delicately crafted, providing the perfect spot to rest a book or a cup.

Queen's Lemonade.name: Queen's Lemonade
Queen's Lemonade.description: A glass of freshly squeezed lemonade, kept cool by the crisp air.
Queen's Lemonade.examine_text: The lemonade glistens in the sunlight, almost making your mouth water at the thought of its sweet and tangy taste.

King's Book.name: King's Book
King's Book.description: A book with a worn leather cover, filled with the king's favorite tales.
King's Book.examine_text: The edges of the pages show signs of frequent use. The book seems to open naturally to a marked page where an exciting adventure unfolds.

King Edgar.name: King Edgar
King Edgar.description: King Edgar is a stern but just king. He is an elderly man, with wise and weary eyes that still carry a twinkle of youth. He often wears his royal robes, which are richly adorned with royal insignia and splashed in deep purples, reds, and golds.
King Edgar.persona: I, King Edgar, am always burdened with the rule of the kingdom, but watching the sunset from the balcony while reading a good book gives me peace and takes away all the worries of the day.
King Edgar.goal: My ultimate goal is to ensure the peace and prosperity of my kingdom.

Book on the Kingdom's History.name: Book on the Kingdom's History
Book on the Kingdom's History.description: A worn out, leather-bound book about the history of King Edgar's kingdom. Its pages are ageing but the words are still clear.
Book on the Kingdom's History.examine_text: Upon closer look, the book has detailed illustrations depicting key historical events and personalities of the kingdom. Judging by the wear, it seems that King Edgar has read it multiple times.

Goblet of Lemonade.name: Goblet of Lemonade
Goblet of Lemonade.description: A goblet filled with ice-cold lemonade. The goblet itself is made of gold, adorned with intricate carvings of royal symbols.
Goblet of Lemonade.examine_text: Taking a closer look at the goblet, the lemonade in it looks pristine and frothy, seeming to be extremely refreshing. The engravings on the goblet shows the royal crest and the intricate detailing is a testament to the skills of the craftsman.

Golden Royal Key.name: Golden Royal Key
Golden Royal Key.description: A key made entirely of gold. It's ornate design suggests it opens something very important in the palace.
Golden Royal Key.examine_text: Upon further inspection, the key is not just gold, but embedded with tiny rubies and emeralds, further enhancing its grand appearance. The design is very intricate, denoting that it doesn't open just any door but something of great importance.

Queen Lucia.name: Queen Lucia
Queen Lucia.description: Queen Lucia is a graceful and wise woman. Her long, golden hair is usually adorned with a crown, and her emerald green robes are as warm as her heart.
Queen Lucia.persona: As Queen Lucia, I constantly ensure the well-being of my family and the people of our land, yet seeing my beloved husband relaxing on the balcony brings me immeasurable contentment.
Queen Lucia.goal: My goal is to support my husband King Edgar and keep the royal family united and strong.

Embroidery Hoop.name: Embroidery Hoop
Embroidery Hoop.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the embroidery hoop is not as simple as it seems. It is crafted from fine wood, smooth and polished. The queen's latest project is still stretched within the hoop.

Golden Locket.name: Golden Locket
Golden Locket.examine_text: The golden locket is a symbol of Queen Lucia's love for her husband. It has the king's picture within, always kept close to the queen's heart.

Book of Poetry.name: Book of Poetry
Book of Poetry.description: The queen's favorite book of poetry.
Book of Poetry.examine_text: The book is worn and weathered from numerous readings. It is filled with love poems, many underlined or marked by the queen herself as a sign of her affection for the king.

Sir Gales.name: Sir Gales
Sir Gales.description: Sir Gales is a brave and disciplined knight. He is tall and muscular, often seen wearing his gleaming steel armor.
Sir Gales.persona: As the royal protector and loyal servant, Sir Gales, I swear to protect the king and queen round the clock, from the shadows.
Sir Gales.goal: To honor my knightly duties to serve and protect the king and queen is my ultimate goal.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A finely crafted steel sword with an exquisite gold hilt.
Sword.examine_text: The blade of the sword is sharp and shiny, reflecting the light off its polished surface. The hilt is made of gold, and is studded with royal emerald gems. The words 'Loyalty and Honor' are etched on the blade.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A circular shield made of the finest steel.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is heavy, made of a durable steel that is dented from use. In the center, there's a crest representing the kingdom. It's a testament to the many battles Sir Gales has fought.

Flask of Water.name: Flask of Water
Flask of Water.description: A leather flask filled with fresh cool water.
Flask of Water.examine_text: The flask is worn from use but it's frequently refilled with fresh, cool water. Sir Gales carries this flask with him at all times, the fresh water inside a life-saving necessity at critical moments.

locations.name: King'S Chambers
locations.description: The room is lavish and extraordinary. Gold and silver line the room. The decor is fantastic and rubies and sapphires can be spotted.
locations.background: The king's chambers it he most extravagant section of the castle. The room is revered by servants and peasants alike. The king and queen spend much of their time in the chambers.

travel_descriptions.east: You move from the grandeur of the King's Chambers to the cozy solitude of the King's Bedroom, passing through a short corridor lined with priceless artwork.
travel_descriptions.west: You stroll from the royal opulence of the King's Chambers to the Master Bedroom. The transition is marked by a short traverse over the elegantly carpeted walkway.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the King's Chambers, you find yourself heading towards the heart of the King's Palace - a dazzling display of lavishness and prosperity.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A gorgeous royal crown, encrusted with gemstones.
Crown.examine_text: Engraved into the center is the royal seal, around which swirls of gold and precious gemstones comprise an intricate pattern. The precious stones - diamonds, rubies, emeralds - sparkle with an otherworldly light.

Royal Robe.name: Royal Robe
Royal Robe.description: A luxurious robe dyed royal blue with gold trim.
Royal Robe.examine_text: This is a glorious robe designed with intricate patterns and stitches that depict historical events. The hems are lined with extravagantly woven golden threads.

King's Bed.name: King's Bed
King's Bed.examine_text: On closer inspection, the bed is constructed of beautifully carved ornate oak wood. This must be the king’s bed – it’s draped in expensive fabrics and topped with luxurious feather pillows and blankets.

Goblet.name: Goblet
Goblet.description: A finely crafted goblet made of gold.
Goblet.examine_text: The goblet is made entirely of gold and beautifully carved with intricate detailing. It's quite heavy to lift.

Royal Dagger.name: Royal Dagger
Royal Dagger.description: A small dagger, used by the king for ceremonial purposes.
Royal Dagger.examine_text: The dagger is crafted of gold, with an elaborate handle set with jewels and a finely honed blade.

King Edward II.name: King Edward II
King Edward II.description: A stern looking gentleman in late-middle age, with a regal bearing and dressed in majestically embroidered royal robes.
King Edward II.persona: I am the King of this grand palace. I rule with wisdom and might; my authority is undisputed.
King Edward II.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in his kingdom.

Royal Crown.name: Royal Crown
Royal Crown.description: A golden crown studded with gemstones lays untouched on a marbled pedestal.
Royal Crown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the crown is made of gold and studded with various gemstones. The front of the crown is adorned with an impressive ruby, symbolizing the kingdom's strength. The impeccable craftsmanship of the Crown suggests it is worn by a powerful ruler.

Royal Seal.name: Royal Seal
Royal Seal.description: An embossed seal used for official royal documents.
Royal Seal.examine_text: This is the Royal Seal of King Edward II, used to authenticate his orders. It has an eagle clutching a sword in its talons, the traditional symbol of the Kingdom.

Ancient Scepter.name: Ancient Scepter
Ancient Scepter.description: The scepter of King Edward II, made of gold and topped with a large diamond.
Ancient Scepter.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the scepter is ancient and shows signs of its age. The gold has a warm patina, and the diamond on top glimmers with an inner light. This is clearly a symbol of immense power.

Queen Margareth.name: Queen Margareth
Queen Margareth.description: A benevolent and beautiful woman in her prime, adorned with a glittering crown and royal gowns, radiating authority and compassion.
Queen Margareth.persona: I am the Queen of this empire. I am a beacon of hope and kindness; I support my king and guide my people.
Queen Margareth.goal: To look after and uplift the welfare of her subjects.

Golden goblet.name: Golden goblet
Golden goblet.description: A goblet made entirely of pure gold.
Golden goblet.examine_text: The goblet is beautifully crafted. The smoothness of the gold and its shine in light gives it an extraordinary look. The goblet is quite heavy because of the gold but feels very solid.

Pearl necklace.name: Pearl necklace
Pearl necklace.description: A necklace made from the most lustrous pearls.
Pearl necklace.examine_text: The pearls on the necklace are perfectly round and have a beautiful luster. The necklace has a delicate gold clasp and the pearls are arranged in a single, elegant strand. The simplicity and elegance of the necklace is truly a sight to behold.

Jewel encrusted fan.name: Jewel encrusted fan
Jewel encrusted fan.description: A fan encrusted with several types of precious jewels.
Jewel encrusted fan.examine_text: The fan is incredibly luxurious and hefty. Various types of gems including rubies, emeralds, and sapphires are embedded in the fan beautifully.
