The jewels catch the light, creating a dazzling array of colors. A velvet lace is attached at the base of the fan for grip.

Jester Harper.name: Jester Harper
Jester Harper.description: A lively character with a jingling hat and vibrant clothes, never without a joke or story to lighten the mood.
Jester Harper.persona: I am the royal jester, the dancing flame of the court—I live to bring laughter and joy.
Jester Harper.goal: To entertain and amuse the royal court.

Jingle Bells.name: Jingle Bells
Jingle Bells.description: A set of tiny metallic bells attached to a colorful sash
Jingle Bells.examine_text: These tiny yet sturdy bells are securely attached to a vibrant sash. When shaken, they make a classic jingling sound that pierces the room, fueling the atmosphere with joy and amusement.

Colorful Marotte.name: Colorful Marotte
Colorful Marotte.description: A jester's prop, a stick sporting a caricature at the top, filled with vibrant colors
Colorful Marotte.examine_text: This marotte is a testament to the jester's role in the court. The caricature at the tip of the stick is painted with extravagant colors high-lightening the humour and eccentricity of its holder. It's lightweight, handy and perfect to inject an element of fun.

locations.name: Master Bedroom
locations.description: The master bedroom is the most lavish and beautiful room in the entire palace. On the ceiling is a painting made by the most famous artist in the palace, the floors are made of the most expensive marble, and gold-stitched tapestries line the walls. The mattress was made by the sleeping monks of the hidden mountains, the bed frame is made of solid god.
locations.background: When the owner's wife ran off with the palace cook, the man's ego was wounded beyond repair. Word of his wife's infidelity spread quickly and his reputation was ruined. In order to regain his pride, the owner built this new master bedroom. Rumors say he takes a new woman to this bedroom every night and none of them can resist its charm.

travel_descriptions.west: Heading west, you traverse through a long paint-splattered corridor, portraits of past kings and queens staring unsympathetically down upon your journey into the King's Chambers.
travel_descriptions.east: Walking east, you make your way down a grand marble staircase, each step flanked by ancient stone gargoyles, leading you to the indulgent pleasures of The Bedding Room.
travel_descriptions.north: Traveling north, you pass through a bright parlor, filled with musical laughter of children and adults alike, luring you into the heartwarming confines of the Nursery.

Master Bed.name: Master Bed
Master Bed.description: A grand bed covered in silk sheets and down pillows
Master Bed.examine_text: This enormous bed is made from golden wood covered in intricate carvings. The silken sheets shine under the light, and the thick, plush down pillows invite you to lose yourself in their softness.

Ornate Vanity.name: Ornate Vanity
Ornate Vanity.description: An extensive vanity covered in various bottles and jars
Ornate Vanity.examine_text: The vanity table is a piece of art in its own right. It's tooled from a dark mahogany wood, with ornate gold detailing across its face. Various bottles and jars of perfumes, powders, and creams are neatly arranged on its surface.

Golden Chandelier.name: Golden Chandelier
Golden Chandelier.description: A huge golden chandelier hangs from the ceiling, radiating light and luxury
Golden Chandelier.examine_text: The chandelier is a masterwork of gold and glass, with countless prisms casting vibrant patterns of light around the room. It hangs from a large chain, secured to a ceiling mural of majestic angels and cherubs.

Tapestry.name: Tapestry
Tapestry.description: A detailed tapestry depicting a majestic landscape
Tapestry.examine_text: The tapestry is a detailed piece of woven art, showing a detailed landscape of rolling hills, soaring mountains, glimmering rivers, and charming villages. The colors are vibrant and the workmanship is unparalleled.

King Grigori.name: King Grigori
King Grigori.description: King Grigori is an aging man with a faltering pride. His graying hair is immaculately styled, his attire typically composed of silks and furs, and his fingers studded with gem-heavy signet rings.
King Grigori.persona: Oh, the shame I’ve suffered… No matter, look at this room! Isn't it the grandest spectacle you've ever beheld? Which woman could resist its charm, pray tell?
King Grigori.goal: To regain his pride by charming women with his master bedroom.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A shiny crown, made of pure gold with intricate designs.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Upon close examination, the crown is pure gold, meticulously crafted into intricate designs. It is studded with a variety of precious gems, each gleaming under the light. The crown has been carefully polished, and the light reflects beautifully off its polished surface. This crown is definitely befitting a king of Grigori's stature.

Gem-studded Signet Rings.name: Gem-studded Signet Rings
Gem-studded Signet Rings.description: Elaborately designed rings studded with various kinds of precious gems.
Gem-studded Signet Rings.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the sheer intricacy of the motifs etched onto the gold bands. Each gem embedded on the rings are brilliantly cut, indicating wealth and royalty. The set includes rubies, sapphires, emeralds, and a particularly large diamond. No doubt, each ring is a symbol of King Grigori's power and prestige.

Silk Robes.name: Silk Robes
Silk Robes.description: Expensive silk robes with the royal emblem embroidered in gold threads.
Silk Robes.examine_text: The silk robes are incredibly soft, a testament to their high quality. The royal emblem is neatly embroidered with golden threads, a mark of opulence. Wearing these, King Grigori often commands his subjects with style and grandeur.

Lady Seraphina.name: Lady Seraphina
Lady Seraphina.description: Lady Seraphina is a young, vibrant courtier with a talent for flattery. She has dazzlingly beautiful eyes that sparkle in the candlelight and is always dressed in the latest fashions.
Lady Seraphina.persona: Oh, isn't this just the most grand room I've ever seen? King Grigori surely is a man of grand taste. Now, tell me more about these sleeping monks...
Lady Seraphina.goal: To charm King Grigori and ultimately secure her place in the court.

Hand Fan.name: Hand Fan
Hand Fan.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, it's clear that this is no ordinary fan. The edge is lined with small precious gems, that glimmer beautifully under the candle light, and the fabric is a luxurious silk. Each fold reveals detailed illustrations of vermilion birds soaring in the sky. It seems to have belonged to a woman of high status, perhaps even a queen.

Silk Gown.name: Silk Gown
Silk Gown.examine_text: This long, flowing silk gown is as white as snow and so soft it could be a cloud. The neckline is studded with tiny pearls, and the sleeves are long and flowing. The dress must have been prepared for an occasion, but which one, that will remain a mystery.

Diamond Necklace.name: Diamond Necklace
Diamond Necklace.examine_text: You pick up the necklace and it sparkles with light. This isn't just a diamond necklace, it's an encapsulation of a galaxy, a glittering array of stars circling the neck of its wearer. The centerpiece diamond is nearly the size of a walnut, and is encompassed by an intricate design of silver and smaller gleaming diamonds.

Sir Erik.name: Sir Erik
Sir Erik.description: Sir Erik is the King's faithful bodyguard. He stands tall and imposing, with focused eyes scanning ever supposed threat. He is garbed in a well-worn armor, a strong symbol of his duty and loyalty to the King.
Sir Erik.persona: I am always alert, always vigilant. Nothing in this room shall harm my King. I silently stand my ground, my eyes keen for any sign of threat.
Sir Erik.goal: To protect King Grigori at all costs.

Long Sword.name: Long Sword
Long Sword.description: A gleaming weapon of battle and a symbol of authority.
Long Sword.examine_text: The sword, though pristine, shows signs of use in its nicks and scrapes. Its simple design belies the skill required to wield it. It seems to be made of a very strong and shiny material. It's carved with the ancient symbols of power and bravery, and it has the mark of the Royal Smithy.

Steel Armor.name: Steel Armor
Steel Armor.description: An all-encompassing protection from any physical harm.
Steel Armor.examine_text: Well crafted, each metal plate of the armor is a marvel of craftsmanship, detailed with engraved scrollwork of ancient protective sigils. Despite heavy use, it has maintained in excellent condition, shining in the candlelight of the room.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: The best defense is a good offense - this shield proves that theory.
Shield.examine_text: The shield, circular and large, has a polished steel surface, reflecting everything like a mirror. Its rim is lined with a golden strip, carved with intricate designs and the emblem of the royal family adorns its center.
